1300991.text: She seems to have encountered some accident when she was sent by the Protector on a special mission. No one has ever seen her since her departure.

1300997.text: Elis, like the rest of her clan who grew up in the forest, lives in symbiosis with the animals, and learns the necessary skills to hunt.

1300998.text:
Elis is a born warrior. The wild power entwined in her genes soon made her stand out as the best hunter in the clan. Later, she was elected chief. 

Even feral beasts do not dare to behave in front of her. 

Even a fierce tiger becomes as docile as a pet while receiving a simple glare from her.

1300999.text:
Elis firmly believes in the law of the jungle, but unlike the rest of the clan, she doesn't try to exterminate all the intruders of the forest. 

Perhaps, to the Queen of the Forest, those invaders are just a group of nonentities.

1301000.text:
She used to live in the forest with her clan. However, to protect the forest from invasion by the outsiders, Elis and her clan chose to pledge their loyalty to the Protector. 

No one dares to invade the forest ever since.

1301010.text:
As the present ruler of the River of the Underworld, she cares greatly about her status as the Fallen Angel and the mention of it can enrage her. 

She's moody and unpredictable. The ghosts of the Underworld are often severely punished for offending her with even a small trifle.

1301011.text:
She speaks a patrician language that is close to extinction. 

No one understands it except for herself and some deliverers. 

It seems she doesn't care about her unintelligible way of speaking, but rather sees it as a sign of her own nobility.

1301012.text:
She likes singing by the River of the Underworld. 

It is said that all the ghosts will gather and bow down before her, and she will condescend to sing in an intelligible language for those she sees as inferiors. 

It is said that her only friend is Sher, the Wanderer of Fate. 
Acheronte admits that Sher is the only one willing to hear her singing and she once said Sher is not a real name. 
Sher has a higher status than Acheronte in the Underworld, which is quite confusing for other people to understand. What sort of being in the Underworld can be even nobler than the present ruler?

1301013.text:
She will use honorifics only when referring to Sher. 

Otherwise, she always uses unintelligible words when speaking to others. 

"O fragile beings, beest grateful to mine own chanting f'r thee." 

"Thee crosseth the Lethe and stayeth in hell to atone f'r thy sins. This is thy only choice."

1301019.text:
She is the leader of the deliverers working at the entrance to the Underworld, but her behaviors make her unworthy of her title. 

Her main duty is to command her underlings to deliver wandering souls to the next life. 

If there are any defiled spirits nearby, she will use her giant scythe to destroy them without mercy.

1301020.text:
Though wearing a serious look on her face, she is a careless girl, not active in her work at all. 

She often gets distracted and slacks off. Fortunately, her companions can always complete the work dutifully. 

Goorveig, in particular, does not like her lazy attitude and often criticizes her. However, Kyphon does not mind it at all.

1301021.text:
A deliverer's duty is to guide ghosts to the next life, and prevent them from hurting the living. 

Her former companion Goorveig violated the duty and reaped the souls of the living. In order to hunt her down, Kyphon stepped into the Chrono Tower.

1301022.text:
She is often reported by fellow deliverers for being lazy. But Acheronte, ruler of the Underworld doesn't punish her for that, and Kyphon herself is not willing to make any change. 

Sometimes, she can be found lying by the River of the Underworld and resting like there's no one around. 

Goorveig once made a detector that could wake up Kyphon as soon as it found her sleeping. But after Goorveig left there, Kyphon is back to lazy mode again.

"Oh? A new soul? Ah, never mind. I'll leave it to the others."

1301024.text:
She is a shy girl, wielding a huge wand that is completely at odds with her petite figure. 

She is not only proficient in common healing magic, but also can use the forbidden magic that's only known by Night Clan. She can cure the wounds that are seemingly incurable for others. 

When others try to probe into her magic, Tuonel always wriggles out of giving a clear answer.

1301025.text:
Tuonel is seen as a disgrace to her family. 

Her mother, the youngest daughter of the most powerful family in Chilora, accidentally saved a wounded fallen angel. The two fell in love and gave birth to an illegitimate childTuonel. 

Tuonel was disowned by her family and driven out of the house.

1301026.text:
This little abandoned girl wandered alone until she was accepted by the Fallen Angels and eventually fit into the Night Clan. 

Unlike the rest of the clansmen, this descendant of a fallen angel never uses life-siphoning magic. 

To others' surprise, she heals all those injured equally, whether human or not.

1301027.text:
She is reluctant to talk about her early childhood in Chilora or to reveal why she came to Cassiel. Luckily the villagers in the Lower Domain kindly accept her. 

As an apothecary, she enthusiastically helps the villagers and gradually integrates into their daily life. She is eager to make friends, and Nemesi is currently the top one on her willing-to-be-friends list.

1301029.text:
She was born in Fomoire, an island in the west.

She inherited the bloodline of the Siam family, taking charge of the "Corrag (Finger)" among the Six Ovates.

1301030.text: Unlike other Ovate families, the Siam family gave up the pursuit of greater power. They only wish to use the healing magic at their fingertips to relieve the suffering of their people.

1301031.text:
The good-natured Yothaya never gets into conflicts with others, nor even interacts much with them. 

Her only friends are Yui and Miku, and she always wants to dress as cute as they do. 

Her petite figure seems to fit into the cute clothing style.

1301032.text:
At her age, the flowers, plants, insects, and butterflies in the fields are far more attractive than the complicated and tedious rituals. 

Therefore, she often skips some important rituals to go play in the forest. 

She recently has developed a strong interest in cooking. She makes a lot of strange dishes and asks Miku to have a taste of them. 

Though Miku doesn't like those dishes, she still struggles to finish them. This gives Yothaya a wrong impression that her cooking skill is getting better all the time. 

As her confidence gets boosted, she is thinking about giving her dishes to the Ovate Norn, but Miku has kept trying to stop her from doing that.

1301034.text: A young girl looking no different from human only appears by the sea.$B$$B$She often strolls on the beach before the low tide and picks up shells as gifts for others.

1301035.text: Ardisia was adopted by the Sea Elf in her childhood.$B$Her adoptive mother taught her how to breathe underwater. The ocean is her home.$B$$B$Far away from the humans, Ardisia knows nothing about the dangers of the outside world.

1301036.text: As long as the weather is clear, Ardisia will definitely come to the beach for a walk.$B$$B$As the sun sets and the sky darkens,$B$she will make a silent maiden's wish to the shooting stars.

1301037.text: It is said that her adoptive mother,$B$$B$the Sea Elf, hates humans so much.$B$When a boy attempts to approach Ardisia,$B$the calm ocean will churn, as if to engulf the frivolous boy.

1301039.text: He was the gatekeeper of the Sanctuary and the older brother of Afallen and Parfait. $B$$B$However, he was not interested in his work at all, but absorbed himself in composing music.

1301040.text: Although not interested in his work, he was somehow trusted by the Protector. $B$$B$One day, Garditis left the Sanctuary for the reason that this place is lacking in creative inspiration. $B$$B$According to his own words, his best piece was finished by the Elf Lakeside.

1301041.text: Garditis has become a bard in the Lower Domain, playing his favorite melodies for all to hear. $B$$B$Unlike other noble sorcerers of the Upper Domain, Garditis has a very good relationship with the inhabitants of the Lower Domain and even invites them to perform with him.

1301042.text: Someone has seen him several times in the Forest of Elves, but each time he only wandered at the entrance to the forest and did not step in, as if an invisible wall existed. $B$$B$It seems Mayahuel hates him a lot. She will scold and throw him out whenever she sees him approaching the Forest of Elves.

1301044.text:
The princess of Sunrise Island in the far east.

Her mother is the queen that rules over this land.

Her elegancy can be found in her every move.

1301045.text: Regarded as the successor of the Living God, she has been receiving an elite education from a young age. Study politics, etiquette, and various conjuring.

1301046.text:
Every year, she offers a dance at the Kami Festival. Spectators marvel at the softness and elegance of her dance "Seigaiha." 

It is said only the true successor can learn it. 

The dance is like the ripples of a vast ocean, representing the God's grace, omnipresent and boundless. 

As a successor, Talhae will incorporate the people's prayers for peace and blessings for the future into the dance, and offer it to the God who blesses the land.

1301047.text:
Although she is a princess envied by all, privately she hates to be confined to the palace. She wishes to go outside to play. 

She often leans on the handrail and wonders, "What is the outside world like?" 

Yet she is not permitted to have much contact with the outside, which makes her very distressed. 

When her inner distress cannot be solved, she often practices dancing in the courtyard. 

As Talhae starts dancing, all the red leaves fall from her head with the wind, as if they are retreating for knowing they could not compete with her beauty. Whoever sees this scene will be impressed by her otherworldly beauty.

1301049.text:
She is the most popular maiden of Rumni, the Land of the Sunfaith. 

Gorgeously dressed and elegantly behaved, she is considered the daughter of a great nobleman by others.

1301050.text:
She uses a long-lost magic that burns as brightly as the sun. 

People often see her as a symbol of light.

1301051.text:
She calls herself Luan, the same name as the legendary sacred bird that symbolizes the sun. 

The bird can be reborn in fire no matter what harm it suffers. 

People often regard her as the maiden guarding Rumni and the reincarnation of the sacred bird. 

However, she has never admitted this. Rather than responding to people's expectations, Luan prefers to play freely, tread lightly on the earth, walk on the wind, and dance among the clouds.

1301052.text:
She likes playing with kids and believes all of them will have a bright future where they can make a splash just like her. 

Once, someone who was up to no good approached Luan and said with an evil smile, "Since you like kids a lot, how about having a baby by yourself?" 

But soon he paid the price for his rudeness. The maiden before him was no more the one that always wore a smile. 

In a few days, a person in rags was found lying on the roadside out of the town, whose face was too badly battered to be recognized and whose body had suffered masses of burns and fractures. People could only tell he was still alive from his shallow breathing.

1301054.text:
She is a young girl born in a collateral branch of the royal family from the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North. She inherits the royal bloodline just like Lilia. 

With outstanding magic power, she serves as a disciple of the Scarce Mage Nasha.

1301055.text:
Unlike her mentor, she retains the heart of a virtuous maiden. 

She's cute and gentle, but sometimes quite clumsy. She often falls into emotional fits of self-blame for making too many mistakes.

1301056.text:
However, Nasha loves this disciple so much that she decided to teach Gem Magic to this weeping child. 

Only the tears of a kind-hearted maiden can condense into magic quartz and the tears also serve as the very medium for releasing higher Gem Magic. 

After mastering the delicate Gem Magic, La Crima remains unchanged, still a timid girl who won't take the initiative to attack others with magic.

1301057.text:
When she was a child, she had witnessed that her parents were drawn into the disputes over the royal succession and reduced to death so she was afraid of interacting with others and often made strange sounds alone. 

Her mentor Nasha used to help her learn how to fit in the society but the several attempts all ended in failure. 

Born in a collateral branch of the royal family, La Crima lived in a castle of the capital and was required to attend social gatherings. A person who has anthropophobia is apparently unable to adapt to such an environment so she sneaked out of the castle. 

Someone said she showed up on the tundra of Snegurochka and it's also said the Frost Chivalric Order is looking for her. 

Personally she is not willing to have too much contact with others so she may be hiding in a corner and immersed in her own world at this moment.

1301058.text:
She used to be the maid of Dana, Goddess of the Lake. 

Before Dana fell into a deep sleep, she was given the task of guarding the Forest of Elves. 

She has much respect for Dana. For thousands of years, she has been following Dana's instructions to guard the peace of the Forest of Elves.

1301059.text:
Proficient in natural magic, she has no mercy for intruders who dare to disturb the forest. 

If you just enter the forest with no malicious intent, you will be spared from her fury. However, all males are forbidden to enter the forest. 

Someone witnessed that she attacked Garditis who tried to trespass on the forest and even disregarded her identity of High Elf to severely scold Garditis.

1301060.text:
She takes great care of Flora, and often teaches Flora new tunes although she is not good at composing music herself. 

According to Mineer's proof, it seems that someone comes to the Forest of Elves regularly to pass on new songs to Mayahuel.

1301061.text:
Mayahuel liked a human male before but unexpectedly the one she revered most also liked this man, so she chose to quit and wish them happiness. 

Yet this relationship didn't last long as the human male deserted his lover and left the forest. 

Mayahuel was there to witness all so she started to hate all males and pledged that no male would be allowed to set food on Forest of Elves.

1301062.text:
A marvelous and genius alchemist who has mastered sophisticated magic at a young age. 

In pursuit of the lost ancient magic system, she entered the Chrono Tower together with Bluen.

1301063.text: Hired by Bluen, she leads a team of mercenaries to hunt for an unknown treasure in the tower.

1301064.text:
A noble chevalier who served the Protector Asherah. He swore to protect the world with his sword. 

In the disaster where magic leaked, his body changed into the shape of a frog. 

He now feels great fatigue after a short period of activity for his apparent incongruity with this body.

1301065.text:
A woman who has been guarding $heroine$ in the Chrono Tower, and provides all kinds of help.
She addresses $heroine$ as master.

1301066.text: A black cat that exudes a mysterious aura. It seems to know a lot of secrets. $B$$B$Aloof as it is, it is always willing to help $heroine$.

1301067.text:
Born in a fading noble family, she is determined to restore her family's glory. 

She entered the Chrono Tower with her companions in the hope of finding legendary treasures and magic.

1301068.text: As an outstanding blacksmith, she dreams to find the legendary Holy Sword.

1301069.text:
She is the girl who entered the Chrono Tower with the preacher. She claims to be a champion of justice who repels monsters and evil forces. 

She can switch between the magic of different elements, but her personality may change as well. 

She looks cute and beautiful but once she starts talking, she often annoys others by making some sensational statements, especially with a superior attitude.

1301070.text:
He calls himself the servant of the merciful god, and claims that he only entered the Chrono Tower to cleanse the heretics. 

He condemned Dejase as a heretic and tried with all his might to put an end to her research. He seems to care much about the Witch's whereabouts and knowledge.

1301071.text: The Protector of Irminsul. Devoured by magic, she is gradually losing her natural form.

1301072.text: A priestess who serves the Protector Asherah. She is extremely mentally unstable after witnessing the magic abnormality.

1301073.text: The Protector of Snegurochka, called "Her Saintess" by her followers. She lives in the Glacial Castle up the mountain.

1301074.text: A gigantic white bear. As fierce as it can be, it's unbelievably gentle around Cersivey.

1301075.text:
A believer of Ereshkigal, the Chronospace Protector.

After Ereshkigal was sealed, she lost her spiritual support and locked herself away in the Chrono Tower for countless ages.

1301088.text:
He calls himself the servant of the merciful god, and claims that he only entered the Chrono Tower to cleanse the heretics. 

He condemned Dejase as a heretic and tried with all his might to put an end to her research. He seems to care much about the Witch's whereabouts and knowledge.

1301089.text: With stronger magic power, I can treat more people.

1301091.text: My soul was bound by a more powerful contract.

1301094.text: You're just cold and aloof like the others, ignoring my existence.

1301095.text: A fresh face... Are you new to the Convent?

1301096.text: I have always wished for someone's company while ascending the tower.

1301097.text: Ringing the bell every day is no easy task. If only there were someone who could help me.

1301098.text: You would also look for protection if you were bullied, right?

1301099.text: The contract? You've also noticed that? It is darkness that has cured me. Do you want to take a share too?

1301101.text: I'm observing the dark night. Keep your distance.

1301103.text: It's dawn. Time to have a rest.

1301104.text: I'm Croche, uninterested in fighting, but I will do my best to assist you.

1301105.text: Even the slightest light can bring hope.

1301106.text: The unknown in the dark is so intriguing.

1301108.text: It seems that you can also sense the light in the darkness.

1301109.text: Bullying is just an act of cowardice.

1301110.text: Is weeping the only thing to do when being bullied?

1301111.text: You offered to hold my hand in the darkness. That feeling is so delightful!

1301114.text: I grew up in the Convent of Muntenia. No one was ever willing to talk to me. I was forced to do bell duty at the clock tower, with only darkness by my side. I climbed up those stairs day after day in loneliness to ring the bell at the top... until one day I made a contract with the darkness.

1301116.text: Wherever there is a combat, injuries will follow.

1301117.text: I will light it up for you right away.

1301118.text: It's the light that comes from the darkness.

1301121.text: Anyone hurt? Don't worry, let me treat you.

1301125.text: Eulalia is different now. Don't you think so?

1301126.text: This miracle comes from God's salvation.

1301127.text: It is for Eulalia? Thank you.

1301129.text: What's wrong? Why are you staring off into space?

1301130.text: Eh? I have never seen you before.

1301132.text: Leaving the palace and my father was a tough decision. But Eulalia has no regrets because the people here need Eulalia more.

1301133.text: Even those with great talents will go off the path if their faith is lost. But don't worry, I will pray to God to bless you.

1301134.text: Eulalia dreams of a country where everyone is equal. Will you join Eulalia?

1301138.text: Really? You don't need Eulalia's help?

1301139.text: I am the Princess Eulalia of the Principality of Lunia. Would you mind if I travel with you?

1301140.text: The wounded are waiting for God's salvation.

1301141.text: Huh? A new place? Eulalia is looking forward to it.

1301142.text: The blessing of Lunia will shine up the wounded souls.

1301143.text: You can feel Eulalia's joy as well?

1301144.text: The one without faith is like a lost soul, which will be abandoned by God eventually.

1301145.text: The pain of war can only be healed by time.

1301146.text: Eulalia hasn't felt such happiness since escaping from the palace.

1301149.text: As a Princess of the Principality of Lunia, I'm just a political bargaining chip. All I want is to save more people. Hope that God will bless these war-torn lands.

1301152.text: It's not time to give up yet.

1301157.text: Even God's power has limits then...

1301159.text: Oh? I can undertake harder tasks now.

1301160.text: So tiring, but it wasn't for naught.

1301161.text: Have you prepared some candy for me?

1301163.text: Is this a reward for my work? Then I'll take it.

1301166.text: I've worked hard for today. Let's talk about it tomorrow!

1301167.text: Are you eyeing my pillow? I won't let you have it!

1301168.text: Take my job more seriously? Huh? That could spell more trouble for me.

1301169.text: This is the garden of the Sanctuary. See? It's so soft and comfortable to lie down on the pillow. Try it~

1301171.text: Would you like to play with me?

1301172.text: I really don't know what to do with you.

1301173.text: Time to rest! Time to rest!

1301174.text: I am actually... a gatekeeper of the Sanctuary!

1301178.text: Are you giving me candy? (o) Whoa!!

1301179.text: I will destroy whoever disturbs my sleep!

1301180.text: Mmmm... I can't do this anymore. I have reached my physical limits!

1301184.text: Oh, you are not an intruder. Would you like to play with me? Great! No one plays with me in the Sanctuary. Being alone is so boring!

1301187.text: This is the sturdiest shield in the Sanctuary.

1301190.text: Hahaha... I'm feeling good as new.

1301191.text: Those who attempted to invade the Sanctuary have all been cleared.

1301192.text: Even God's power has limits then...

1301195.text: This is... the smell of spring...

1301196.text: The aroma of flowers is getting stronger.

1301198.text: Oh! I can't believe that you know what I like. I appreciate it.

1301199.text: Wake up! Did you just fall asleep?

1301200.text: A stranger... What are you doing here?

1301201.text: This season is a wonderful time to visit Belgica.

1301202.text: I have never seen this flower before~ Can you tell me its name?

1301203.text: Are you looking forward to spring? Well, I know that feeling. Once spring comes, let's go play in the fields. That's a promise, so don't forget!

1301204.text: Oh? It's almost sunset? Time flies by when I'm having so much fun... with you.

1301206.text: This place is full of all sorts of flowers.

1301207.text: Do you need my help? No problem.

1301209.text: The aroma in the fields is quite alluring. Pick a flower for Primula, will you?

1301211.text: Let's go pick some rapeseed blossoms!

1301213.text: The flowers blooming under the sun are as cute as your smile.

1301214.text: If not cherished, the spring will pass soon.

1301215.text: Even flowers will cry if nobody knows their heart.

1301216.text: Fruits are honorable and flowers are beautiful. But as a leaf, you silently guard them both.

1301219.text: Huh? Would you like to play with me? Visiting Belgica in this season is indeed a wise choice. Let me introduce you to the flowers.

1301222.text: The aroma of flowers! Smell it!

1301223.text: The aroma can heal the soul.

1301227.text: It's too dangerous. I should leave now...

1301229.text: Is this an even harder piece of music? Anyway, I can manage it~

1301231.text: Mother, this melody is my tribute to you...

1301234.text: Em... Huh? What did you just do?

1301235.text: Oh, I was so focused on my strings that I didn't notice you.

1301236.text: You seem to enjoy my music. If so, I can play another piece for you~

1301237.text: What's wrong? You look upset. Um... Oh, it's because the rain stops you from having a picnic by the lake. That's okay. Since my music can even calm storms, you don't need to worry about this drizzle.

1301238.text: The music from your world is so wonderful. Can you teach me?

1301239.text: Huh? I'm sorry. Your words just reminded me of my mother. She speaks as gently as you do. Oh... my mother. That's a memory from a long time ago...

1301240.text: What? You like this? Well, I don't hate it.

1301241.text: This place is completely different from my hometown.

1301242.text: Do you want me to play a piece for you?

1301243.text: Is this the last note already?

1301244.text: You're not from Elf Lakeside, are you... Me? My name is Flora. Allow me to help you with my music.

1301247.text: Oh, it's the melody of life.

1301248.text: You have been working hard enough. Please allow me to help.

1301249.text: Such beautiful music. Even though I don't know the name of this piece, it has stirred my memory. Thank you, I'll cherish this.

1301250.text: You also want to play a beautiful melody? A recipe to it? There's no such thing. How about letting me teach you personally?

1301251.text: Shhh, be quiet. Instead of going to the lake, I have been here enjoying the sunshine.

1301254.text: I have never seen you before. My name is Flora. It is quite dangerous to be here alone... Anyways, let me take you out of the forest~

1301256.text: In my mother's name, I bless you.

1301261.text: My singing can even pierce into the Underworld.

1301262.text: How to fix a broken string...

1301264.text: Please teach me more about magic!

1301265.text: I've grown stronger! Look, this kid is quite delighted too.

1301268.text: Thank you! Today is our anniversary, so I also prepared something for you. Let's celebrate together!

1301270.text: Were you startled? Don't worry, this kid is quite gentle.

1301271.text: It must be destiny that guides me here.

1301272.text: The long-cherished wish of the Holy Mother cannot be fulfilled merely by sighing. We have to fight!

1301273.text: Huh? You wanna a lap pillow? Well then, I'll allow you to rest head on my lap.

1301274.text: I feel really cheerful and happy with you around. Are... are you happy too?

1301275.text: Um, I feel happy when I see your smile.

1301276.text: If you'd like to, let's go together!

1301279.text: My name? Caledonia, here to serve you together with this child.

1301280.text: Oh... It's nothing. I'm just not quite used to talking to people.

1301281.text: Holy Mother, please light up our path!

1301282.text: The winds of recovery are blowing at me. How pleasant!

1301283.text: The thought of interacting with others makes me sweat all over. But if you wish to see some changes in me...

1301284.text: Are you here with a friend? You look happy. Well then... I'm happy too.

1301285.text: This is the best food I have ever made. Try it!

1301286.text: Oh? You can't fall asleep? Then let me read this book to you! A tiger once lived in... Huh? You don't want to hear a story? Then I'm going to bed and you read it to me instead!

1301289.text: I'm Caledonia with nothing special. Can an ordinary person like me change somehow?

1301292.text: Are you trying to stop me?

1301295.text: I can't give up just yet...

1301296.text: Victory for me and this child!

1301297.text: I never thought it would end like this...

1301303.text: Is this a gift for me? I'll cherish it.

1301305.text: Intrigued by my magic? But that's a secret I won't readily tell others.

1301306.text: You're butchering the song... But I don't really mind. Keep singing until I fall asleep.

1301307.text: I was taken in by the Church as a tool that cleans the heretics. All I have been doing was following their orders until I met you.

1301308.text: Your hands are so warm. This is a feeling that I have never felt before. My hands? Maybe you can't feel them. They are ice-cold just like my hometown.

1301309.text: What would happen if our relationship ended now? I don't want to end it, to be honest. If I can stay with you forever, I...

1301314.text: You fallen ones, get ready to be punished by Anemone!

1301315.text: You are seemingly not my enemy. So, are you a friend of mine?

1301316.text: Heretics are hidden in the darkness.

1301317.text: Ah... I'm exhausted. Can you get me any dessert?

1301318.text: That's so interesting. Can you tell me more?

1301319.text: I had a bad dream... in which you abandoned me.

1301320.text: This is the best food I have ever made. Try it!

1301321.text: Don't look down on me! I can use all sorts of elemental magic!

1301324.text: Anyone who tries to practice the forbidden magic will be Church's enemy. To purge these heretics is Anemone's job.

1301326.text: You want to challenge me? Your bravery is admirable!

1301331.text: Those who touch the darkness will forever slumber in the dark night.

1301334.text: My swordsmanship is still far from perfect.

1301335.text: I train better when I'm with you.

1301336.text: Practice of swordsmanship must be treated seriously.

1301337.text: You should give this to someone else. I'm not very interested.

1301338.text: Oh, thank you. I'll return your kindness.

1301340.text: Leave all worldly distractions behind while holding a sword.

1301341.text: Your hands are so cold. Let me warm you up.

1301342.text: My sword skill is inherited from my mother's Meteor Slash.

1301343.text: I always pay a debt of gratitude so please let me use my sword to help you.

1301344.text: It's been so long since I last saw a starry sky. I miss it so much. Oh, let's hike to the hill there and enjoy the beautiful sky together!

1301345.text: To think and to feel on your own is not an easy task.

1301347.text: It shall be as you command.

1301349.text: I'm Akasha. This is such a wonderful place... So, who are you?

1301350.text: With you by my side, I can keep fighting.

1301351.text: I've already saved the world once with my sword, and I can do it again.

1301353.text: Make a wish on a shooting star?

1301354.text: The light of shooting stars shall protect me.

1301355.text: I never draw my sword easily. That's where the meaning of my sword lies.

1301356.text: The stars in the night sky look so tiny. The same is true of humans throughout history, isn't it?

1301359.text: I'm Akasha. If you like, I can teach you swordsmanship.

1301363.text: The power resting in the stars...

1301365.text: This is the guidance of the sword!

1301366.text: The profoundness of swordsmanship is beyond imagination... I'm barely scratching the surface.

1301367.text: There's still a long way to go...

1301373.text: Oh! I've never told you what I like, but you know it...

1301374.text: Letting your guard down can be very dangerous.

1301375.text: Don't look at me like that, giving me goosebumps.

1301376.text: Have you found my target? Where?

1301377.text: Waiting for someone here is so tedious.

1301378.text: You wanna try my cooking? Sorry, I don't know how to cook.

1301379.text: I'm not sure how I feel about you. It's something I have never felt before, something special.

1301380.text: What do you want from me?

1301385.text: Are you the one that's been calling me?

1301387.text: Even during the quest, resting is necessary.

1301389.text: You know the darkness as your enemy, but I know it as a friend.

1301390.text: Did you scent it out? It's the smell of blood diffusing in the dark night.

1301394.text: After we've located the target, leave the rest to me. Only one of us will live.

1301397.text: Death is a kind of relief too...

1301400.text: Time to give it all back...

1301403.text: Death is also a kind of salvation.

1301407.text: A decent gift should be prepared with sincerity.

1301408.text: I will take this with gratitude. It's quite a luxury for me.

1301409.text: Thou can rely on me whenever thou feelest insecure.

1301412.text: I feel warmth when I'm with thee.

1301413.text: If something is keeping thee awake, how about sharing it with me?

1301414.text: I have spent a long time in pursuit of magic, but now I only wish to live for thee. Can thou... stay with me from now on?

1301415.text: Art thou in awe of me?

1301417.text: It's okay to undertake some work.

1301419.text: If thou longest to freeze the world, then it won't hurt to join thee.

1301422.text: Now, I can assist thee better.

1301424.text: I also thought about when the Ice Age would finally end.

1301425.text: Do not try to provoke me, for that the greatest magic always comes with horror.

1301426.text: I have sworn to cover this world with an endless blizzard.

1301429.text: I am the fabled Frost Witch. Art thou the one that has been calling me?

1301436.text: This world is covered by snow.

1301441.text: The blood of the sword that flows in my body will ascend me to a higher place.

1301443.text: Wow! Thanks for giving me this!

1301444.text: I'd rather practice my swordsmanship instead of letting my mind drift.

1301445.text: Is that a greeting to me?

1301446.text: You want to learn swordsmanship? It won't be like a walk in the park.

1301447.text: Only by avoiding attacks and escaping on the verge of death can you truly surpass your limits.

1301448.text: Death happens. So, for you, I will fight till the very end.

1301449.text: Someday, you will need to overcome yourself to find the right path. So, before that, strive to become stronger.

1301450.text: A romantic relationship that is bound to fail is even sadder.

1301453.text: Is it time to rest already?

1301454.text: The essence of my being is to fight with the sword in my hand.

1301459.text: Are you satisfied already? My swordsmanship has more to offer.

1301460.text: This is the warm-up before training.

1301464.text: I'm Octavia. I will keep training to hone more powerful skills with my sword!

1301471.text: Born for the sword, born to slay.

1301475.text: I am much more than this!

1301477.text: Is this for me? Thank you.

1301478.text: This is... I'm so happy... but for some reason I just want to cry.

1301481.text: I can be lost sometimes too, not knowing what to do for fun the next day...

1301483.text: What can I do about you? Follow my guidance.

1301484.text: Haha, you really know what I like. No wonder you are the first human I appreciate.

1301486.text: You... are keeping something from me...

1301488.text: Is it time to rest already?

1301489.text: It's been so long since I last saw a human being, about... five hundred years?

1301490.text: Let me handle it. You have nothing to worry about.

1301492.text: I'm also tired. Could use a rest.

1301493.text: You are a sweet talker. I like you.

1301494.text: You have been staring at my tail. Is there a problem?

1301495.text: I'm not as brutal as people say. I guess my kind could exist only in legends.

1301496.text: What's your plan after our journey together?

1301501.text: I'm looking forward to this journey.

1301506.text: Haha... Now you have seen the might of dragons!

1301507.text: I can't pull out all the stops...

1301510.text: The pain has lessened. I can move around easier now.

1301513.text: Um, can I take this? Thank you, I'm full of joy now. Is this really for me? I'll cherish it!

1301515.text: My smile looks awkward? Sorry, I'm not used to this yet.

1301516.text: This place is surrounded by warm air.

1301517.text: I have an indescribable feeling when I'm with you. But I don't dislike it.

1301518.text: Are you giving me new clothes? Oh, thank you. Did you handpick them for me?

1301519.text: You are still awake? Me too. My heart beats so fast when I think about you, which makes it even harder to fall asleep.

1301520.text: Why keep staring at me? How can I help you?

1301521.text: Working hard is also a talent in some way. It's a shame that my body can't even manage that.

1301522.text: New assignment? I'll take care of it carefully.

1301523.text: Are you going to rest too? Well, resting is very important.

1301524.text: Hey, do you need my strength? For you, I'll spare no effort.

1301525.text: I'll fight with all I have, and I'm counting on you as my backup!

1301526.text: Are you going out? Take me with you!

1301527.text: Working for a long time really puts stress on our bodies.

1301529.text: The power inside me? Well, I don't know for sure. Sometimes it scares me.

1301531.text: I don't think my future is bright.

1301532.text: (A poker face wearing a faint smile.)

1301534.text: My name? It's Tama. My mother gave it to me.

1301540.text: I've not given up just yet...

1301541.text: Hard as it is, I will not escape.

1301544.text: Thank you for helping me grow stronger.

1301545.text: As a Miko, I have to keep improving my willpower.

1301546.text: I'm one step closer to the road that the god laid out for me.

1301548.text: Ah, you must have sought advice from a god to find out my preferences, right?

1301549.text: Still mind-wandering? We have got so many things to do...

1301550.text: Oh, I nearly took you as a monster. Sorry.

1301551.text: Are you curious about the daily routine of a Miko? Well, it usually starts with training.

1301552.text: Wait, why do you want to pray all of a sudden? Did you do something bad behind my back?

1301553.text: Why do I fight the monsters? I don't have any ready answers. Maybe it's the destiny of a Miko. And... with you by my side, I feel safer.

1301554.text: Curious about my job? Well, what comes first is to cleanse evil and champion justice. To be more specific, it's about getting rid of the distractions in your mind and paying all your attention to me.

1301555.text: This is a magical place, probably the so-called land of fate.

1301556.text: It must be the god who guided me to you.

1301559.text: I'll hunt the evils down to the end of the world.

1301560.text: The oracle has instructed me to follow you.

1301561.text: It's my destiny to follow you.

1301563.text: The voice in my head is the instruction of the god.

1301564.text: The voice from a previous life keeps echoing in this one.

1301565.text: The training to become a Miko? I'm sorry. It's a secret that I can't tell.

1301566.text: "How many rivers do I have to cross before reaching the nation where loneliness doesn't exist? I continue my journey today, keep searching for it." This is a song that has been passed down for generations.

1301569.text: Mikoto will follow the god's instructions. Wherever you go, I'll follow.

1301571.text: In the name of cleansing evil and championing justice...

1301575.text: The destiny of a Miko is not fulfilled yet.

1301579.text: I'll work hard to improve my strength!

1301580.text: I've grown a bit but I can get even stronger!

1301581.text: This new power will become the foundation of my revenge.

1301583.text: Oh, I've been longing for this for so long. Thank you.

1301584.text: You haven't found your true calling. That's why you are here wandering off.

1301585.text: Why did you come to me? You seem not to be an evil person.

1301586.text: I'm not interested in someone so weak.

1301587.text: My father, my mother... I have been dreaming about them lately...

1301588.text: Before meeting you, revenge was likely the only thing that kept me alive...

1301589.text: I will try my best to protect you. I once lost someone important... and I don't want to see it happen again.

1301590.text: It seems that I get deceived a lot...

1301591.text: I will not break my vows.

1301592.text: Maybe I can find some information about the target.

1301593.text: I don't really need to rest.

1301594.text: To live is to seek revenge.

1301595.text: This is my path towards revenge.

1301597.text: Resting is not the same as slacking off.

1301598.text: It's already late. Get some rest.

1301599.text: You have some secrets that cannot tell? Everyone does. It's okay. I won't pry into them.

1301600.text: Wielding force on those less fortunate is something that I will not tolerate!

1301601.text: What's my next step after the revenge? Sorry, I have never thought about that.

1301604.text: My name is strange? It's actually the name of my sword. I will not use that name again until my revenge is complete, for it bears too many painful memories.

1301614.text: My hard work has finally paid off.

1301615.text: This level of pain is far from enough...

1301616.text: I have to go through more sufferings to acquire new powers.

1301618.text: I shall never forget the joy you brought me.

1301619.text: The abyss beckons you, responding to your desire.

1301620.text: Are you talking to me? But you don't give off any delicious aroma...

1301621.text: Are you yearning for powers too? Then sacrifice your soul to the dark abyss.

1301622.text: I was lost before, but that's just an excuse for weakness. Enjoy the happiness after obtaining the power of darkness.

1301623.text: To revel in decadence or come to an end now, I'm only left with one of these.

1301624.text: They all see me as the evil incarnation but that's just how they try to deny the hunger buried deep inside their souls. I just want you to be different from them, to enjoy this source of happiness with me.

1301625.text: This is a great place for the ritual.

1301626.text: I'm looking for the right offering.

1301629.text: Can you also feel this supreme joy?

1301631.text: My power is strong enough to fight against humans.

1301632.text: The whole point of rest is to get ready for the next revelry...

1301634.text: Are you afraid of losing hope? Actually, desperation is the source of happiness.

1301635.text: Oh... This joy is so intoxicating.

1301636.text: How enviable it is to entrust your body to the darkness.

1301639.text: As long as I can serve the darkness from the abyss, I don't mind being called a fiend.

1301642.text: I shall give you my soul...

1301646.text: Lament? You have not suffered enough...

1301647.text: I shall never forget this pain.

1301649.text: I can see the next card clearly now...

1301650.text: I shall make myself stronger before taking on more risks.

1301653.text: Your hunch is quite accurate. I appreciate this. Thank you.

1301654.text: Are you preparing for the next round? No need. Just go with your gut.

1301655.text: Are you trying to deceive me?

1301656.text: I am deeply drawn by the excitement of adventures.

1301658.text: You have so little in your hands. That's why I can see through you. Do you want to know the secret of victory?

1301659.text: You like betting too, right? Then bet with me. Let's see who will be more into this relationship.

1301660.text: I can smell money around here too.

1301661.text: The moment you agreed to bet with me, you've already lost.

1301662.text: Do you fancy a new adventure?

1301664.text: I can feel the lure of money from you...

1301665.text: My luck will not fail you.

1301666.text: You want to start a new round now?

1301667.text: I could use some rest after a winning streak.

1301668.text: Unwilling to give up? But this round has been over.

1301669.text: The moment you doubt your instincts and hesitate, you have already lost.

1301670.text: Let me have a guess at what you are thinking about...

1301671.text: Danger? No, I see it as happiness. You see, victories always come with all sorts of risks.

1301673.text: Are you tired of this life?

1301674.text: People believe that I have been practicing the art of deception. That's just their excuse for failure. I simply believe in my instincts and have never doubted them, not even once.

1301676.text: Who will be the winner of this round?

1301680.text: Wandering at the edge of failure...

1301682.text: Well that was a bit of a miscalculation.

1301685.text: I have to keep training myself to defend justice.

1301688.text: It turns out that we have a connection. Thank you.

1301689.text: There are still many injustices awaiting judgment.

1301690.text: You seem to be looking for something?

1301691.text: It is an act of evil to use one's force recklessly!

1301699.text: Datheios, the enforcer, here to serve as your right hand.

1301703.text: Giving up beliefs is more hurtful than death itself.

1301726.text: That feels good. Let's fight side by side next time!

1301735.text: Fighting by your side is my honor!

1301737.text: To rest is to prepare for the combat ahead.

1301740.text: Only by regular daily exercise can one perform well on the battlefield.

1301751.text: Get out of my sight if you want to live!

1301799.text: A young girl standing under the quiet tree on a beautiful summer night with no wind blowing... I used to dream of a life like that. But now, I think my time with you is the most irreplaceable treasure.

1301800.text: I'm trying to aim at the target, don't disturb me.

1301801.text: Can you feel the wind caressing your face?

1301802.text: Fly with the wind, my arrows!

1301804.text: In the name of my father, I shall shoot the arrow of my vows into the sky.

1301818.text: May the wind aid my arrow...

1301821.text: One shot of my arrow will be more than enough.

1301824.text: This is the path revealed in the prophecy.

1301832.text: I can't see your fate, for you are no ordinary person.

1301833.text: You who carry an unusual destiny, do not be bound by your mindset.

1301834.text: Your fate is so peculiar and intricate that I cannot read it. It is like countless strings of fate tangled together. But one of the strings must be tangled with mine.

1301835.text: This is the feeling that I miss so much...

1301836.text: I'm not a god, thus I can not make people's wishes come true.

1301837.text: What do you want to ask?

1301838.text: Have you seen through it all? Then there's no need to continue.

1301840.text: The world needs my guidance to go on...

1301842.text: A warm strength was imbued into my body.

1301844.text: Only after seeing the cruelty of destiny will we learn to cherish its beauty.

1301845.text: Even the one, having seen through destiny, cannot necessarily escape everything.

1301846.text: Irminsul, my hometown, is now heading for destruction.

1301849.text: If you have doubts about your destiny, I can perform divination for you but do not expect me to change it. Maybe only the god can manage that...

1301855.text: The wheel of destiny has not stopped turning yet.

1301857.text: Even I can not see through it...

1301860.text: Oh! (o) That's how you make a strawberry cake!

Is it already time to go back? There are still many pancakes left...
Wha...Wait! Wait for me!

1301881.text: Slacking off? I'm not! It's Afallen who has been slacking off. I have been making delicious cakes for everyone!

1301884.text: I'm Parfait. I will become the greatest pastry chef in this world.

1301887.text: This is your punishment but just a tiny one!

1301890.text: I have more desserts to make!

1301909.text: I am the dominator of the forest.

1301915.text: When your smell is released, your prey can more easily find you, and you might no longer be the hunter but rather the hunted.

1301916.text: No creature can disobey the laws of nature.

1301919.text: No prey can escape from my sharpened claws. We can have a try if you don't believe me. Let's start another round of hunting!

1301926.text: I'm way out of your league.

1302082.text: I have fully understood your needs.

1302125.text: ... Are you inviting me to have a cup of tea?

1302129.text: Look! My doll can do however small motions smoothly. It's my best work yet!

1302131.text: The two of us can take down anything!

1302137.text: Still failed, even when there's two of us...

1302139.text: You haven't seen what I'm really capable of...

1302140.text: This is the result of my research!

1302146.text: I am the only rule of this world. Now bow and obey me.

1302148.text: It's a lack of etiquette to make a racket. Just report to me if something happens.

1302149.text: You are such an interesting person. I like you a lot. Raise your head and hold me.

1302151.text: This place is full of unpleasantness. I don't like it.

1302164.text: Submit to me, offer all that you have to become mine.

1302172.text: This can't be the end for me. I have to stand firm.

1302176.text: Where doeth the compass of destiny point?

1302182.text: No harm in inviting thou unto this feast of darkness.

1302185.text: Time flies, so does the memory of lost ones.

1302187.text: Do ye knowest the taboo on entering paradise?

1302189.text: Be grateful to mine chanting for ye, fragile mortals.

1302190.text: Encountering thee is the only truth in this endless mirage.

1302191.text: Abandon all hope, ye who enter.

1302192.text: The Spring of Oblivion shall ease the pain within your souls!

1302193.text: Mind not about what they say. Just wipe your tears and cross the Lethe.

1302194.text: The red jade thou granted me shall lead to an ultimate land.

1302195.text: I have never come down into the abyss. Those who did would have their souls chained for eternity.

1302196.text: The sin of contaminating the Lethe is unforgivable. You unworthy servants shall cometh into Hell eventually.

1302199.text: Cross the Lethe and fall into the Purgatory to atone for thy sins. This is thy only choice.

1302201.text: Those who go astray, I shall sing for thee.

1302206.text: Though the fire of life burns out, I shall play this rhapsody and bring all of you unto the Lethe.

1302209.text: Becoming stronger is always a reward in itself!

1302210.text: It is important to be well prepared.

1302213.text: Even after thousands of years, I still enjoy it.

1302215.text: You are not a resident of Fomoire Island, are you?

1302216.text: Do you fancy immortality? Actually it comes with many inconveniences.

1302217.text: You want to know my age? Well, it does no harm to tell you...

1302218.text: Is being immortal boring? Of course not! I guard this land daily and with each passing day, I encounter amazing new experiences.

1302219.text: It is the first time that I have seen someone like you. Oh? It's because you are interesting. Can you stay by my side for the upcoming ages?

1302220.text: Do you want to learn how to use magic to change your appearance?

1302221.text: This place is as exciting as my hometown.

1302224.text: Life, life starts from the darkness; death, death ends in the Liminal Field.

1302228.text: Are you bothered by my wings? They have been a part of me since birth.

1302241.text: Stream is clean because of its source. Immortality can be achieved only by peaceful souls.

1302242.text: Even an immortal body has its limit?

1302243.text: I shall equally grant you finality...

1302246.text: Both my body and my will need to grow stronger!

1302291.text: The desire to protect is the source of all my power.

1302293.text: Human, you can always count on me.

1302298.text: Just like me, my child has inherited the noblest bloodline amongst elves.

1302299.text: Why have I fallen into a long sleep? The only thing I can tell you is that safeguarding this land is the duty of a High Elf.

1302300.text: These hollow words are meaningless. I have seen enough hypocrisy in this world.

1302301.text: Being in leadership always means loneliness. Flora must have realized that. That's why she resists her destiny to become the guardian of the forest.

1302304.text: I have sensed the disturbance of magic during my long slumber. Disasters will fall on this land very soon. I shall guard this land and my people with all my might.

1302311.text: What a joke! How dare you to stand against a High Elf?

1302317.text: Is this a gift for me? But my tastes are always changing.

1302318.text: You truly are the beloved one by the Aura of Night. We are getting along pretty well.

1302319.text: If your mind drifts a little further, the night will be over!

1302320.text: You are walking all by yourself this late at night?

1302321.text: I have anemia. Can you offer some help?

1302323.text: Scarlet Moon will respond to all your needs.

1302324.text: The moon is like a dazzling queen in the night sky and that's what I long to be. And... can you be my night sky?

1302325.text: Oh, the people here all look delicious!

1302326.text: Ah, this is a great place for my Nocturnal Garden!

1302327.text: Oh~ It seems you need my help?

1302328.text: Ah, the sun is rising! Time for bed!

1302329.text: Aura of Night... Are you one of my kind?

1302330.text: Are we going to search for new toys?

1302331.text: I must rid myself of this bitter taste. Is there anything tasty here?

1302332.text: I feel so hungry... Oh, is this for replenishing my energy?

1302333.text: All you will know is being crazy for me, nothing else.

1302334.text: The beauty of the unreachable things... Perhaps that's why humans are always after those so-called dreams.

1302335.text: I can smell a sweet scent coming from the dark night.

1302336.text: It seems that your heart can not be easily enchanted. Haha! That's even better because it's more fun that way.

1302339.text: Human or other creatures, all shall be my servants! Don't even try to escape. Fall for me forever! Hahaha...

1302341.text: A little kid sneaking into this dark night~~

1302342.text: The scent of the dark night~~~

1302345.text: I'm immortal in this dark night!

1302346.text: Too weak. Isn't worth my time at all...

1302347.text: Ah, the sun is coming up! Let's retreat now!

1302349.text: Ah, don't expect too much of me. I hate bothersome matters!

1302350.text: All creatures can grow and I'm no exception.

1302351.text: Getting stronger also means getting more work, am I right?

1302353.text: Is this a reward for my hard work?

1302355.text: You are... alive. Why are you here?

1302356.text: Don't rush me... I don't want to work just yet.

1302357.text: Do I feel cold? Of course! The River of the Underworld is the dampest place in the world.

1302358.text: It would be wonderful if every day is the day off! We can play all day and every day together!

1302359.text: This job as a Deliverer is so irritating. Would you take care of me if I quit this job?

1302360.text: This is what a workplace should be like.

1302361.text: When can I take a rest!

1302365.text: A new soul needs to be delivered?

1302366.text: If the work is not too tiring, I guess I can handle it.

1302367.text: Rest is way more important than work.

1302368.text: Painfulness, wailing... I have seen the final moments of all sorts of souls by the River of the Underworld.

1302369.text: Windy? Rainy? The weather in the Underworld never changes. You have to go to work on time every day.

1302370.text: I never knew I'd be so busy as a soul deliverer.

1302371.text: Are you busy as well? It seems you're exhausted.

1302374.text: I am Kyphon, serving as a Deliverer. My mission is to guide the souls from the River of the Underworld to the afterlife.

1302381.text: Oh? A new soul? Ah, never mind. I'll leave it to the others.

1302382.text: Is there no way to get out of this cycle of fate?

1302383.text: Return to the River of the Underworld...

1302384.text: The Power of Void is increasing...

1302386.text: I never slacked a day for millennia.

1302387.text: Are you trying to flatter me?

1302388.text: It's such a rare gift. Thank you.

1302389.text: I'm going to bed now. Let's continue the work tomorrow. Good night.

1302390.text: Are you an intruder, too? Don't even try to resist.

1302391.text: A lot of people covet the power of the Space of Void. The situation is dangerous.

1302392.text: Are you curious about the views inside the Space of Void too?

1302393.text: After spending millennia in the Space of Void, loneliness is the most hateful thing to me and my people.

1302394.text: My people have been staying in the Space of Void for millennia, dealing with intruders. It is such a heavy burden to carry alone for me. But your company may give me the power to go on and protect the land and people I loved most.

1302395.text: Oh, this place is totally different from where I lived before.

1302396.text: I'm different from what you had expected? You thought I might be a fragile girl?

1302397.text: What's up? I'm quite busy right now.

1302399.text: Why can you step into the Space of Void?

1302400.text: The Coffin of Voidness won't be broken that easily!

1302402.text: Take a rest when you are feeling ill.

1302403.text: Thank you for telling me what's happening outside. It's good to know what's going on out there!

1302404.text: Is it boring guarding the Space of Void? I thought about that question sometimes. But that's just our duty. Compared with woolgathering, fulfilling our duty has more priority.

1302405.text: Time to wake up! You should maintain a good living habit, which I have stuck to for millennia!

1302406.text: Don't worry about the combat. I'll protect you!

1302409.text: Anyone who attempts to cross the Coffin of Voidness into the Space of Void will be my enemy. It is the duty that our kind has carried on for millennia. That's all I need to know.

1302413.text: In the name of the Void Clan!

1302416.text: I shall equally shower every intruder with death.

1302417.text: The intruders are too powerful... Requesting for reinforcements...

1302420.text: I have always had a hunch about this...

1302421.text: I can see it... A future where everyone is living happily...

1302423.text: Wow! It's for me! Thank you!

1302424.text: What's wrong? Why did you just stop talking?

1302425.text: Don't worry, I won't hurt you. Come, take a seat.

1302426.text: Books are unbiased. That's why I enjoy reading alone in tranquility.

1302427.text: Flowing in my veins is the blood of darkness...

1302428.text: Half human, half the Night Clan. That doesn't bother me, anyway. After all, both sides belong to the real me.

1302429.text: I didn't even notice when we became so close. But there are still times that I can't fully understand your feelings. So... can I still look forward to our future?

1302430.text: The outside world is so big!

1302431.text: I am still not accepted by the others, am I?

1302432.text: What can I do for you?

1302433.text: I'm glad that I can help!

1302434.text: Do you need treatment? No worries, I'll help you.

1302436.text: Are we going out? With someone like me?

1302438.text: "Descend to me, fair evening star. Glide down upon a beam, enter my dwelling and my mind, as o'er my life you gleam!" This is my favorite verse!

1302439.text: What a lovely poem... You like that too?

1302440.text: Mother? That's a topic from long ago... After all these years, whenever I think of her, my tears would just run down...

1302441.text: Do I want to go back to human society? Well, I had that fantasy when I was young... But that would always be a fantasy.

1302444.text: I'm Tuonel. You can consider me as a Healer... Don't worry, I'll try my best to treat you!

1302446.text: If only no one would get hurt...

1302451.text: Just as the books say, evil will always be defeated, right?

1302452.text: You came to ask for my help but the result turns out to be... Sorry...

1302455.text: Look! I am different from before!

1302462.text: No one on Fomoire Island is willing to play with me. But you are different.

1302463.text: We are playing together tomorrow, too? Great!

1302464.text: I'm so happy. Being with you is never boring.

1302466.text: You want to visit Lady Raphan with me?

1302467.text: What are we going to play?

1302469.text: I am Yothaya. Wanna play with me?

1302471.text: I want to go on adventures too!

1302472.text: That was a long time, are you tired?

1302473.text: This shining stone is so beautiful. Can I have it?

1302474.text: Are you going to the forest? I love picking mushrooms. That's fun!

1302475.text: Did you fell? Don't worry, I'll dress the wound for you!

1302479.text: Hush... Keep your voice down. I just sneaked out from a boring ritual.

1302481.text: Are we going to play together?

1302489.text: The sunlight is even more dazzling...

1302490.text: If I work hard, mommy will praise me.

1302491.text: That's one step closer to my dream!

1302493.text: This is for me? That's so fantastic!

1302494.text: Stop dillydallying! The sun is going down!

1302495.text: Are you here to take a walk along the beach, too?

1302496.text: What a lovely song! Can you sing another one for me?

1302497.text: You don't want to get tanned? You can borrow my umbrella.

1302498.text: You can't sleep? Don't worry, I'll be here for you.

1302499.text: My dream? Hmm... it's to become a bride.

1302500.text: There is nothing more interesting than walking along the beach!

1302501.text: Was that a shooting star? I heard it can make any wish come true!

1302502.text: What's wrong? Is there anything you wanna ask me?

1302503.text: Rest is necessary when you are tired.

1302504.text: Who are you? Mommy said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1302505.text: How about taking a walk together?

1302506.text: You wanna ask me out? Okay, I can only stay outside for a little while so we can't go too far.

1302508.text: Mommy said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1302509.text: A shooting star flying across the sky is such a rare sight!

1302510.text: You wanna hear me sing? Fine... I'll sing for you!

1302511.text: My mom told me that one should be polite, not being a bother to others.

1302514.text: Erm... I have never been to the outside world. Mom said that there are many bad people out there... You wanna hang out with me? Really? Then we can play for a little while!

1302516.text: Mom will be worried if I don't go back home soon!

1302517.text: Listen! That's the sound of waves!

1302518.text: I'll wish upon the shooting stars!

1302520.text: My wish is not yet fulfilled!

1302521.text: Do you want to take a walk on the beach with me? The breeze is so comforting.

1302525.text: Should work harder when in good conditions.

1302528.text: This is amazing! I can feel my inspiration is overflowing.

1302529.text: Is your mind occupied? By a new ballade?

1302530.text: What do you need from this humble bard?

1302531.text: Afallen? She just wanna slack off. I'm nothing like her. I'm a bard who enjoys wandering.

1302532.text: The ancient ballads that used to spread among the Realm are as old as time itself. My inner soul as a bard has no tolerance for that kind of stuff.

1302533.text: For generations, my ancestors have served in the Realm. So was I. But that job as a gatekeeper was so boring that I just can't waste my passion and creativity there.

1302534.text: Oh, the soul of a bard inside me! I can feel your enthusiasm and hear you calling me. Let's create more miraculous masterpieces.

1302535.text: Unlike the Realm, this place is full of exciting materials.

1302536.text: Are you giving up already? Creating something new cannot be completed simply by passion alone.

1302538.text: What do you want me to do?

1302539.text: I'm Garditis, a bard from the Realm. Will you bring me some new inspiration?

1302540.text: Do you want me to sing for you?

1302541.text: Are we out for some new materials?

1302542.text: Take a break before we move to the next spot.

1302543.text: Only a higher goal can bring out a better you.

1302544.text: I'd rather go find a new hobby than kill time here.

1302545.text: Afallen is still a child at her playful age. It's normal for her to slack off every now and then.

1302546.text: Just listen sometimes late at night when restless waves grow sad and somber. And from the seabed out of sight, they strew the shore with bits of amber.

1302548.text: Is this the best you can do?

1302549.text: Ah, the soul of a bard, please grant me strength!

1302551.text: You are merely a wrong note in the concerto.

1302555.text: The symbol of rest hasn't turned up yet.

1302556.text: You will all become notes in my music.

1302557.text: There is no point in continuing a piece that has already been interrupted.

1302559.text: I want more targets! More targets!

1302560.text: We'll earn the recognition of the Sanctuary after this, right?

1302561.text: Inn: I have become more powerful!   Lou: Yes! Lou feels the same!

1302562.text: Is it a gift for us?

1302563.text: Inn: Oh, Inn likes this very much!   Lou: Yes!  Lou feels the same.

1302565.text: You seem to be in a daze. What are you thinking?

1302566.text: Are you going to read us a fairytale? Alright.

1302567.text: What's on this paper? Oh, it's an assignment given by the Sanctuary. The name of our next target is written on it.

1302568.text: Inn: Is the world outside any fun? Lou: Take us out for some fun!

1302569.text: You are not the same as the others. You are gentle to Inn and Lou. So, could we be together from now on?

1302570.text: The Ruler has new orders for us!

1302574.text: Please give us a new order! We will wipe out any targets for you.

1302575.text: A new target is added to the list?

1302576.text: We were sent by the Ruler to assist you. Please allow us to come along with you.

1302578.text: Inn: Are there only bad guys in the world outside?   Lou: All we know is that the names on the list belong to bad people!

1302579.text: The Ruler's order can never be wrong. All targets shall be eliminated.

1302580.text: Inn: You brought us new toys?   Lou: Wow! Awesome!

1302581.text: Inn: Haven't received any new order.   Lou: Then let's go have some fun!

1302583.text: Huh? That must be a hoax...

1302584.text: Do you want to play together? But you'll have to wait for us to finish our sacred work!

1302586.text: Do we have a new target?

1302592.text: We have been spotted? Maybe next time.

1302594.text: That's a good thing to learn.

1302595.text: For you, I'll keep improving myself.

1302598.text: Your gift has pleased both the god and me.

1302599.text: It is natural for a peasant to be idle.

1302600.text: I don't know you, but I appreciate how genial you are.

1302601.text: You and the people back home are all my subjects. It's my duty to help you.

1302602.text: You are different from the others. They are either afraid of me or eager to please me.

1302603.text: You want to comb my hair? You really do know what I like...

1302604.text: My heart floats gracefully with the wind, but the person whom I love is deaf to my grief.

1302605.text: This spot is giving off an eerie aura. But fear not, for I will not let evil spirits run free.

1302606.text: The view here is so beautiful. It inspires me to dance with all my heart.

1302607.text: For my people, I shall set off willingly.

1302608.text: My performance is not yet finished...

1302609.text: What is the outside world look like? I have a keen interest in it.

1302610.text: Just follow my lead. This is also the will of the god.

1302611.text: Is this what the outside world looks like?

1302612.text: You should rest after some hard work.

1302613.text: Looking daggers beyond the heavens, I see the snow peaks of a high mountain shone by the morning sun.

1302614.text: The tales say that my hometown is where the sun rises.

1302615.text: No need for regrets. Your future is full of possibilities.

1302616.text: 'Victory will shine upon you.' God has answered my call.

1302619.text: My hometown rests on the horizon, thousands of miles away. I am the Princess of the Sun, the god's heir in the mortal world.

1302621.text: I got my power from heaven and shall pass it down to humans.

1302626.text: All abominations shall vanquish at sunrise.

1302627.text: Even the beautiful moon would quietly slip away.

1302629.text: My shield can now protect more people!

1302631.text: I will become stronger to fulfill my mission!

1302633.text: It's my greatest honor to accept such a gift.

1302634.text: You might as well go to the training ground to improve yourself instead of wasting time here.

1302635.text: You don't look like a bad guy, but I still can't let you pass that easily.

1302636.text: The battlefield is only for those who are truly ready to fight.

1302637.text: Daily training is for better performance on the battlefield. What you have done is far from enough!

1302638.text: My power alone is insufficient. That's why I need your help.

1302639.text: It's my honor to fight with you. I wish one day I could go to your world and see how you live there.

1302640.text: Lack of exercise can lead to slow movements.

1302641.text: I swear by the Shield of Defending that I'll be more active in the next fight!

1302644.text: I am Avil, Guard of the Royal Capital. I swear to defend the glory of the crown of Belgica!

1302645.text: My shield hardens for the people of Belgica!

1302647.text: On the battlefield, keep monitoring yourself. No need to rush.

1302648.text: Feel free to challenge me if you think you're good enough!

1302649.text: I'll do whatever it takes to win gloriously... If you ask me to lose either my victory or my dignity, I'll choose to lose my life.

1302651.text: A true hero, even in a crisis, never forgets the mission.

1302654.text: Avil, by the order from the crown, is here to protect the capital of Belgica. All perpetrators will be punished by law.

1302656.text: No retreat! For the glory of Belgica!

1302658.text: You're not gonna break through my defense!

1302661.text: The glory of the crown will shine on this land again!

1302666.text: A lighter body shall help me fly higher!

1302667.text: Thank you. Gifts always make me happy!

1302668.text: Oh!!! I have always wondered when I can get one myself! Thanks!

1302669.text: What's going on? What are you staring at?

1302670.text: A stranger... You are not from Rumni, are you?

1302672.text: What are you reading? A fairy tale? Let me have a look... Oh, the story of the legendary sacred bird!

1302673.text: This is an amulet made with feathers. Take it. How was this made? Oh, don't mind that. Just know that it's quite effective.

1302674.text: You enjoy freedom too, right? It seems we are getting along quite well. Come! Let's go dancing in the clouds!

1302675.text: What a beautiful day! Let's go for a picnic!

1302676.text: You look ablush. Have you caught a fever?

1302677.text: Okay! Just leave it to me.

1302679.text: A world of diversity is more attractive. The people, the wind, the sun... everything is full of vitality.

1302680.text: I always love flying! Wanna give it a shot?

1302681.text: What's your destination? I can give you a ride.

1302682.text: My shoulders feel rather sore after flying for so long!

1302683.text: Are you trying to avoid the sun? Blinding? But I don't feel that at all...

1302684.text: What would the earth be like if seen from the sky? Wanna find out the answer yourself?

1302685.text: Hush... Don't get us caught... There's always someone in my way when I wanna go out to play.

1302686.text: Let's go enjoy the flowers in the wild! Why today? Isn't spring the time to go watch the flowers?

1302688.text: You're this close to getting on my last nerve...

1302689.text: Ah, I am Luan from Rumni. You're right, I'm the one that people often talk about... The flying phoenix.

1302691.text: Let the fire devour your souls!

1302695.text: For a phoenix, death means rebirth.

1302696.text: My passion will light up everything.

1302697.text: For Rumni, I can't fall down yet... Retreat for now.

1302698.text: Burn... until your soul turns to ashes.

1302699.text: My training is far from enough. Please train me more!

1302700.text: To master new conjurings, I need to keep strengthening my willpower.

1302701.text: I will stay loyal to my faith until the very end!

1302702.text: This is for me? Well... anyway... thank you.

1302704.text: What're you gawking at? What? Counting the stars?

1302705.text: Don't move. What are you doing here? Answer me now, or my spear will answer for you.

1302706.text: My trust is not easily earned. You need to prove yourself worthy to become my companion.

1302707.text: Are you interested in my sister? Humph, what are you plotting? Unlike me, she will not trust you that easily.

1302708.text: Seeing the smile on your face makes me smile, too.

1302709.text: If there comes one day that I can't control the blood of the Legendary Beast within me anymore, please kill me... You are the only one I can trust on this. My spear should raise only to defend my faith.

1302710.text: Have you met Lord Flare? She is proficient in all kinds of conjuring.

1302711.text: Unlike me, Miku is just way too kind...

1302712.text: Leave it to me. It's my duty.

1302714.text: I am Yui the Demonsbane Spear, the heir of the Ovate house of Olndic. Answering your call.

1302716.text: Are you going for a new training session? Please take me with you!

1302717.text: Ah, fatigue's gone and I'm feeling better now.

1302718.text: I've been pushing myself too hard, all my muscles are so sore... This feels terrible.

1302719.text: Do not attempt anything risky or I will notice immediately. After all, I am also one of the Ovates monitoring this island.

1302720.text: I can summon the Legendary Beast to enhance the agility of my body. However, it will also inevitably burden my flesh and cause days of pain.

1302721.text: Are you feeling cold? Don't worry. When the quest is done, come to Fomoire with me. There's a great hot spring on the west side of the island.

1302723.text: I just... can't bear it... anymore...

1302724.text: I am the youngest Ovate of Fomoire. Hereby I swear by my Demonsbane Spear that all invaders shall be crushed!

1302730.text: My spear... is not broken yet...

1302731.text: The Demonsbane Spear is not sharpened to slay evil but to bring peace to this world.

1302732.text: It's humiliating. A loser should just make a quick exit.

1302733.text: Fomoire will eventually enjoy its peace.

1302736.text: Ah... I saw... a different reflection in the mirror.

1302737.text: You have a gift for me? Oh, thank you.

1302738.text: This... This is for me? Can I open it?

1302741.text: Oh... we've met before... Sorry, I've been hiding from you because I'm a bit shy...

1302742.text: You... don't seem to look as scary as those intruders.

1302743.text: Do you also enjoy cooking? It's really fun to turn different ingredients into delicacies!

1302744.text: I can cook for you every day if you like gourmet dishes. But... if so, um... you can't try others' cooking.

1302748.text: It's so windy outside... I had better just go back to sleep.

1302749.text: Who are you? Nannar was sleeping inside the mirror all the time. What happened outside?

1302750.text: Eh? What do you want me to do?

1302751.text: I don't wanna go out... Can I stay here?

1302754.text: Have you met Yurugu? She's tough, unlike me...

1302755.text: Are we making new dishes today?

1302756.text: The Space of Void does not welcome outsiders...

1302759.text: I'm also a resident of the Space of Void... You're not one of us, are you? If you just came here out of curiosity, can you please leave soon?

1302767.text: I should just quietly hide in a corner after such a failure...

1302769.text: This is the reward for my genuine prayer.

1302771.text: I can act God's will better.

1302772.text: Is this for me? Thank you.

1302775.text: Are you also praying for God's forgiveness?

1302776.text: Everyone can feel God's mercy. What's wrong? Why do you look so skeptical?

1302777.text: Let us thank God for thy grace. Remember, stay pure in your heart.

1302778.text: You want to pray with me? You also heard the revelation of God, didn't you?

1302779.text: It must be God who guided you to me. My piety has finally impressed God...

1302781.text: Have you also felt God's mercy?

1302782.text: Is that another instruction from God?

1302784.text: Dear God, please guide your people. I, Isabel, the Executor, hereby pray for your grace.

1302785.text: Please give us grace, dear God.

1302786.text: Everything is for spreading the grace of God.

1302787.text: Thank you, God, for your grace.

1302788.text: I have never doubted God's instructions. Only those with evil intentions will.

1302790.text: All poor souls must have something to be hated for, right?

1302791.text: Aside from God's instructions, there is nothing, and no one shall disobey them.

1302794.text: Isabel is here, following the guidance of God. I'll pray for all evil souls. May God forgive your sins.

1302796.text: To spread the mercy of God...

1302800.text: I can't give up just yet...

1302802.text: The evil ones... Why aren't they punished...

1302805.text: Ah... more magic has been gathered...

1302808.text: You made my day. Thank you!

1302811.text: Look at the shimmer of those gems. So beautiful, aren't they?

1302812.text: Oh? You're quite erudite! You must be a respectable sorcerer just like Ms. Nasha!

1302813.text: Unlike my hometown, spring hasn't passed here! Let's go enjoy the flowers.

1302814.text: This magic gem is a gift for you. And it's a keepsake of our relationship. I... I feel incredibly safe and peaceful with your accompany. I may be clumsy, but may I stay by your side from now on?

1302815.text: Eh? Is the hat too big? But... it is a gift from Ms. Nasha...

1302816.text: I... I will try my best...

1302819.text: There are always tears streaming down my cheeks. And my heartstrings so easy to be touched by things. In my loneliness, there are always tears.

1302820.text: Can... can I really do this?

1302821.text: Going on an adventure? That sounds dangerous...

1302823.text: Why do we keep hurting each other?

1302824.text: Ms. Nasha has taught me a lot of sophisticated magic. She is a very kind teacher!

1302825.text: Hey! I made some cookies, wanna try some?

1302826.text: There hasn't been anything sad recently.

1302829.text: I am the disciple of Ms. Nasha. I may be clumsy, and I hope you don't mind that. Let's work together in the future!

1302831.text: Are you trying to hurt me?

1302836.text: I don't like fighting... Please leave now...

1302839.text: I need to work harder in order to repel all intruders.

1302840.text: This must be the guidance of the Goddess...

1302841.text: I'll fight by your side with the newly granted power!

1302843.text: Ah, not many people know what I like, thank you!

1302844.text: Get some rest if you are tired. It's quiet here. No one will bother you.

1302845.text: You are not from this forest, are you? What are you doing here?

1302846.text: There is a fine line between kindness and wickedness.

1302847.text: It's very dangerous if you get lost in the forest. Let's get out of here.

1302848.text: My feelings about you? Well, to put it rhetorically, it's like breeze blowing over my face.

1302849.text: Maybe one day, I will leave you by the order of the Goddess... But before that, please allow me to stay by your side. As long as I can...

1302850.text: How wonderful it is to see human children playing in the forest.

1302851.text: Spring is the gift of the Goddess to the earth.

1302852.text: Is this an instruction from the Goddess?

1302853.text: Have I... done a good job?

1302854.text: I can feel... you are longing for something.

1302855.text: It is an honor for us to follow the guidance of the Goddess.

1302856.text: Please allow me to go with you.

1302857.text: Ah, it feels like going back to the lively spring.

1302858.text: How old am I? Sorry, that is a question I won't answer you.

1302859.text: Exploit the forest? That's out of the question. Anyone who destroys nature will be punished.

1302860.text: I never doubted my faith. That is why I have stuck to my mission for thousands of years.

1302861.text: It is quite seldom for humans to enter the Forest of Elves, because of all those dreadful stories. Perhaps only innocent children would step into the forest for a grand adventure.

1302864.text: Mayahuel, by order of the Goddess, guards the Forest of Elves.

1302866.text: The violator of natural laws must be disciplined!

1302871.text: The Goddess honored me with the task of guarding this forest.
