1302872.text: New lives will rise from the withered trees...

1302874.text: Guarding this forest is far more difficult than anyone could imagine.

1302875.text: I can feel the magic upsurging in my body.

1302876.text: Lord Dana... Am I good enough to meet your expectations?

1302877.text: Is that for me? Ah, thanks a lot.

1302878.text: I haven't received anything to my taste in a long time. It must have been a lot of work for you to prepare this gift, right?

1302879.text: If we dawdle any longer, it will be dark outside.

1302880.text: Why are you still wandering around in the wild at such a late hour?

1302881.text: Shh... Listen, the sound of waves... That's the ocean crying.

1302882.text: You also enjoy such a tranquil night? Really? Maybe we will get along pretty well after all.

1302883.text: During Lord Dana's slumber, I have sworn to her that I will guard the Forest of Elves. My power is insufficient to fulfill this duty. And you are the only one that I can trust and rely on.

1302884.text: If there comes a day that I fall into a long sleep just like Lord Dana. Or maybe I will never wake up... Will you stay by my side? Ah, is that too much to ask for...

1302885.text: Viewed from above... the earth looks so vast.

1302886.text: This place, filled with the smells of humankind, is so different from the Forest of Elves.

1302887.text: Is this also the guidance of the night?

1302889.text: Let go of all your distracting thoughts and enjoy this beautiful night.

1302890.text: Let me open the way for you.

1302891.text: It is my duty to expel the fiends who would damage the forest.

1302893.text: Dancing? I'm not a good dancer... but Mayahuel is.

1302894.text: The moonlight poured down on the lake, soft as silk.

1302895.text: Oh, you want to know my age? Well, you just asked an unanswerable question.

1302896.text: Will I patrol the forest in the sky when it rains? Of course not, my clothes would get wet.

1302899.text: I, together with Mayahuel, serve Lord Dana. It is our duty to guard this forest.

1302901.text: For the future of the Forest of Elves...

1302905.text: My mission to protect the forest is not yet completed.

1302906.text: I will try my best to protect this forest for Lord Dana.

1302907.text: Lord Dana... Sorry that I failed to fulfill the mission...

1302908.text: All are guided by the moonlight.

1302910.text: Is this also a revelation of fate?

1302911.text: I will try my best... to make everyone around me happy.

1302913.text: Oh, this is my favorite. Thank you!

1302916.text: It is the dream that grants people hope.

1302918.text: I don't really like waiting on my own. That's why I'm here.

1302919.text: Every time we meet, I cherish it so much as it may be the last date between you and me. Every day with you means so much to me. If I'm gone one day, you will remember me, right?

1302920.text: No matter how arduous the destiny you are born with, there must be some meaning of its existence.

1302921.text: As love makes people tougher, we'd... Oh, nothing. Then the bond between family members must be the second strongest.

1302924.text: It must be my destiny to meet you...

1302925.text: I'll return to reality one day, right?

1302926.text: It's hard to search for your destiny.

1302927.text: Take a break. That can calm you down.

1302928.text: Whenever or wherever we make a wish, it will surely come true as long as we strive for it hand in hand, right?

1302929.text: Hey? Are you going to lie down here? Fine, wanna lie on my laps?

1302930.text: Even if you're lost in the dark, lost on your path forward, still you'd wake up in the morning full of hope and strength.

1302931.text: The courage to keep marching forward is an irreplaceable treasure.

1302933.text: (Doesn't like to argue with others, she uses a slight humph to express her dissatisfaction.)

1302934.text: You once chased after an impossible dream, right? So did I. Now I'm just waiting, waiting for someone I don't even know.

1302940.text: Even if this dream looks impossible...

1302941.text: I have made up my mind to have a try.

1302942.text: All my efforts are still for nothing? But I don't wanna give up...

1302943.text: For the one I've been waiting for...

1302944.text: All the hard work will pay off.

1302945.text: I'm getting closer to my ideal chevalier figure.

1302946.text: Bandara, my spear. Show me, your master, your true power!

1302947.text: Oh, you are giving this to me?

1302948.text: Hah! How do you know my favorite... Thanks anyway.

1302949.text: How much longer are you gonna sleep?

1302950.text: Stay there, don't move, or I'll pierce you with my spear.

1302951.text: You must prove yourself first if you wish to fight by my side.

1302952.text: I'll remind you again, a battlefield is an unpredictable place, and letting your guard down can lead to instant death.

1302953.text: You are different from the rest of the Chivalric Order. You understand what I want, and that's why I like you.

1302954.text: In Chilora, there is no higher honor than being a Warrior of the Chivalric Order of the Holy Church. But I'm willing to give up all this just for you. Maybe for me, this long journey ends when I found you.

1302958.text: Is that good enough for you?

1302959.text: I, Fey, hereby swear on my spear to offer my service to assist you.

1302960.text: Thank you for your trust. I swear on my spear that I won't fail you.

1302961.text: Exploration is a stage to test your skills.

1302963.text: It is an honor to die for the glory of chivalry.

1302964.text: I'll never give up my faith, even if my spear were to break.

1302965.text: The warriors of the Chivalric Order of the Holy Church are all stubborn guys. They would never give up once they've set up a goal. That includes me, of course.

1302966.text: Feeling lonely? As a warrior, you will be alone until you're dead.

1302969.text: Fey, warrior of the Chivalric Order of the Holy Church.

1302976.text: Hold on to your faith until the very end.

1302985.text: The pain of your own desire...

1302986.text: Now you know what I'm capable of!

1303063.text:
Yui is a young girl from Fomoire Island. Born in Olndic Family, she inherits the power of the Legendary Beast. 

She is one of the Six Ovates but has the lowest status among them.

1303064.text:
She has a younger twin sister.

Though she seldom mentions her sister, she seems to love her sister dearly. 

She is being quite protective of her sister. Once someone suspicious comes near, she will lift her spear without hesitation.

1303065.text:
As an Ovate, her responsibility is to guard the Island and wipe out any intruder. 

To be as powerful as other Ovates, she followed Flare, the Priestess of Irminsul, to train herself. 

When the training is done, she becomes a master in the family spearplay skills passed down through generations. Not only that, but she also became proficient in all kinds of conjuring.

1303066.text:
When in combat, she stabs at the enemy with a conjuring-converged spear 

Meanwhile, she summons the Legendary Beast, which can enhance the strength of her body.

"The Demonsbane Spear is not sharpened to slay evil, but to bring peace to this world."

1303071.text: Kind though she is, Sher doesn't like to interact with others too much. $B$$B$She's not from the Sanctuary but appreciated by the Sanctuary for her powerful magic. $B$$B$That's why as an outsider, she doesn't get rejected by others.

1303072.text: She called herself Sher. It's said she was forced to come here because of her hard fate. $B$$B$Some rumors say she is an arch-sorcerer fleeing from certain sins, while others say she is an elven princess from a decayed kingdom. $B$But there is no definite answer, as she always keeps her distance from others, keeping her past well hidden.

1303073.text:
She has stayed in the chapel of the Sanctuary for nearly a century. $B$$B$Witnesses claim that she occasionally speaks to herself in an exotic language, with no intention to be understood by others. $B$$B$She is an old acquaintance with Acheronte, who once revealed that Sher was not her real name. $B$$B$However, even the haughty ruler of the River of the Underworld uses honorifics when mentioning Sher, which shows the nobility of her origins.$B$$B$
"If't be true the one whom I behold up to finally receive the gift of heaven and cleanse the sins of divination, mine own soul may eke grise into the final chapt'r of destiny." $B$$B$ Acheronte

1303074.text: It seems she also knows Akasha, Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, and Dana, Goddess of the Lake. Both of whom are only recorded in the legend, so people speculate that Sher must have also lived for ages. According to Kyphon, Sher used to be the ruler of the Underworld prior to Acheronte. But for some reason, she left there and became the Wanderer of Fate.

1303079.text: A leading warrior in the Chivalric Order of the Holy Church, who disdains worldly entanglements and dedicates everything to the martial arts.

1303080.text:
Unlike other heavy chevaliers in the order, she never wears heavy armor due to her focus on agility and mobility. 

She always rushes into the battlefield like a gale with her magic spear in hand and uses overwhelming strength to take out all enemies in her path.

1303081.text: By order of the Holy Church, Fey led the members of the Chivalric Order to form an expedition into the Chrono Tower.

1303082.text:
The chevaliers fought bravely against the monsters but gradually fell one by one due to exhaustion, with only Fey holding out till the very last. 

In the face of waves of monsters, Fey, calm and steady, with her spear in hand, carried out her duty till the last minute.

1303087.text:
She used to be the director of the largest garden in Lunia. 

The plants in the garden piqued her interest more than humans.

1303088.text:
In the moonlit nights, the garden was silent, only Mortimer laying alone amongst the flowers. 

Entangled by the thorns, she absorbed the essence of the roses, which could be turned into her magic.

1303089.text:
When Lunia was once again in the throes of war, Princess Eulalia traveled around to help the civilians who had suffered during the war. 

Mortimer's unique healing magic was appreciated by Eulalia, and so she was invited to join Eulalia to save the injured that blanketed the war-torn land.

1303090.text:
Mortimer herself certainly enjoyed the travels, which gave her more opportunities to get close to nature and absorb the essence of flowers. 

Despite being called the "Thorny Rose" by some, most people know this mischievous child as a helpful and gentle girl and called her "Heart of Rose". 

Together with Eulalia, she is seen as a gift from God to the land of Lunia.

1303095.text:
As the captain of the Royal Guard of Belgica, Avil was referred to as the "Iron Wall". 

He was responsible for maintaining the security of Belgica.

1303096.text:
Though loyal to the royal court of Belgica, he utterly detested the ostentatious lifestyle of those aristocrats. 

He was strict with his men and himself in discipline and bent on restoring the former glory of the royal court.

1303097.text:
He wouldn't tolerate anyone who broke the rule, especially those violating the law. 

Whether the troublemakers were peasants or nobles, he showed no mercy and treated them equally without discrimination.

1303098.text:
He once served as the vanguard captain during the invasion of the Kingdom of Celtica. And he was court-martialed for his refusal to carry out an order to burn a village. 

Instead of being convicted, his integrity won him the appreciation of the royal family. 

Avil was then transferred away from the front line to serve as the captain of the Royal Guard.

1303099.text: I want to be as powerful as my sister!

1303100.text: My spear can still gather more magic.

1303101.text: Sister, I'm better now than before, right?

1303102.text: Is this for me? But I haven't done anything to deserve this...

1303103.text: Oh, you prepared a gift just for me? That's so sweet! Can I open it?

1303105.text: A new friend... How can I help?

1303106.text: Are you alright? You look like you are about to burst into tears.

1303107.text: Oh, I'm not familiar with things around here. It would be great if you could offer help. Where are we going next? I'm looking forward to it.

1303108.text: Oh, you seem to have caught a cold. Don't worry, I have medicine. I'll make you some porridge later. Hey, don't just stand there, lie down and get some rest.

1303109.text: You chose me over my sister? I'm so happy... Sorry... my tears just... I have always been taking my sister as a role model and wishing to be like her... I just can't believe you've chosen me... (Sobs) Thank you...

1303110.text: Controlling magic is a very difficult skill to master.

1303111.text: I am still in training, so I just can't use conjuring very well.

1303112.text: Is this a new training exercise?

1303113.text: Thank you, I've learned a lot.

1303114.text: Unlike my talented sister, I still need to work very hard. Please guide me!

1303115.text: For Fomoire, Miku will work and train harder.

1303116.text: Going for an adventure? May I join you?

1303118.text: My spear carries and delivers the will of its master.

1303119.text: It must be very hard to work as an Ovate. I will train harder to become a capable assistant for my sister!

1303120.text: Legendary Beasts wielding incredible power are also part of our family, but they are not easy to control.

1303121.text: What a cute hairpin! Is this for me? Thank you! I always ask my sister where I can buy one like this, but she never told me.

1303124.text: Miku wants to be a capable Ovate as my sister!

1303126.text: Starting a battle is always the last resort...

1303128.text: Sis, I will get more powerful!

1303131.text: I can safeguard Fomoire just like my sister.

1303132.text: Still... I'm not as capable as my sister...

1303134.text: The aroma of roses is getting stronger.

1303135.text: I'm still pretty delicate and fragile, don't you think?

1303136.text: A rose striving to bloom awaits the nourishment of love.

1303138.text: You really know what I like. You haven't given gifts like this to others, have you?

1303139.text: Are you lost? Why do you keep circling around?

1303140.text: This is my garden. Strangers are not allowed here.

1303141.text: The forest is quite dangerous at night. Don't get lost.

1303142.text: Just like these budding flowers, I'm also lacking the nourishment of love.

1303143.text: Having difficulty sleeping? Alright! Come! Lie down here, and let's talk. Now we are surrounded by roses with thorns, so don't even try to lie.

1303144.text:
This is a ring made from rose stems. Don't worry, I've removed the thorns. Try it on! I'm sure it's a perfect fit. 
Why do I give this to you? Well, no particular reason. I just need to put something on you to ward off any pests that might be in the way.

1303146.text: You wanna be spoiled, don't you?

1303148.text: Rest time already? I've just warmed up!

1303149.text: Walking by yourself at night could be very dangerous. Mortimer has sensed you.

1303150.text: Don't worry, I'll be there soon.

1303151.text: The aroma of wildflowers, I'm looking forward to it.

1303152.text: The spring rains have rejuvenated the flowers.

1303153.text: I'm not used to showing up like this. Do you wanna see my original form?

1303154.text: A flower wilts without the nourishment of love, so do I.

1303155.text: Do not try to pick this thorny rose. Only if you are prepared to be pricked may you indulge in its fragrant aroma.

1303156.text: It's dangerous to get lost at night. I know the way out of the forest, but should I tell you that?

1303159.text: Can you feel the rose's heart too? It looks like we will make a perfect match. Mortimer wants to stay by your side...

1303166.text: This is the end already? I haven't had much fun yet.

1303167.text: A withered flower never gets the dew of love...

1303169.text: It is also the guidance from the Lord.

1303170.text: This power will bring forth the future!

1303171.text: My Lord, the Banner of Glory is honored by your holy grace.

1303173.text: Is my taste strange? You picked very carefully for me, didn't you?

1303174.text: The Lord will not bless you if you balk.

1303175.text: You, stranger. You don't look like a spy. Fear not, and tell me your name.

1303176.text: There's nothing to be afraid of if you can hold on to your own beliefs.

1303177.text: It's been like forever since I last enjoyed such peaceful passing of time. Maybe it's because I feel at ease when I see you.

1303178.text:
You don't need to comfort me. Nope, there's no need.
But for this one time, I do feel grateful.

1303179.text:
We can't breathe our last breath until we have eliminated all the invaders.
When it's all over, let's return here and...
Huh? I'm not worried about you.
Now, hold my hand and swear to me.

1303180.text: This place just reminds me of my hometown.

1303182.text: I swear in the name of my Lord. I will not fail you.

1303184.text: The glory of the Lord is given only to the bravest of warriors.

1303185.text: My Lord, may your holy grace bless my compatriots.

1303187.text: It also counts for a warrior to rest well before a battle.

1303188.text: It is better to keep your faith than to keep your life, even that means dying young.

1303189.text: The Lord will only bless those who are dauntless.

1303190.text: I'm the only one who can save this country.

1303191.text: Life only comes around once, so I choose to follow the Lord's guidance and dedicate my life to the liberation of my country.

1303194.text: Saving the country is my task given by the Lord, and I have no fear, for I was born for this duty.

1303196.text: Today we die for our motherland!

1303198.text: For the glory of the Lord!

1303201.text: All invaders shall be expelled from our homeland, or die.

1303202.text: For the sake of my country, I can't give up yet...

1303203.text: This is the end of you!

1303207.text: Looks like we've got another prayer in the dark.

1303208.text: Trying to take advantage of me?

1303209.text: You look groggy. Are you okay?

1303210.text: Ah... My figure is not as good as you may think.

1303212.text: Does my dress look weird? But I referenced my sister's style...

1303213.text: Is it dusty? I did not notice it.

1303215.text: Don't commit blasphemy toward your faith...

1303216.text: Please take your hands off me...

1303217.text: Eulalia is about to get angry...

1303219.text: Ah, this outfit really suits me? Thanks!

1303221.text: Is it my turn for the stage?

1303222.text: Ah! That's dangerous! I almost slipped!

1303223.text: What's the matter? You've never seen this kind of clothes before?

1303228.text: I'm so tired. Can you give me a massage?

1303233.text: Do not look at your feet while walking. Look ahead!

1303235.text: What? Why did you do this? Don't scare me...

1303236.text: Did I have something on my face? Oh! It's to show your affinity...

1303237.text: Hey! Don't scare me! You made me get out of tune!

1303238.text: Sorry that I didn't notice you. I was thinking about something else.

1303239.text: Being stroked actually doesn't feel that bad...

1303241.text: I don't quite understand... but I feel at complete peace when I'm with you.

1303243.text: It feels kind of nice. You can stroke a little more if you want.

1303245.text: Whoa! Ahem... I just pretended to be scared by you.

1303246.text: Why did you suddenly come over and stroke me? Is this a new way of greeting?

1303252.text: It seems that you harbor some evil thoughts...

1303253.text: You can't touch wherever you want!

1303254.text: You want me to stroke you as well? Good girl...

1303255.text: Ohh!... Ahem, Please don't scare me.

1303256.text: I won't feel lonely... as long as you are at my side.

1303257.text: It's of no use to blame you.

1303259.text: Don't touch me. Doesn't thou feel cold?

1303260.text: Wh... what did thou do to me!? Thou... thou shouldest be ashamed!

1303262.text: Hast thou got no sense of shame?

1303263.text: It's okay to take a short break.

1303264.text: Are you stroking my head? It feels more interesting than I imagined.

1303265.text: But... what if others see us?

1303268.text: Please stop. I still have my sword in my hand.

1303272.text: I'm very forgiving. Just get down on thy knees and apologize!

1303273.text: Do not stare at my tail, there's no point in doing so.

1303274.text: I guess being caressed by you is not that bad.

1303275.text: Ah, not in this way... I don't like it...

1303276.text: I haven't felt this kind of warmth for a long time...

1303277.text: You want to piss me off? I'll probably just ignore you instead.

1303279.text: May God bless you as well.

1303280.text: Unclean souls need to be purified.

1303281.text: Is there something on my face?

1303282.text: Please dispel the evil out of this body!

1303283.text: My dress? It's a Miko's daily wear.

1303284.text: Am I too short? I... I'm not that concerned about my height... Really!

1303285.text: My sword can sever any wicked thought.

1303287.text: Why did you do this out of the blue?

1303288.text: Are you curious about my dress?

1303290.text: Do you want to become a sacrifice for my ritual?

1303292.text: It seems that we've found the sacrifice for the next ritual...

1303294.text: Confusion? I never have that feeling.

1303295.text: Ah... My Lord, forgive me, for I will have to teach this insolent fool some manners!

1303296.text: Stop it now! This is an unseemly behavior.

1303297.text: What are you doing! The Lord will not forgive you for your sins!

1303298.text: Stand up. If you're gonna walk the same path with me, don't ever kneel again.

1303299.text: Does losing all money get you carried away?

1303300.text: You resort to this simply because you can't win against me?

1303301.text: I'm gonna make you regret your poor behavior.

1303302.text: Wanna bet? On whether you'll kneel at my feet.

1303303.text: What's wrong? Are you doubting yourself?

1303308.text: If you've lost your way forward, think back to where you started. What you are truly seeking must have left a clue there.

1303311.text: May I treat you as an enemy?

1303313.text: Distraction thoughts will weaken you on the battlefield!

1303315.text: What's the... significance... of your actions?

1303318.text: Your actions... are not recorded... in books.

1303320.text: This is a secret just between the two of us...

1303321.text: Hey? You look worried about me? What's wrong?

1303322.text: The wind's rising... with an air of unease.

1303323.text: Ah, we usually wear this kind of skirt. It helps us move more agilely while hunting.

1303324.text: It is quite impolite to stroke someone much older than you.

1303325.text: I have felt the strength of evil.

1303326.text: You wanna know what I'm thinking about? Impossible! You can't see through me, yet.

1303327.text: My divination points directly to the evil thoughts lurking inside you.

1303328.text: No need to worry about me, thanks though.

1303329.text: Don't touch my head! It will stunt my growth!

1303330.text: Don't worry. I'll keep growing as long as I can have cakes every day!

1303331.text: Crumbs on my mouth? Ah, thank you for telling me that!

1303332.text: Beautiful, isn't it? It's my new dress!

1303333.text: Shoo shoo! I'm going to play in the garden.

1303336.text: I hate this kind of physical contact.

1303340.text: Ah, can you feel my heartbeat racing? That's because my heart can feel your pain.

1303341.text: Is this a diagnosis? I am not prepared...

1303342.text: People will always do miraculous things when locked in a trance.

1303345.text: Do you wanna know everything about me?

1303346.text: Is that how you show your loyalty?

1303347.text: There is no taboo between us. Nothing to conceal.

1303348.text: We're more intimate than this, right?

1303350.text: Argh! It's rude to scare a girl...

1303352.text: Ah... In my hometown, we don't have this way of greeting...

1303354.text: It seems you can't understand me either...

1303355.text: I can control you until you're driven mad. Wanna try?

1303356.text: I don't like superfluous physical contact. All I need is to see into your heart.

1303357.text: I sense you have many distractions in your mind. They must be purged.

1303359.text: Now, what expression should I make...

1303361.text: You see no expression on my face, right?

1303362.text: What expression do you want me to make...?

1303363.text: What are you trying to express with such a pointless act?

1303364.text: So actually, you want me to touch you, right?

1303365.text: Hey, what are you doing? There are others around.

1303366.text: Are you trying to act like a spoiled child?

1303372.text: I don't remember we have such an agreement.

1303373.text: Don't ever try to touch me!

1303374.text: The Und'rw'rld sky looks so unreachable yond all thee needeth to doth is just looking up on 't.

1303375.text: Art thee eke an evil disguis'd in the human's w'rld?

1303376.text: Approaching me is just a delusion of thine. Mine own language is myst'rious to m'rtals!

1303377.text: Is thy soul eke did pollute by the night so yond thee becameth restless f'r thy whole life?

1303378.text: This is the ritual of the und'rw'rld. Is yond all thee desire?

1303379.text: Why... why did you touch my head?

1303382.text: Is there any reason for that?

1303383.text: Hm? Are you curious about this immortal body?

1303384.text: Are you encouraging me? I appreciate that.

1303385.text: Trying to distract me? But it won't work.

1303386.text: I'm not tired yet. Don't worry about me.

1303387.text: A girly look? No way, that's not my style!

1303388.text: You'd better go focus on your training rather than wasting your time here.

1303390.text: So rude! Haven't you ever learned proper social etiquette?

1303391.text: You wanna taste the anger of a High Elf?

1303393.text: People with worldly cravings are not welcomed by the Forest of Elves.

1303394.text: Okay. Time to sleep. Nighty night.

1303395.text: You're also giving off a dangerous scent.

1303396.text: You've got some nerve. But I like it.

1303399.text: It's still working time! I'm not asleep.

1303400.text: You're just like me, so unpredictable.

1303401.text: Are you trying to encourage me?

1303404.text: What's wrong? I don't have a fever.

1303408.text: Stop doing this! It's been confirmed, there's a new intruder.

1303409.text: Are you caring about me? Thank you!

1303410.text: It's completely a surprise... You're so cunning.

1303411.text: Is there something on my face?

1303412.text: Don't do this... You got my dress dirty...

1303415.text: Agghh! You scared the heck out of me!

1303416.text: Hmm... your hand is so soft.

1303418.text: I'm heading out right now! Would you like to join me?

1303419.text: Woot... Is this a way to say hello? Should I pat you too?

1303421.text: Your hands are as warm as my mom's.

1303422.text: Ah... Are you a bad guy that mom once told me about?

1303423.text: Oh, there're sands on my dress? Thank you.

1303425.text: Ah! This passion welling up from within me will surely inspire me to write new pieces of music!

1303426.text: Your expression looks nice. Did you find new materials?

1303427.text: Whenever you're in danger, just come to me and I'll be there to help.

1303428.text: Want to find new materials with me? Let's set out now.

1303429.text: Inn: Can you stroke me again?$B$Lou: Lou wants a stroke too!

1303430.text: Inn: Why did you do this?$B$Lou: Lou is also confused.

1303431.text: Inn: It feels so itchy... $B$Lou: I'd also like a try!

1303432.text: Inn: You will get my skirt wrinkled.$B$Lou: It would be a hassle to deal with that.

1303433.text: Inn: It feels light. I like it.$B$Lou: Let me have a try.

1303435.text: Pay for what you have done! You foolish blasphemer!

1303436.text: I don't remember I've ever learned such etiquette.

1303437.text: Curious why I can dance so delicately?

1303438.text: The delicacy of this dress is also the embodiment of nobility.

1303441.text: Never panic in the face of danger, or you will be devoured by fear.

1303443.text: Stand up straight! Can't you even endure this level of hardship?

1303445.text: It feels a little bit strange...

1303446.text: Want me to warm your hands?

1303448.text: This is just some sort of decoration... Don't keep pulling it...

1303449.text: Is my face red? Don't worry. I'm not having a fever...

1303450.text: Look at my eyes, and explain what just happened.

1303451.text: Do not suddenly touch a girl's face. It could lead to misunderstandings...

1303452.text: My thoughts were elsewhere so I didn't notice... What did you do?

1303453.text: I don't know what to do with you...

1303461.text: Is there something on my face?

1303463.text: Ah... Please stop making fun of me.

1303467.text: Is this a hostile act? Do you wish to be an enemy of the elves?

1303468.text: I am monitoring the flow of magic in the forest. Please do not disturb me.

1303469.text: Thank you for always supporting me! It really helps!

1303470.text: This isn't funny, please stop this immediately.

1303471.text: Could you be a little more gentle?

1303472.text: You're exploring a new place... Do you know what that means?

1303473.text: Sitting on a beast for such a long time does make my muscles sore.

1303475.text: I feel a pain in my chest when I see you with someone else...

1303476.text: This dream that you refuse to wake from will end one day in nothing but sorrow. Eventually, you will have to face reality.

1303477.text: Is there something on my dress?

1303478.text: My dress is going to be torn off...

1303490.text: Don't play such jokes, or you'll die, got it?

1303491.text: My face is freezing, stop touching it.

1303492.text: Want to become an enemy of the Chivalric Order of the Holy Church?

1303495.text: Ah... Please don't touch there... I'm not confident enough...

1303497.text: Watch your fingers. I'm a prickly girl.

1303498.text: My legs look a little thick... Maybe I should work out more...

1303546.text: A mutant insect. Its body is completely corrupted by magic, giving off a disgusting smell.

1303547.text: A magic golem patrolling back and forth in the Chrono Tower to detect the intruders.

1303548.text: A creature wrapped in magical flames. It has lost its sanity long ago. Now it's just a servant of the devil.

1303549.text: A magic golem that has been guarding the Chrono Tower since ancient times. It has amazingly destructive power.

1303550.text: A seemingly familiar figure, but the person's identity is mostly hidden within a cloak.

1303551.text: Controlled by the forbidden power when in search of the lost magic.

1303552.text: A larva that shines with a mysterious light.

1303553.text: An insect that has grown up further, shining with a hallucinatory light.

1303554.text: An insect in its adult form, flapping wings of hallucinations.

1303555.text: A magic-converging egg that awaits hatching.

1303556.text: A small flying snake that's not too destructive.

1303557.text: A serpentine creature that can fly, occasionally flicking its long tongue.

1303558.text: Constantly emits a macabre sound when flying in the air.

1303559.text: A monster that swoops down at the sight of any man.

1303560.text: Can easily shred prey with its sharp teeth. Even other monsters do not dare to provoke it.

1303561.text: A monster with evolved wings. The wings give it flying capability. It is ready to attack any prey that appears within its range.

1303562.text: A giant blood-sucking monster that can easily pierce the skin of living creatures.

1303563.text: A kind of bird that has a longer, sharper beak than any other bird.

1303564.text: A dangerous monster that lives in groups, with a venomous stinger feared by all creatures.

1303565.text: A ferocious monster that breathes streams of thunder and lightning from its mouth.

1303566.text: A giant fierce beast floating in the air that can easily swallow any prey.

1303567.text: A winged lion-like monster with a vicious nature.

1303568.text: Twin assassins from the Sanctuary who faithfully carry out the orders of the ruler.

1303569.text: A preacher of the Church who has completely plunged into self-madness after being manipulated by a mysterious power.

1303570.text: A huge monster hovering in the sky of Cassiel.

1303571.text: A martial artist serves Ereshkigal. Proficient in all types of martial arts and various magics.

1303572.text: An artificial butterfly that exists only in the Dreamworld.

1303573.text: Its origin was people's fear of the unknown. Then it materialized to become a monster that deludes and controls minds.

1303574.text: A monster that's substantialized from the negative emotions of escaping from reality.

1303575.text: A monster that's substantialized from all sorts of fear. It possesses the dark magic surging from the bottom of the darkness.

1303576.text: A monster that constantly erodes the spirit of a creature until it eventually slips into the ultimate despair of the abyss.

1303577.text: A monster roaring in chains, with only destructive rage left.

1303578.text: A monster confined by chains. It has already lost its original look, giving off an abnormal aura of magic.

1303579.text: A mighty chevalier in chains whose body has been corrupted by the abyss.

1303580.text: A purple golem patrolling back and forth in the Chrono Tower to detect the intruders.

1303581.text: A yellow golem patrolling back and forth in the Chrono Tower to detect the intruders.

1303582.text: The leader of golems guarding the Chrono Tower. It always removes all intruders without even listening to their explanations.

1303583.text: A servant endowed by the devil with the ability to use the flames of hell. All those who see it feel intense fear for their souls.

1303584.text: A lava spirit that uses destructive fire magic.

1303585.text: A giant monster whose body is completely covered with magma.

1303586.text: A giant lava monster whose entire body is covered with uncanny flames.

1303587.text: A monster with terrible destructive power. Part of its body has been melted by flames.

1303664.text: Living on the shore of Elf Lakeside, she often spends her nights quietly bathing in the moonlight by the Lake and praying to Dana, Goddess of the Lake who guarded Elf Lake before.

1303665.text:
Dana, who slumbers in the depths of the Elf Lake, sensed her devotion. The Goddess conjured the moonlight on the lake into the form of a dolphin. Then she bestowed on her the dolphin along with the ability to manipulate the moonlight. 

In the moonlight, Mineer could feel the connection with Goddess of the Lake. 

While the Goddess slumbers, she maintains the peace of the Forest of Elves with her companion, waiting for the Goddess to awaken.

1303666.text:
She often plays with Flora by the lake and meanwhile shoulders the responsibility of keeping Flora safe. 

Anyone who attempts to approach Flora with ill intentions will be sanctioned by her powerful magic.

1303667.text:
Both Mineer and Mayahuel know Dana's romance story with the human male. 

Unlike Mayahuel, Mineer seems to know the real reason why the human male finally left Dana. 

Thus she privately keeps in touch with that man. He delivers the latest news of the outside to her, including some new songs. 

Mayahuel knows nothing about this and even teaches the songs to Flora. 

Mineer's elegant manners often lead to an illusion that she has good taste in music, but actually, she is a poor learner in music. 

Each time she offers the new song to Mayahuel, she has to clumsily avoid Mayahuel's questions, with an entirely different face from usual. 

Luckily Mayahuel is not very suspicious but just curious why Mineer can always discover such great pieces of music.

1303705.text: This is the reward for my genuine prayer.

1303707.text: I can act God's will better.

1303708.text: Is this for me? Thank you.

1303711.text: Are you also praying for God's forgiveness?

1303712.text: Everyone can feel God's mercy. What's wrong? Why do you look so skeptical?

1303713.text: Let us thank God for thy grace. Remember, stay pure in your heart.

1303714.text: You want to pray with me? You also heard the revelation of God, didn't you?

1303715.text: It must be God who guided you to me. My piety has finally impressed God...

1303717.text: Have you also felt God's mercy?

1303718.text: Is that another instruction from God?

1303720.text: Dear God, please guide your people. I, Isabel, the Executor, hereby pray for your grace.

1303721.text: Please give us grace, dear God.

1303722.text: Everything is for spreading the grace of God.

1303723.text: Thank you, God, for your grace.

1303724.text: I have never doubted God's instructions. Only those with evil intentions will.

1303726.text: All poor souls must have something to be hated for, right?

1303727.text: Aside from God's instructions, there is nothing, and no one shall disobey them.

1303730.text: Isabel is here, following the guidance of God. I'll pray for all evil souls. May God forgive your sins.

1303732.text: To spread the mercy of God...

1303736.text: I can't give up just yet...

1303738.text: The evil ones... Why aren't they punished...

1303914.text: Huh? You want to be more popular?

1303915.text: You picked this new song for me? It's a bit hard, but I'll try!

1303917.text: Is it a gift from a caring fan? Thanks.

1303918.text: Ah, you... you picked this especially for me? Thank you, I will cherish it...

1303919.text: Fascinated? But my voice isn't that moving...

1303920.text: An audience? Sorry, I'm not quite used to singing in front of people...

1303921.text: Are you here to support me? But... Mayahuel doesn't allow me to have too much contact with humans...

1303922.text: It's actually troublesome to have such long hair. It takes a long time to take care of my hair after I get up every morning...

1303923.text: I really admire those who can compose music and write lyrics. Mayahuel always teaches me new tunes.

1303924.text: Welcome home. Want to take a bath, or eat something, or... Huh? I heard that humans will be happy to hear this... Seems that it's only between those who are very close... Um... sorry, please forget what I said, I'm not ready for this yet...

1303925.text: You are not allowed to have any physical contact with an idol...

1303926.text: I'm preparing for the next song. Don't distract me... please...

1303928.text: Is the show over? Everyone looks so happy!

1303929.text: I am Flora. Although I do not know why I am standing on this stage, I will try my best!

1303930.text: Together on stage? But so many people here... I'm a little scared.

1303931.text: A new stage? Wait for me!

1303932.text: This is... the melody of recovery.

1303933.text: My father? Sorry, Mayahuel only talked to me about my mother.

1303934.text: Do you also like this song? Well... my mother taught it to me. Every time I hear this melody, I think of my mother, long sleeping in the void...

1303935.text: Don't stare at me... I... I don't like it.

1303936.text: Mayahuel once told me that I wouldn't fall into the void like my mother because I inherited the noblest bloodline... When I was a child, I always wondered why I couldn't contact humans. But now I begin to feel the pain and loneliness of my sleeping mother...

1303939.text: Flora of the Forest of Elves, I swear by my mother's name that my song will help you.

1303942.text: This melody is dedicated to you.

1303946.text: For you, I offer my songs, which can reach even the underworld.

1303947.text: Even the most beautiful song is bound to an end...

1303949.text: It's getting better! I wish I could dress like this all the time!

1303950.text: Dressing like this is even more wonderful than I imagined!

1303951.text: Whether it's gift-giving or a fight, I'll take it seriously.

1303953.text: I am supposed to be the one giving gifts. What's in it? I'm so curious now.

1303954.text: Are you in a daze? Don't you feel cold standing there alone?

1303955.text: A stranger? It's okay to give you a gift...

1303956.text: What secrets are hidden in the endless blizzard? How intriguing...

1303957.text: The long winters are hard to get through, so we decided to spend the nights together and give hope to others.

1303958.text: Do you have such festivals in your world? Will many other girls hand you many gifts?

1303959.text: So... What kind of gift do you want? Oh, I'm sorry to ask you such an odd question. It's because... you see... you've always taken good care of me, and I would like to repay you. As long as I can manage, please don't hesitate. Tell me, what do you desire?

1303961.text: I can't believe it's not snowing here...

1303962.text: Want to come along to hand out gifts?

1303964.text: I'm Celanya. This dress of the blessing ceremony is really not my style...

1303965.text: No matter what I wear, they can't hide the passion inside me... Just kidding.

1303966.text: Let's go to the blessing ceremony together.

1303968.text: Can you feel the blessing wind blowing on your face?

1303969.text: It's harder than I expected to prepare presents.

1303970.text: When I was a child, I used to skate on the Frozen Lake. But that place is already occupied by the wolf pack...

1303971.text: Heaven has long been the paradise for the mortal. In my wildest dream, I shook off the shackles and offered you my earnest love and devotion.

1303974.text: My father, Silverbow, and I are guarding the peace of the village. We won't let our guard down, even during the ceremony!

1303981.text: The bell of blessings rings again!

1303984.text: It's been a long time since I last stepped out of my room, and it's nice to move around once in a while so my body won't get stiff.

1303985.text: I would also like to give it a good try.

1303986.text: I love the feel of the sea breeze caressing my cheeks, gentle and comfortable.

1303988.text: You're giving it to me? Thank you so much! This is the best memory of this summer!

1303989.text: Don't look at me like that... I'm not used to dressing like this...

1303990.text: Sorry, I'm not used to greeting strangers...

1303991.text: The sun is so blinding... Is this umbrella too small?

1303992.text: Do I look cute in my swimsuit? Whoo-hoo!

1303993.text: Everything here exudes breaths of life. Even the pain in my body has been relieved.

1303994.text: I'm not used to dressing like this... However, it's a rare trip to the beach. Want to swim together? Let's create some good memories this summer.

1303996.text: Im envious of others. My weak body... can't even manage the basics...

1303997.text: Don't expect too much from me...

1303998.text: My legs feel so heavy... Can we rest now?

1303999.text: Do you need my help? Though I have little confidence, Id like to give it a try...

1304000.text: I'll try my best to meet your expectations...

1304001.text: Can we go somewhere not too far?

1304002.text: Rest if you're tired, don't push yourself too hard.

1304003.text: This swim ring? I'm not confident in my stamina, so I've brought this, just in case.

1304004.text: One day, I will also be devoured by the magic in my body...

1304005.text: My past? Sorry, I don't really want to talk about it... Only painful memories remain now.

1304006.text: There may be a glimmer of hope in my future...

1304009.text: Thank you for coming to the beach with me. I haven't been out for such a long time.

1304011.text: Why do we have to hurt each other...

1304016.text: I'm not used to it yet, but I can still fight...

1304017.text: Sorry, I'm still not used to direct sunlight...

1304019.text: I still want to become stronger. Can you teach me more?

1304020.text: Holy Mother, thank you for your guidance!

1304021.text: This child is also very happy now that we can soar through the sky more freely.

1304022.text: A gift... for me? Thank you!

1304023.text: Ah, how beautiful it is... As it happens, I have something for you, too.

1304024.text: Dazing off now? It's okay. I wanna slack off sometimes, too.

1304025.text: Sorry, this child was shaking the snow off, did he startle you?

1304026.text: The long-cherished wish of the Holy Mother is also ours, and I will fight all I can to fulfill it.

1304027.text: Do you like cooking too? I'll give you a taste of my brilliant dishes next time!

1304028.text: What a fantastic costume, I feel like a princess emerging from a fairy tale. Oh... You and your compliments are so sweet... even sweeter than honey  (  )

1304029.text: Sometimes I will imagine my future: we meet again... share our fate... and fight together... Sorry, I should not think of our parting when you are still by my side. Well... the Holy Mother will bless you. Please do return to me again...

1304030.text: Thank you for the invitation. This place is so different from where I come from.

1304031.text: Please don't lean over... I'm not quite used to having physical contact with people...

1304034.text: Crystal snowflakes, and dreamlike glow... I can feel the weight of someone's yearning.

1304035.text: I offer you my prayers, Holy Mother.

1304036.text: Hmm... Going out with someone else?

1304037.text: My body is warming up... and my fatigue has completely disappeared.

1304038.text: Thanks to the guidance of the Holy Mother, we can fight side by side.

1304039.text: I will try my best with this child to meet your expectations.

1304040.text: What am I doing? Well, I'm drawing in a book. Don't look at it! It's a secret!

1304041.text: Don't stare at me like that... or I'll get angry.

1304044.text: I'm Caledonia. Together with this child, we will fight by your side. Hey, is it cold? Alright, let me warm your hands.

1304047.text: It's the guidance of the Holy Mother!

1304051.text: No matter how heavy the blizzard is, it can't stop us!

1304052.text: Holy Mother, sorry, for I failed to fulfill your guidance...

1304054.text: I'm still too weak. I have to become stronger!

1304055.text: The swimsuit doesn't affect my swordplay, but my skills need further honing.

1304056.text: I am not going to lose to the heat. I'll get stronger.

1304057.text: My kindness to you...? I don't remember I ever did that...

1304058.text: This is... I'm surprised that you know what I like... I'm a grateful person, so tell me what do you want in return?

1304059.text: Do you also daze off even when you're at the beach?

1304060.text: Don't come any closer! I can still fight without a sword!

1304061.text: Putting on makeup? Sorry, but as a swordswoman, I suppose there's no need for me to learn this skill, right?

1304062.text: Want to play beach volleyball together? I'm pretty good at it!

1304063.text: Hurry up. You'd better also change into your swimsuit... It's so ashamed... so unfair that I'm the only one who wears something like this...

1304064.text: The sun is so dazzling. Can you help me put sunscreen on? Wait a second. Let me untie my swimsuit and lie down. Now... Please...

1304065.text: Picking up seashells together? I... I don't have time for that...

1304066.text: This dressing isn't suitable for running.

1304067.text: Play together? Okay... fine... I'm not going to say no.

1304069.text: I am Akasha. Since we both came to the beach alone, it's okay to accompany you for a while.

1304070.text: No one can disturb my rest and get away with it!

1304071.text: The enemy of the deity shall be purified by my sword.

1304072.text: It's okay to take a rest once in a while...

1304073.text: Fighting against strong enemies for a bright future... We are very much alike.

1304074.text: Warming up is necessary before either a swim or a fight.

1304075.text: Swimming? I'm pretty good at it. Swordswomen can fight in all kinds of places.

1304076.text: The sun is even harsher... How about finding a shady place to eat? Don't worry, I've prepared lunch for both of us.

1304079.text: I'm Akasha, on a vacation, so don't bother me with annoying trifles. Just let me enjoy this precious free time.

1304085.text: I shall bear up against the intense heat!

1304086.text: If you want me to draw my sword, then be prepared to die.

1304087.text: The responsibility of wielding a sword is too heavy...

1304088.text: Sink to the bottom of the sea!

1304090.text: The wishes upon the Aurora will also come true, right?

1304091.text: A little too much? But it's ceremony time, so it's okay to be like this once in a while, right?

1304093.text: This is... I haven't seen such a beautiful gift before.

1304094.text: Don't just sit there staring into space, let's build a snowman.

1304095.text: Want to play with me? But mom said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1304096.text: Want to have a snowball fight? But we can only play for a little while.

1304097.text: Just put all worries aside. Let's play! Today's ceremony is quite lively.

1304098.text: Snow fairy? Nah... Mom said that only people with ulterior motives compliment others for no reason, but you don't look like a bad person... hmm...

1304099.text: Let's have a snowball fight! If my snowball hits you, you'll have to listen to my wish. That's the deal. No matter what the wish is, you have to help me fulfill it, and you can't eat your words.

1304100.text: Mom said that there are times when the sea is frozen, but I have never seen it yet.

1304101.text: Your hand is so cold, stop touching me.

1304104.text: This is the first time I've seen snow. It feels so cold.

1304106.text: We can't go too far away, or mom will worry.

1304107.text: Are you tired? Then let's take a break.

1304108.text: Mom said that there are times when the sea is frozen, but I have never seen it yet.

1304109.text: Don't worry, I'm quite warm. Look, my mom gave me these gloves. Do you want a pair too?

1304110.text: Want to go for a walk on the beach with me? There is no winter in Lochaber.

1304111.text: Skiing? What kind of game is that? Can you teach me?

1304114.text: Is this what the outside world looks like? It's the first time I've seen snow. Don't stay there, play with me.

1304116.text: It's almost dark, I have to go back now.

1304117.text: I like the flowers scattered from the sky!

1304121.text: Look, it's a little snow bunny. So cute, isn't it?

1304122.text: It's so cold... Mom asked me to go home early.

1304123.text: Want to teach me more obscure magics?

1304124.text: Finally, a breakthrough! What a genius I am!

1304127.text: I can't believe you are giving me such a valuable gift... It will definitely help me in my research. I don't know how to thank you enough...

1304128.text: What's on your mind, a new research project?

1304129.text: Get lost, unfamiliar face! I'm working on an important research project.

1304130.text: This is not a gift, it's my research findings, something that I wouldn't give away easily.

1304131.text: Give it a shot? This is my newly invented potion. Drinking it can greatly enhance your magic power.

1304132.text: I've never seen anything like you before. Every time I see you, I get new inspirations.

1304133.text: It tastes sweet, isn't it? Don't worry, I just made it. After you drink it, you are going to reveal all the secrets you are trying to conceal. So, tell me... Ahem... what am I to you?

1304134.text: Don't ruin my cute hat. It took me a long time to choose this one.

1304135.text: Stop it! Are you trying to irritate me?

1304136.text: Eww, this is gross. What are you doing?

1304137.text: Get blown up by my magic or kneel and apologize. Take your pick.

1304139.text: It is my first time coming to this place. There is more magic that I have to learn.

1304142.text: You are going to quit before the results come out?

1304143.text: My name is Dorin, an ordinary girl who is still learning magic. Do you want to study with me?

1304144.text: Do you want to work on magic together? Better keep up with me!

1304145.text: Are we looking for new research materials?

1304146.text: Is this... a new healing magic?

1304147.text: Studying magic is quite fascinating, right? Its endless charm attracts me...

1304148.text: I focus more on my experiments than on magical knowledge. Without results, it means nothing.

1304149.text: Fail? Of course I fail now and then. But failure is the mother of success. To become a great sorcerer, failure is inevitable and necessary.

1304150.text: It is said that there is a great sorcerer in the capital. Those who can become her students must be geniuses like me.

1304153.text: Want to learn magic from me? Sure, I can teach you, but, the price will be very high.

1304155.text: Want to try out my research?

1304160.text: Don't waste time here, hurry up with new researches!

1304161.text: This research is far from finished...

1304163.text: So, no one will tease me from now, right...?

1304165.text: This is the result of our teamwork!

1304167.text: Ah... Never seen that before... I'll treasure it!

1304169.text: Sorry, I don't know you... Please don't bully me...

1304170.text: Why are you staring at me? Am I... am I weird?

1304171.text: Really? You want to play with me? Let's play some simple games first.

1304172.text: Can I sit next to you? All of those around me look so scary, I can only trust... you...

1304173.text: Can I ask you a question? Please answer me seriously: If one day I have to go back to the Fairyland, erm... will you go with me?

1304181.text: I will try to finish it.

1304183.text: I'm Hauen from the Fairyland. Could you... be my friend?

1304184.text: Are you going to take me to the outside world?

1304187.text: I'm very sensitive to sounds, no matter how soft it is. Want to test me?

1304188.text: There can be bad guys in the Fairyland as well, but they are always punished accordingly at the end of the fairytale.

1304189.text: You don't like my singing? Isn't it a good time to sing when the flowers are in full bloom? Hmph...

1304190.text: The moon also has rabbits living on it.

1304191.text: (A smile full of vitality and energy)

1304193.text: I am Hauen. I came from the Fairyland. This is my first time outside my world. I'm still adjusting, so could you please help me with that?

1304195.text: Woah... The enemies are already here?

1304201.text: The world outside is too scary, I'm still not strong enough...

1304203.text: Oops, I think I'm getting too serious~

1304204.text: Being watched by you like this, I'll feel bad slacking off.

1304205.text: What do I have to do next?

1304206.text: Is this for me? That's so thoughtful of you.

1304207.text: Ohhhh, you know what I like? Seems that you've been watching me for a while.

1304208.text: I'll leave you alone if you keep dazing there. I have to carry out Lord Norn's orders.

1304209.text: An intruder? Fomoire doesn't welcome outsiders~

1304210.text: A ceremony? I am not very interested, your accompany is more than enough for me~

1304211.text: Calm down, don't get too excited. The best is yet to come~

1304212.text: Are you nervous? How cute~ Sit down and have a drink with me. The night is still young, isn't it?

1304213.text: You made me wait here so lonely... You could actually be punished to death, you know that? Even wolves hate being alone~

1304214.text: You really know how to fawn on me~ Do you want me to stroke you?

1304216.text: Your hands are so soft... How attractive

1304217.text: I'm looking forward to your next move~

1304218.text: It feels like tickling... What are you scared of?

1304219.text: What do you want to do with me in a place like this?

1304220.text: You didn't invite me here without some lovely food and wine, did you?

1304221.text: What are we going to do next?

1304222.text: Let's go on for a little longer.

1304223.text: I can hear your desires... Maybe I can fulfill them, if you play with me.

1304225.text: Hanging out with you? Really looking forward to it.

1304227.text: Behave, or be punished, got it?

1304228.text: You fear me yet need me. Humans are so interesting!

1304229.text: A nightmare? It's okay. Just let me check. I'm an expert in healing!

1304230.text: Well, my tail is a symbol of nobility, the Six Ovates are as dangerous as I am, so you better not approach me with irrelevant fantasies in your mind~

1304232.text: Are you trying to defy me?

1304233.text: You don't look like an intruder, so can you tell me why fate has led you here?

1304235.text: You are so naughty, aren't you?

1304240.text: Is that all? I have not had enough fun yet...

1304244.text: The stars in the sky will light up my path forward.

1304245.text: More... My beauty should be admired by more creatures.

1304246.text: A gift especially for me? Bring it here.

1304247.text: I can't believe you can see through me so easily. Whew... seems that I should give you some reward.

1304249.text: Another admirer of mine? Alright, you are permitted to bow to me.

1304250.text: Eager to learn advanced magic? I'm okay with teaching you, just to pass this leisure afternoon.

1304251.text: You're different from other admirers, and I'm particularly fond of you. Don't just stand there. Come over!

1304252.text: Last night, you tossed and turned dozens of times. No wonder you still have dark circles under your eyes. Cheer up!

1304253.text: One day I will lose my beauty and this sweet voice... It's okay that you ditch me by that time, but can you promise to stay by my side until then?

1304254.text: You shall be punished for your touching my head without permission~

1304255.text: What did you do just now? You want me to cut your hands off?

1304256.text: Don't touch a girl's face. This is not a beauty you should covet.

1304257.text: You really got some nerves. Are you prepared to be sentenced to death?

1304258.text: Look up to my beauty, like everyone else!

1304260.text: In the guidance of the starlight, I am here.

1304261.text: I am very interested in this.

1304262.text: Hit and run, huh? I'm OK with that.

1304263.text: I'm Ruda the Starlight Collector. Mortal, admire my beauty and become my admirer!

1304266.text: Give me a massage on my shoulders.

1304267.text: My beauty is a gift from the stars, as distant to you as the stars themselves.

1304268.text: Become an ordinary girl? Don't be ridiculous. I'm a head-turner for everyone around me, 'ordinary' is not the right word for me.

1304269.text: I'm quite fond of you! Maybe I'll put a surprise under your pillow

1304270.text: Want to become one of my collections? But you don't shine as bright as a shooting star.

1304272.text: Do you want to taste the fury of the starlight?

1304273.text: Do not regret becoming my admirer. My unmatched beauty is beyond your reach for your entire life.

1304279.text: The starlight has not yet dimmed...

1304280.text: If music is what keeps love alive, then let it keep playing until you bend your knees before me.

1304281.text: Rough guys... I have absolutely no interest in you!

1304283.text: The waves are becoming more frequent, and my observation range is getting larger.

1304284.text: Is that good enough for you? I don't like to train with others...

1304285.text: I have yet to understand the truth of the world. There is much I need to learn.

1304286.text: A gift? I'm not really interested...

1304287.text: Is this specially selected for me? I can't believe you can sense my wavelength... Ah, I'm not surprised. It's just that I haven't been so happy for such a long time.

1304288.text: Have you spent the day in a daze...

1304289.text: Unknown wavelength... Should be a stranger, right?

1304290.text: Your breath is trembling... Why are you afraid to face me?

1304291.text: The banquet of some nobles? Sorry, I don't really like those sorts of occasions... All of those different wavelengths mixed together, all the noises... Oh, you don't like it either?

1304292.text: You found a new celestial object? Looks like we are quite compatible... The stars in the night sky seemingly tell the truth of this world, quite charismatic, like you.

1304293.text: Um... It's lonely to watch the stars alone, can you accompany me? Do you know the legends of the stars separated by the Milky Way? We are fortunate enough to be with each other every day...

1304295.text: Stop it... I'm sensing something evil...

1304296.text: Your hands are shaking... Is it because you are feeling guilty?

1304297.text: Don't do this... Or I'm gonna be angry.

1304298.text: A prank? Can you stop it... I kind of hate this.

1304299.text: Don't bother me, I'm observing that star.

1304301.text: Do you wanna go observe a new celestial object?

1304302.text: The day breaks. Let's end today's observation and call it a day.

1304303.text: My hobby is to look up at the stars and observe the movements of different objects... It may sound a bit strange, but if you need my help, I'll try my best.

1304304.text: Your wavelength is completely different from the others'. Can I do some research on you?

1304305.text: Let's explore the truth of this world together!

1304306.text: Go rest if you're tired. I'll be fine on my own.

1304307.text: There are always deviations in consciousness, and all I have to do is to correct them while creating new ones.

1304308.text: A storm will eventually calm down. It is the law of the universe.

1304309.text: Fighting? I hate fighting... Although those great people want me to fight against the Annihilator of Existence, I feel reluctant to twist others. That is very painful.

1304310.text: I used to hear the world calling. It came from a far-flung place...

1304313.text: My name? Matveiffe. Sounds strange? It means the study of the true nature of the world and the observation of everything's wavelength.

1304315.text: Observing anomalies is a difficult task.

1304320.text: Don't worry, your deviations have been corrected.

1304321.text: The anomaly has exceeded the limit, even I can't fix it...

1304323.text: Thank you for your guidance. Did it meet your expectations?

1304324.text: The secret to winning? Nothing special, just work harder than everyone else.

1304325.text: The strength you offered me will be a cornerstone for the safety of the royal family.

1304327.text: For me? It's a rare find. Thank you.

1304328.text: It's just a waste of time to hesitate here. Act now!

1304329.text: This is the royal dominion. Outsiders are not allowed to step in. You shall not pass for whatever reason.

1304330.text: Even if I am relieved from my duty, there is no way I can live a free life like any ordinary girl. And, uh... I have already chosen the path to sacrifice for my country my entire life.

1304331.text: Unlike others, no matter how many times you are knocked down, you always stand up again bravely.

1304332.text: Combat is always brutal. You may lose your life at any time. So it'll be better to let me take all the risks.

1304333.text: I've always believed that dying for glory is not something to be sad about. But since I met you, every time I think about that maybe one day I'll never see you again, I... Sorry, I'm getting too emotional... Don't worry, I won't bring this sentiment to the battlefield.

1304335.text: To insult me is to insult the honor of the royal family!

1304336.text: Your hands are shaking, what are you afraid of?

1304337.text: Apologize, or answer to my blade.

1304338.text: Move. Get out of my way!

1304340.text: Let me go! It's time for my training!

1304341.text: Don't worry, I'll get it done.

1304342.text: It's not time to rest yet.

1304343.text: I am Hilda, Swordswoman of the royal family of Lochaber. I shall defend the honor of my country with my life!

1304344.text: My sword bears the glory of the royal family.

1304346.text: Resting does not mean letting your guard down.

1304347.text: It is a supreme honor to sacrifice my life for the sake of freedom.

1304348.text: My homeland, Lochaber, once ruled this continent. And its glory will come back again.

1304349.text: I have dedicated my life to Lochaber, and guarding it is my one-and-only faith.

1304350.text: If you lose your faith, even the strongest sword may break.

1304353.text: I, Hilda, the blade that guards the royal family, will offer all I have for Lochaber.

1304355.text: For the glory of the royal family!

1304359.text: My sword is not broken yet...

1304360.text: Without the courage to face death, you are not qualified for the battlefield.

1304363.text: The Void Clan is responsible for guarding the Space of Void. $B$So the majority of them would like to act aggressively and expel all intruders. $B$$B$However, Nannar is always flinching, unlike others. $B$She wears a lot of layers of clothes to cover more of herself, hoping to avoid being noticed by others.

1304364.text: Although she looks vulnerable, she actually is the descendant of the Void Clan.$B$The magic within her is beyond imagination. $B$$B$The clan has been guarding the portal into the Space of Void alone for thousands of years. $B$Therefore, Nannar has never had a chance to talk with people from the outside worlds.

1304365.text: As soon as she sees a stranger, she will hide herself in the Mirror World immediately. $B$She won't come out until the stranger leaves.

1304366.text:
She is into cooking but it really bothers her that she can't find anyone to taste her cuisines. $B$$B$Compared with directly talking to others, she prefers to sneak a peek first. $B$When she confirms the one is harmless, she will show up.$B$$B$
"Who are you? I don't know much about the outside world. $B$I was just sleeping inside the mirror."

1304368.text: She is a sorcerer from the Kingdom of Lochaber. $B$$B$She can absorb the magic power from the stars and use it to heal the sick.

1304369.text: Self-assured for her beauty, she takes others' admiration for granted. $B$$B$She quite enjoys the feeling of being flattered.

1304370.text: To resupply the power of her magic, she often climbs to the mountain top at night to collect the magic power of the stars. $B$$B$Rumors say that such power is the key to her beauty. $B$$B$However, all who try to copy her every move end up with a blank.

1304371.text: She hates being touched by others. $B$$B$According to her, the power of stars is attached to her skin. $B$$B$Anyone who touches her skin will take away the magic, which will cause her skin to age. $B$$B$However, skin aging shouldn't be a problem for a maiden like her.

1304373.text: She is the captain of the Royal Guard of Lochaber. $B$$B$Her loyalty to the royal family of Lochaber is absolute. $B$$B$Anyone that tends to threaten the royal family will face her blades.

1304374.text: Maiden as she is, her authority is respected by all royal soldiers. Even the generals won't take her suggestions lightly. $B$$B$She prefers using the double swords in her hands to subdue the opponent rather than using the words to convince them. $B$$B$She believes guarding Lochaber is the ultimate glory worth dying for.

1304375.text: She was born the princess of Lochaber, who has the right to the throne. $B$$B$But she gave up the luxury life as a princess and chose to guard the royal family with her own hands. $B$$B$She earned the admiration among the soldiers, who would identify her orders as those from the throne.

1304376.text: With a royal background, she was very arrogant. She once had the attitude that she would only wield her sword to prove her prowess. $B$$B$Once on a quest, her arrogance led her into the enemies' trap. She got rescued later, but her companion, who was also her best friend, was killed during the action. $B$$B$This was a heavy hit to Hilda, which led her started to reflect on her reckless behaviors. To pass on her friend's will, she carries her friend's sword on the waist and swears that her swords will only be drawn to protect.

1304377.text: I'm still too weak. I have to become stronger!

1304378.text: The swimsuit doesn't affect my swordplay, but my skills need further honing.

1304379.text: I am not going to lose to the heat. I'll get stronger.

1304380.text: My kindness to you...? I don't remember I ever did that...

1304381.text: This is... I'm surprised that you know what I like... I'm a grateful person, so tell me what do you want in return?

1304382.text: Do you also daze off even when you're at the beach?

1304383.text: Don't come any closer! I can still fight without a sword!

1304384.text: Putting on makeup? Sorry, but as a swordswoman, I suppose there's no need for me to learn this skill, right?

1304385.text: Want to play beach volleyball together? I'm pretty good at it!

1304386.text: Hurry up. You'd better also change into your swimsuit... It's so ashamed... so unfair that I'm the only one who wears something like this...

1304387.text: The sun is so dazzling. Can you help me put sunscreen on? Wait a second. Let me untie my swimsuit and lie down. Now... Please...

1304389.text: Stop! My swimsuit is about to...

1304390.text: Woah! It's cold! A drink? Oh, thanks!

1304391.text: What are you doing?! My witty kitty, go bite this bad guy!

1304393.text: Picking up seashells together? I... I don't have time for that...

1304394.text: This dressing isn't suitable for running.

1304395.text: Play together? Okay... fine... I'm not going to say no.

1304397.text: I am Akasha. Since we both came to the beach alone, it's okay to accompany you for a while.

1304398.text: No one can disturb my rest and get away with it!

1304399.text: The enemy of the deity shall be purified by my sword.

1304400.text: It's okay to take a rest once in a while...

1304401.text: Fighting against strong enemies for a bright future... We are very much alike.

1304402.text: Warming up is necessary before either a swim or a fight.

1304403.text: Swimming? I'm pretty good at it. Swordswomen can fight in all kinds of places.

1304404.text: The sun is even harsher... How about finding a shady place to eat? Don't worry, I've prepared lunch for both of us.

1304407.text: I'm Akasha, on a vacation, so don't bother me with annoying trifles. Just let me enjoy this precious free time.

1304413.text: I shall bear up against the intense heat!

1304414.text: If you want me to draw my sword, then be prepared to die.

1304415.text: The responsibility of wielding a sword is too heavy...

1304416.text: Sink to the bottom of the sea!

1304418.text: The wishes upon the Aurora will also come true, right?

1304419.text: A little too much? But it's ceremony time, so it's okay to be like this once in a while, right?

1304421.text: This is... I haven't seen such a beautiful gift before.

1304422.text: Don't just sit there staring into space, let's build a snowman.

1304423.text: Want to play with me? But mom said I shouldn't talk to strangers.

1304424.text: Want to have a snowball fight? But we can only play for a little while.

1304425.text: Just put all worries aside. Let's play! Today's ceremony is quite lively.

1304426.text: Snow fairy? Nah... Mom said that only people with ulterior motives compliment others for no reason, but you don't look like a bad person... hmm...

1304427.text: Let's have a snowball fight! If my snowball hits you, you'll have to listen to my wish. That's the deal. No matter what the wish is, you have to help me fulfill it, and you can't eat your words.

1304428.text: My hair is covered with snow! I haven't even noticed that!

1304431.text: You're so bad... I'm gonna tell mom.

1304432.text: Ta-da! My new boots. Don't they look pretty?

1304433.text: Mom said that there are times when the sea is frozen, but I have never seen it yet.

1304434.text: Your hand is so cold, stop touching me.

1304437.text: This is the first time I've seen snow. It feels so cold.

1304439.text: We can't go too far away, or mom will worry.

1304440.text: Are you tired? Then let's take a break.

1304441.text: Mom said that there are times when the sea is frozen, but I have never seen it yet.

1304442.text: Don't worry, I'm quite warm. Look, my mom gave me these gloves. Do you want a pair too?

1304443.text: Want to go for a walk on the beach with me? There is no winter in Lochaber.

1304444.text: Skiing? What kind of game is that? Can you teach me?

1304447.text: Is this what the outside world looks like? It's the first time I've seen snow. Don't stay there, play with me.

1304449.text: It's almost dark, I have to go back now.

1304450.text: I like the flowers scattered from the sky!

1304454.text: Look, it's a little snow bunny. So cute, isn't it?

1304455.text: It's so cold... Mom asked me to go home early.

1304457.text: Huh? You want to be more popular?

1304458.text: You picked this new song for me? It's a bit hard, but I'll try!

1304460.text: Is it a gift from a caring fan? Thanks.

1304461.text: Ah, you... you picked this especially for me? Thank you, I will cherish it...

1304462.text: Fascinated? But my voice isn't that moving...

1304463.text: An audience? Sorry, I'm not quite used to singing in front of people...

1304464.text: Are you here to support me? But... Mayahuel doesn't allow me to have too much contact with humans...

1304465.text: It's actually troublesome to have such long hair. It takes a long time to take care of my hair after I get up every morning...

1304466.text: I really admire those who can compose music and write lyrics. Mayahuel always teaches me new tunes.

1304467.text: Welcome home. Want to take a bath, or eat something, or... Huh? I heard that humans will be happy to hear this... Seems that it's only between those who are very close... Um... sorry, please forget what I said, I'm not ready for this yet...

1304468.text: Too many people out there... Please don't...

1304470.text: At this time... You are so cunning...

1304473.text: You are not allowed to have any physical contact with an idol...

1304474.text: I'm preparing for the next song. Don't distract me... please...

1304476.text: Is the show over? Everyone looks so happy!

1304477.text: I am Flora. Although I do not know why I am standing on this stage, I will try my best!

1304478.text: Together on stage? But so many people here... I'm a little scared.

1304479.text: A new stage? Wait for me!

1304480.text: This is... the melody of recovery.

1304481.text: My father? Sorry, Mayahuel only talked to me about my mother.

1304482.text: Do you also like this song? Well... my mother taught it to me. Every time I hear this melody, I think of my mother, long sleeping in the void...

1304483.text: Don't stare at me... I... I don't like it.

1304484.text: Mayahuel once told me that I wouldn't fall into the void like my mother because I inherited the noblest bloodline... When I was a child, I always wondered why I couldn't contact humans. But now I begin to feel the pain and loneliness of my sleeping mother...

1304487.text: Flora of the Forest of Elves, I swear by my mother's name that my song will help you.

1304490.text: This melody is dedicated to you.

1304494.text: For you, I offer my songs, which can reach even the underworld.

1304495.text: Even the most beautiful song is bound to an end...

1304497.text: I still want to become stronger. Can you teach me more?

1304498.text: Holy Mother, thank you for your guidance!

1304499.text: This child is also very happy now that we can soar through the sky more freely.

1304500.text: A gift... for me? Thank you!

1304501.text: Ah, how beautiful it is... As it happens, I have something for you, too.

1304502.text: Dazing off now? It's okay. I wanna slack off sometimes, too.

1304503.text: Sorry, this child was shaking the snow off, did he startle you?

1304504.text: The long-cherished wish of the Holy Mother is also ours, and I will fight all I can to fulfill it.

1304505.text: Do you like cooking too? I'll give you a taste of my brilliant dishes next time!

1304506.text: What a fantastic costume, I feel like a princess emerging from a fairy tale. Oh... You and your compliments are so sweet... even sweeter than honey  (  )

1304507.text: Sometimes I will imagine my future: we meet again... share our fate... and fight together... Sorry, I should not think of our parting when you are still by my side. Well... the Holy Mother will bless you. Please do return to me again...

1304508.text: Aah! You scared me. I was focused...

1304509.text: Please stop... We are not that close yet...

1304511.text: What are you doing?! Humph... You almost made me fall.

1304512.text: Don't worry, I usually don't feel cold in winter. See, this kid is pretty warm!

1304513.text: Thank you for the invitation. This place is so different from where I come from.

1304514.text: Please don't lean over... I'm not quite used to having physical contact with people...

1304517.text: Crystal snowflakes, and dreamlike glow... I can feel the weight of someone's yearning.

1304518.text: I offer you my prayers, Holy Mother.

1304519.text: Hmm... Going out with someone else?

1304520.text: My body is warming up... and my fatigue has completely disappeared.

1304521.text: Thanks to the guidance of the Holy Mother, we can fight side by side.

1304522.text: I will try my best with this child to meet your expectations.

1304523.text: What am I doing? Well, I'm drawing in a book. Don't look at it! It's a secret!

1304524.text: Don't stare at me like that... or I'll get angry.

1304527.text: I'm Caledonia. Together with this child, we will fight by your side. Hey, is it cold? Alright, let me warm your hands.

1304530.text: It's the guidance of the Holy Mother!

1304534.text: No matter how heavy the blizzard is, it can't stop us!

1304535.text: Holy Mother, sorry, for I failed to fulfill your guidance...

1304537.text: It's getting better! I wish I could dress like this all the time!

1304538.text: Dressing like this is even more wonderful than I imagined!

1304539.text: Whether it's gift-giving or a fight, I'll take it seriously.

1304541.text: I am supposed to be the one giving gifts. What's in it? I'm so curious now.

1304542.text: Are you in a daze? Don't you feel cold standing there alone?

1304543.text: A stranger? It's okay to give you a gift...

1304544.text: What secrets are hidden in the endless blizzard? How intriguing...

1304545.text: The long winters are hard to get through, so we decided to spend the nights together and give hope to others.

1304546.text: Do you have such festivals in your world? Will many other girls hand you many gifts?

1304547.text: So... What kind of gift do you want? Oh, I'm sorry to ask you such an odd question. It's because... you see... you've always taken good care of me, and I would like to repay you. As long as I can manage, please don't hesitate. Tell me, what do you desire?

1304548.text: Am I pretty... Do you really mean it?

1304549.text: Aah! You're so... Ah! The gifts are dropped.

1304551.text: I'm not used to... dressing like this.

1304552.text: Have you noticed that I'm wearing something different?

1304554.text: I can't believe it's not snowing here...

1304555.text: Want to come along to hand out gifts?

1304557.text: I'm Celanya. This dress of the blessing ceremony is really not my style...

1304558.text: No matter what I wear, they can't hide the passion inside me... Just kidding.

1304559.text: Let's go to the blessing ceremony together.

1304561.text: Can you feel the blessing wind blowing on your face?

1304562.text: It's harder than I expected to prepare presents.

1304563.text: When I was a child, I used to skate on the Frozen Lake. But that place is already occupied by the wolf pack...

1304564.text: Heaven has long been the paradise for the mortal. In my wildest dream, I shook off the shackles and offered you my earnest love and devotion.

1304567.text: My father, Silverbow, and I are guarding the peace of the village. We won't let our guard down, even during the ceremony!

1304574.text: The bell of blessings rings again!

1304577.text: It's been a long time since I last stepped out of my room, and it's nice to move around once in a while so my body won't get stiff.
