1304578.text: I would also like to give it a good try.

1304579.text: I love the feel of the sea breeze caressing my cheeks, gentle and comfortable.

1304581.text: You're giving it to me? Thank you so much! This is the best memory of this summer!

1304582.text: Don't look at me like that... I'm not used to dressing like this...

1304583.text: Sorry, I'm not used to greeting strangers...

1304584.text: The sun is so blinding... Is this umbrella too small?

1304585.text: Do I look cute in my swimsuit? Whoo-hoo!

1304586.text: Everything here exudes breaths of life. Even the pain in my body has been relieved.

1304587.text: I'm not used to dressing like this... However, it's a rare trip to the beach. Want to swim together? Let's create some good memories this summer.

1304589.text: Stop... I don't have much confidence in my body shape.

1304590.text: Stop pinching my face... I won't laugh anyway...

1304591.text: What do you want? I hate this...

1304592.text: My legs are getting thicker... I knew it would happen since I haven't been out recently.

1304594.text: Im envious of others. My weak body... can't even manage the basics...

1304595.text: Don't expect too much from me...

1304596.text: My legs feel so heavy... Can we rest now?

1304597.text: Do you need my help? Though I have little confidence, Id like to give it a try...

1304598.text: I'll try my best to meet your expectations...

1304599.text: Can we go somewhere not too far?

1304600.text: Rest if you're tired, don't push yourself too hard.

1304601.text: This swim ring? I'm not confident in my stamina, so I've brought this, just in case.

1304602.text: One day, I will also be devoured by the magic in my body...

1304603.text: My past? Sorry, I don't really want to talk about it... Only painful memories remain now.

1304604.text: There may be a glimmer of hope in my future...

1304607.text: Thank you for coming to the beach with me. I haven't been out for such a long time.

1304609.text: Why do we have to hurt each other...

1304614.text: I'm not used to it yet, but I can still fight...

1304615.text: Sorry, I'm still not used to direct sunlight...

1304619.text: Exploration can be very hard. You should have a good rest.

1304620.text: The blessing of Lunia will light up your soul.

1304621.text: Let me offer you a dance to soothe you.

1304622.text: Have some sleep if you're tired, don't push yourself too hard.

1304623.text: Let the aroma of flowers ease you.

1304624.text: Welcome back. Let me play a song for you.

1304625.text: Tired? Come take a nap on the back of this kid.

1304626.text: You're back. Well... Not that over-happy about your return.

1304627.text: Rest if you're tired. Get pumped up for the next battle.

1304628.text: A break between quests can be very important.

1304629.text: Finally, you're back. Waiting for you? No, I never waited for you!

1304630.text: You're back. Want to go to the training ground to practice with me?

1304631.text: Welcome back. Wanna play with me?

1304632.text: Working for a long time would really put stress on our bodies.

1304633.text: Welcome back. It's my destiny to follow you.

1304635.text: I'm ready for the next party.

1304636.text: The Lord asked me to wait here for your return and embark on the same path with you.

1304637.text: Are you going to rest? Play one more round with me before then.

1304638.text: I've been waiting for you. I've found a new villain.

1304639.text: You're back. Fighting by your side is my honor!

1304641.text: The wind tells me you're back.

1304642.text: Come over here and have a drink with me.

1304643.text: Welcome back! Let's go make some dessert!

1304644.text: Let's take a short break and go hunting together.

1304645.text: It's Cynetia. I hear your voice. Hoo hoo!

1304646.text: You're finally back. I've been waiting for you long.

1304649.text: Don't push yourself. You look tired.

1304650.text: I've been waiting for you for a long time. Aha.

1304651.text: I haven't cleaned up here for a long time, for I'm just waiting for you to come back.

1304652.text: How arrogant you are to make me wait here.

1304653.text: All the long time passed, lies in my hands.

1304654.text: Get some rest. A new adventure is about to begin.

1304655.text: You've been working hard. You should get some rest.

1304656.text: Welcome back. I shall grant you the blessing of the elves.

1304657.text: Hungry. Let's go get something to eat.

1304658.text: I've been waiting so long that even I'm tired.

1304659.text: Welcome back. Don't worry. I'm used to waiting.

1304660.text: Muscle aches? Do you want me to massage you?

1304661.text: Have a good rest now, for we're going out to play later.

1304662.text: Get some rest if you're tired. I'll take care of you.

1304663.text: Welcome back. Do you have new creative materials for me?

1304664.text: It's so boring to stay here all the time. Let's go out and play!

1304665.text: I also want to see the outside world. Can you bring me along on your next adventure?

1304666.text: Don't worry, I'll take care of the guards here.

1304667.text: Your shoulders are stiff. Let me give you a massage.

1304668.text: Muscle aches? Don't worry, let's go to the spa!

1304669.text: Nannar is used to staying here alone. Don't worry about me, please.

1304670.text: My piety has touched God. It blessed your safe return.

1304671.text: Welcome back. I feel warm every time I see you.

1304672.text: It will be lonely to stay here alone.

1304673.text: Welcome back. Do you bring me new research material?

1304674.text: Thank you, Goddess, for her safe return.

1304675.text: If you don't come back, I might fall into a deep sleep like Lord Dana.

1304676.text: Go rest if you're tired. I'll be on guard here.

1304677.text: I'm used to waiting, so you don't have to worry about me.

1304678.text: I've been waiting for you. Come and give me a massage on my shoulders!

1304679.text: It would be wise to leave this to me, and I will always be on guard in your absence.

1304680.text: Welcome back. Please take me along on your next adventure.

1304681.text: Mortimer has been waiting for you for a long time. Welcome back.

1304749.text:
Inn and Lou are twin sisters. They were born in the Sanctuary, but due to their poor magic talent, they were regarded by the Ruler of the Sanctuary as defectives.

Naturally, they were treated coldly by other people there. These two sisters endured the pain they should not have suffered at their age.

1304750.text:
The twins struggled to survive in the corners of the Sanctuary. And the day finally came for them to meet the turning point in their lives.

Due to the monster invasion and the intensified conflicts between the Upper and Lower Domain, the Protector decided to make some use of the useless twins. She gave the twins the most humble work in the Sanctuary.

The so-called work is actually some shady work to deal with lower-class civilians or lower-level monsters. It didn't need too much magic to deal with those, after all.

1304751.text:
As if a ray of sunlight shot into the darkness, Inn and Lou came out of the shadows and became honored residents of Sanctuary who could serve the Protector.

They have no thoughts of their own, but mechanically carry out the orders from the Protector, eliminating the targets on the list, and then moving on to the next.

1304752.text:
The sisters' petite figures are their best cover. No one would have guessed that the seemingly innocent twins are the most cold-blooded assassins.

The two of them have an amazingly destructive power that does not match their appearance at all. When together, Inn and Lou never fail an assassination.

Here they got another order from the Protector. This time the target is the leader of the Alliance of the Rebellions.

1304768.text: Captain of the Frost Chivalric Order

1304778.text:
The soothsayer who appeared in the village according to the Witch's recollection. 
Irminsul is her hometown, and what appears in Chilora seems to be only her phantom. It is not clear who projected her phantom into Chilora. There seems to be a deep secret lurking behind it.

1304779.text: Once a human, he became a caterpillar due to the Magical Abnormality in Irminsul and was very worried about his brother, who went to find out the cause of the mutation.

1304780.text: Once a human, he tried to explore the cause of the Magical Abnormality in Irminsul but became a magical creature after his failure.

1304781.text: An orphan who grew up in a convent. She is often bullied by others. She is responsible for ringing the bell on the roof of the clock tower every night.

1304782.text: A merchant from the Irene Island. He took the form of a Treant due to the Magical Abnormality. Caught in the grief of losing his wife and son, he has pined away. He hopes to return to his hometown with the treasures that he once buried.

1304783.text: He used to be a sought-after singer. He became a sunflower after the Magical Abnormality and became extremely mentally unstable. It seems he has an abnormal obsession with being sought after.

1304784.text:
One of the Six Ovates who once practiced with Flare, the priestess of Irminsul. 
After discovering that Irminsul's catastrophe might affect Fomoire, she chose to return to her hometown and deal with the catastrophe with other Ovates.

1304785.text:
One of the Six Ovates of Fomoire who often sneaked into Irminsul for fun. 
Sensing the catastrophe in Irminsul, she quickly returned to Fomoire to report to Norn.

1304786.text: The head of the Six Ovates of Fomoire. After learning of the catastrophe in Irminsul, she decided to go to Irminsul to find out the cause of the catastrophe.

1304787.text: A sorcerer who can absorb the power of stars to maintain her beauty. Hearing that inside the Chrono Tower exists a magical potion for eternal youth, she decided to enter the tower and find the potion.

1304788.text: The leader of the hunters of the village at the mountain foot, leading the village to survive in the bitter cold.

1304789.text: The leader of the hillside hunters. In order to compete for hunting territory, his people often quarrel with Silverbow's men and even attacked them.

1304790.text: The leader of the Wolf Pack, whose original habitat was occupied by Hervoraltar, had to lead the pack to the hillside. Often clashes with humans.

1304791.text: The mount of Protector Cersivey. It is so ferocious that it can easily rip enemies apart with its sharp talons.

1304792.text: The captain of the Frost Chivalric Order, loyal to Protector Cersivey. He is ordered to guard the gate of the Glacial Castle, forbidding anyone to enter.

1304793.text: A little wolf injured in the trap. Got rescued by the Witch and brought back to its mother.

1304794.text: A girl curled up in the corner of the cave, with all her body already frozen. She was found and saved by the Witch.

1304795.text:
An eccentric Sorcerer. Her mind can be as unpredictable as a child's. She often throws tantrums. 
Lilia is her friend, and they often play together.

1304796.text: Princess of the Principality of Holmgard, who yearns for the outside world and often sneaks out of the castle. She has a good relationship with Pakane.

1304797.text: A former Deliverer, who, however, broke the oath and signed a contract with demons. She now reaps the souls of the living.

1304798.text: Very afraid to talk with others and often makes a variety of strange noises. Unwilling to have too much contact with the outside world.

1304799.text: The daughter of Silverbow, who has absolute confidence in her archery skills.

1304800.text: The vice captain of the Frost Chivalric Order. She seems to have encountered some accident when she was sent by the Protector on a special mission. No one has ever seen her since her departure.

1304801.text:
She used to be a subordinate of Ereshkigal. After Ereshkigal was sealed, she had been looking for opportunities to avenge her master. 
After discovering the Geothermy, she decided to use it to destroy Snegurochka, ruled by Cersivey.

1304804.text: Monsters in Phantom Mirror of Stars

1304819.text: Those who collapse shall be devoured.

1304850.text:
Unlike the many courtires and socialites of Muntenian royalty, Matveiffe preferred her peace and quiet out on deserted balconies and gardens. She spent many nights staring into space, enraptured by the stars in the sky.
Those around her gossiped behind her back, pointing out her antisocial tendencies, but Matveiffe herself paid them no mind.

1304851.text:
One day, Matveiffe heard the call of a mysterious voice. "Join us, young one. Here, you will come to know the truth of the world."
Fascinated by the unknown, she left home without a word, following the mysterious voice calling her to adventure.

1304852.text:
After Matveiffe's disappearance, people guessed at where she had gone; lost in the wildnerness on a stargazing trip gone awry, or eloped with some peasant boy in the country. They soon put the strange stargazing girl out of their minds.
Several years later, Matveiffe's return sent shockwaves through Muntenia. She was, however, no longer the same stargazing girl they once knew. Her cold gaze belied her perception of the frequencies that bound all things, and her manipulation of those same frequencies to warp, crush and otherwise destroy everything she laid eyes on.

1304853.text:
The Muntenian leadership quickly found Matveiffe. They had been desperate to find anything or anyone that could stand up to the monster of Pannoniathe Annihilator of Existence. And in Matveiffe, they found their answer.
"The mind is prone to deviate. All I do is correct it, while creating new deviations."

1304861.text: You want to know the trick to becoming powerful? Hehe, it's a seee-cret

1304862.text: The bigger they are, the more determined I am to cut them down to size!

1304863.text: This is for me? Can I open it up?

1304864.text: I heard that you had a gift for me! I've been waiting since yesterday! I love gifts! You know that, don't you?

1304865.text: I feel good today! Let's go to the beach and run to our hearts' content!

1304867.text: You wanna train together? Sure, it wouldnt kill me to team up with you.

1304868.text: Wanna know the secret to a perfect slash? Raise your sword like this, over the head, aim at your target, and ha! Simple, isn't it?

1304869.text: No matter if it's for real or just training, every time you're here, I always give it my all. Its just incredible like magic!

1304870.text: You gotta warm up before hitting the water. Your body's so stiff! Lay down, I'll give you a massage~ How's that? Feel good? Hehe, I can see from the satisfied look on your face... Well, it's not impossible for you to get daily massages from now on...

1304871.text: Stop it, my hair's getting fuzzy...

1304873.text: Pranks like this are not funny.

1304874.text: Ah... I won't pull my punches if you keep that up!

1304875.text: Stop that, you almost tripped me!

1304876.text: Strenuous training always leads to satisfying results. No pain, no gain!

1304877.text: Don't just stand there, we're starting a new round of training!

1304879.text: Oh? You wanna take a break? But this is just a warm-up for me.

1304880.text: Suigetsu feels refreshed to start the day! Don't just stand there, let's go have fun by the water.

1304882.text: Keep up! Let's get to adventuring!

1304883.text: After all that, it'll be good to get some rest.

1304884.text: Watermelon is perfect for a hot day like this! My recommendation? A sprinkle of salt on the watermelon!

1304885.text: Cute hairpin, isn't it? My mom got it for me when I got first place at the Seaside Sprint.

1304886.text: Summer is awesome! The sun goes down late, so we can train all day long!

1304887.text: I feel light as a feather! Looks like I'm in tip-top shape today. Ain't gonna lose a thing!

1304890.text: When it comes to competitions, I never lose. The higher the stakes, the more in the zone I get. I'm not called the Seaside Hypebeast for nothing... Huh? That doesn't mean what I think it does...?

1304892.text: Its time for me to shine.

1304893.text: One strike... is all I need!

1304897.text: I can hit every target even when blindfolded!

1304898.text: Ugh... The mind is willing, but the flesh is weak.

1304900.text: Don't look at me like that. I already finished training...

1304901.text: A little embarrassing, dressed like this, but I still have what it takes!

1304902.text: Am I up to the task? Whether I am or not, I'll still give it my all.

1304903.text: Someone gave you a gift? Nice... Oh, it's for me? Thanks, I guess...

1304904.text: Can I really have this? But it's such a precious gift...

1304905.text: Are you zoning out? I've just finished warming up. Lets go for a swim now.

1304906.text: I'm good at nothing except making trouble, so you're better off staying away...

1304907.text: Sorry, I'm not used to talking to people. I just want to enjoy this rare trip to the beach.

1304908.text: A breeze that plucks the heartstrings, and blue skies that stretch beyond the horizon. My thanks, God of the Ocean, for this moment of calm.

1304909.text: Embarrassing, isn't it? I might as well be wearing nothing...

1304910.text: The ocean at dusk... It's almost golden. I feel a bit nostalgic, even though it's my first time watching the sun set over the water. I'm getting tired... Can I lean on you? If I close my eyes, everything falls away except the waves... and the two of us, as if we're the only ones left in the world...

1304912.text: Hey, hey! Stop yanking! The swimsuit's going to tear!

1304913.text: Aah! Don't scare me like that. Do I have sand on my face?

1304914.text: No groping... even if it's you...

1304915.text: Massage? It sure doesn't feel like a massage...

1304916.text: There are no strangers around, right...

1304917.text: The board? It helps me float on the water. Lying on the board, I can enjoy the sun and the ocean.

1304918.text: That's so far away... Do we have to go?

1304919.text: I'm so tired. I'm heading back...

1304920.text: Can you... keep your distance, please? Sorry, I'm not used to talking with strangers...

1304921.text: I'll give it a try, but... don't hold your breath.

1304922.text: Want to go on an adventure? Can't go too far though...

1304923.text: Oof... I haven't worked out in a while. Can we take a break?

1304924.text: Strolling like this reminds me of when I used to play by the ocean. The crystal-clear water, with the sunlight spilled over it, looks like a field of sparkling gems.

1304925.text: I'd be laughed out of the village if I went back wearing this...

1304926.text: Is this swimsuit the right size? It feels a little snug...

1304927.text: Let's cut ourselves some slack in this heat...

1304930.text: I am Symbriette. The God of the Ocean entrusted these waters to me. Even though I can't seem to do anything right... I'll still try my hardest!

1304932.text: Leave. I don't want to hurt you.

1304933.text: The God of the Ocean's Protection...

1304936.text: I don't want to... give up... just yet.

1304937.text: We got them all... Ow! I bit my tongue...

1304938.text: At the bottom of the ocean... lies fathomless darkness.

1304945.text: Hailing from Sunrise Island in the east, Suigetsu is a complete departure from the dignified ladies people have come to expect from the Island. Jovial, outgoing, and entirely unflappable, Suigetsu loves making new friends.

1304951.text: A mysterious woman who only appears at the shore during summer. Clad in an exotic swimsuit, she frolics in the water as if there is no one around.$B$$B$In the presence of strangers, she becomes self-conscious and distant.$B$$B$She is rumored to be an elf tasked with guarding the ocean, but no one can be sure.$B$$B$She always darts away and swims out into the deep the moment someone strikes up a conversation.

1304959.text: A breed of octopus enamored with collecting pearls.

1304960.text: A breed of crab scattered across the shallows and beaches, with a permanently cheerful disposition.

1304961.text: A seahorse with wings made of coral, unusually entrancing.

1304962.text: Legend has it that mermaids only appear at dusk, luring ships in with their enchanting voices.

1304963.text: A mysterious aquatic dragon that lives in the deep sea, with a dazzling collection of coral decorating its tail.

1304964.text: Do the massive pincers of this gargantuan crustacean make it the ruler of the deep, or does the gilded crown on its head confer aquatic authority? You decide.

1304965.text: In the waters south of Sunrise Island, there is a nameless island, where Sea Elves are said to surface.$B$$B$When the adventurous Suigetsu heard the news from the caravan, she seemed ready and primed for another fun and playful adventure.

1304966.text: When the right seafaring weather finally came, Suigetsu, who had already prepared for the long journey, packed her luggage and boarded the merchant ship that brought the news.$B$$B$Although the captain reminded her that they had no intention to linger, which meant that Suigetsu would have to explore the island alone.$B$$B$Suigetsu didn't care that one bit. As long as she could reach the island, she would be satisfied.

1304967.text: The nameless island gradually coming into the view of Suigetsu, the merchant ship would soon dock.$B$$B$The weather was clear and sunny, perfect for an adventure.$B$$B$Still on the ship, the captain repeatedly warned Suigetsu of the dangers ahead, but all this did not dampen Suigetsu's spirits. She was confident in her expertise and her ability to protect herself.$B$$B$The captain, knowing that nothing can dissuade her, said his farewells and sailed away.$B$$B$As the mast disappeared over the horizon, Suigetsu took her first steps on the adventure she had pined after for so long.

1304968.text: Symbriette wasn't much of a conversationalist.$B$$B$Some have said that her shy and introverted nature has led to a natural fear of socialization. Others have guessed at some major trauma from a past attempt to connect with someone, leaving wounds that still haven't healed. Some even say that she only speaks some unknown Elven tongue, and is incapable of communicating with humans.

1304969.text: Symbriette's mother once told her a story about clear bottles filled with sand, dropped on the beach by visiting Sea Elves. It is said that those who collected these bottles would be richly rewarded by the Sea Elves.$B$$B$Insisting on the truth behind the legend, Symbriette often paces the beach in the hopes of finding one such bottle.

1304970.text: Though honored to be named the creatures in her wildest dreams, Symbriette was nonetheless shocked by her moniker of "Sea Elf". The Sea Elves, if they did exist, were shrouded in mystery.$B$$B$If they did turn up, Symbriette would be first in line to visit them.

1304974.text: A watermelon-like monster renowned for its tough rind, often appearing in droves.

1304975.text: A watermelon-like monster renowned for its tough rind, acting alone a lot.

1304976.text: A watermelon-like monster renowned for its tough rind, acting alone a lot.

1304980.text: I kinda like this new me, but I'm not sure if this body of mine is still fit for purpose...

1304981.text: Could my effort earn the favor of the god?

1304982.text: It's been a while since someone gave me a gift. Thank you.

1304983.text: Such a precious gift. How am I to repay you...?

1304984.text: Are you zoning out too? Looks like I'm not alone in this habit.

1304985.text: You are...? I'm sorry, I've lost my memory and I don't recognize you.

1304986.text: I'm a jinx. Don't come near me. I don't want you to get hurt...

1304987.text: You like reading too? Then you must be a good person... You want us to read together? But I prefer to read alone...

1304988.text: My vision is fading, and my fingers are losing sensation... Maybe it won't be long before I forget you. You want to create an unforgettable memory with me? But.. wouldn't that add to your pain? I will disappear someday. Could be tomorrow, could be...

1304989.text: I can't control my emotions. If this goes on, I'm afraid I will hurt you. But I don't want you to leave... Oh, I've never felt so messed up since I lost my memory. Is this the price to pay for growing attached to someone...?

1304990.text: Stop it. You're bringing back bad memories for me.

1304991.text: The god will never forgive a sin like that.

1304993.text: Don't be like that. You'll get punished by the god...

1304995.text: I like it here. I can go outside without worrying about being blinded by the sun.

1304996.text: I lose track of time when I read.

1304997.text: It doesn't look very complicated. I think I can do it.

1304998.text: I'm so tired. Let's go back together?

1304999.text: You sure you want to choose me? I'm a wanderer with no past. I will only bring you misfortune...

1305000.text: I will fight at your side. But don't get your hopes high.

1305001.text: May the god bless the road ahead.

1305002.text: Don't push yourself too hard. Take a break if you're tired.

1305003.text: Perhaps not remembering the past is a blessing for me.

1305004.text: I'm disillusioned about the future because I've lost everything.

1305005.text: My hobby? Other than zoning out like this, reading is the only thing I enjoy.

1305006.text: You want to help me recover my memory? I appreciate it, but no thanks. If I chose to forget the past, it must be because it was too painful to remember...

1305008.text: My head hurts. I feel like it's gonna explode...

1305009.text: I'm a poor soul forsaken by the god. Don't expect anything from me. Maybe tomorrow you would completely slip my mind.

1305011.text: Is this a trial from the god?

1305013.text: It's a scar that never heals...

1305016.text: No one shall act against the way the god intended.

1305017.text: Just like I thought... this body... is too weak...

1305019.text: Bwa... ha... haha... Now you can see what I'm capable of!

1305021.text: Can't you see I am the strongest!? Bwa... ha... haha...

1305023.text: That's for me? Then give it to me already!

1305024.text: Quit spacing out. We still have a lot of work to do.

1305025.text: Stop staring at me like that. You're grossing me out.

1305026.text: You wanna be friends with me? Don't be ridiculous. You will only be a burden to me.

1305027.text: What are you afraid of? I'm not mad. Do I look like someone who easily gets mad?

1305028.text: You wanna escape from me? I don't easily give up what's mine.

1305029.text: If only we could be together forever... Ah... What are you doing here? You saw all that? It's not what it looks like, you idiot! Ugh, stop it, you're the worst! You're just a tool to me, understand? A tool, nothing more... Humph...

1305032.text: Keep your dirty hands to yourself!

1305033.text: Stop it. You're gonna give me nightmares!

1305036.text: This is your home? Hmm... you've got taste.

1305037.text: Are we going to eliminate the new heretics?

1305039.text: As an Executor of the Holy Church, it's my duty to eliminate all heretics.

1305040.text: Since you asked so nicely, I guess I could help...

1305041.text: Let's wipe out the heretics lurking in the dark.

1305042.text: So tired. Could use a breather...

1305043.text: Don't underestimate me. I am the strongest!

1305044.text: It's so dark out here. Are you not scared? Um... I'm not scared. I teamed up with you only 'cause I pity you for being alone.

1305045.text: I'm surprised you know spells that I don't. You're not useless after all.

1305046.text: Fellagood's orders are absolute. My job is to carry them out at all costs.

1305049.text: Those corrupted by darkness shall be brought to justice!

1305055.text: You wanna challenge me? How foolish! You will regret your weakness in hell!

1305056.text: Fine, rejoice while you still can 'cause one of these days, I will destroy every last one of you...

1305059.text: The power's surging through me... Wanna go outdoors and find out what it can do?

1305060.text: You scared? You should be. 'Cause I'm bursting with power!

1305062.text: I'm surprised that you, a human, know our preferences, haha. So tell me, what do you want in return?

1305063.text: Quit zoning out. Let's go out and play!

1305064.text: Oh, a stranger. What's up? You want to play with me?

1305065.text: Fret not. I'm a cat with an open mind. I have no problem getting along with humans.

1305066.text: You're different from other humans. You're interesting. I like you. Let's hang out!

1305067.text: I secretly left my own kind and came to the human world. Now that I think about it, I was such a daredevil! But if I wasn't, I wouldn't have met someone interesting like you!

1305068.text: If you dare to ignore me, I will bite off your head like I would a mouse. Hehehe, just kidding. Seriously, I hate being lonely though.

1305069.text: You like my ears? Hmm, guess there's no harm in letting you touch them a bit...

1305070.text: What are you doing, you insolent human!?

1305071.text: Meow... Can you touch me more?

1305072.text: Don't try to fool me. I know the ways of you humans!

1305074.text: Is there anything fun to do around here?

1305075.text: Call the others, ask them to join us!

1305076.text: Keep up! Let's go have fun!

1305077.text: That's it? I was just getting started!

1305078.text: This is the human world? It's so different from my world. I'm ready to wreak some havoc!

1305079.text: Let me join you guys. The more the merrier.

1305080.text: We're going to wreak some havoc? Right up my alley!

1305081.text: My stomach is growling and I feel weak... Gotta eat something first...

1305082.text: The Night Clan? A bunch of desperadoes. I have nothing to do with them.

1305083.text: You hungry? I suppose I could share my dried fish with you.

1305084.text: Why do I only show up at night? 'Cause I like sleeping in the daytime. Guess I'm what you humans call a "nocturnal animal."

1305085.text: My hobbies? Hmm, my favorite thing to do is sleep in the sun. Usually I wake up when the sun goes down. And that's when I start hunting for food!

1305088.text: I'm a cute kitten. My name's Betsy. Wanna play with me?

1305090.text: Wanna play with me? Mind you, I will not hold back.

1305095.text: Combat? Nothing to be afraid of. I brought them to their knees with only part of my strength.

1305096.text: Can't believe I was defeated. Ugh...

1305107.text: Born in an obscure village on Sunrise Island, Kamui could communicate with the god when she was little.$B$$B$As she got older, she has acquired psychic power strong enough to control everything around her with her mind.

1305108.text: But her power took a heavy toll on her body.$B$$B$Consequently, she lost control of it and wreaked havoc on her village, all the villagers dying in pain with their minds distorted.

1305109.text: Having lost her home, the girl suffered a mental breakdown that caused her to forget her past and gave her schizophrenia. And now she has two personalities living inside herTama and Kamui.$B$$B$Tama stays an innocent, harmless girl, while Kamui has inherited the ominous psychic power.$B$$B$Kamui can use her mind to manipulate people and even warp their psyches. But this dreaded power comes at the cost of a weary body and a nearly broken spirit.

1305110.text: The loss of memory did little to relieve her pain. Her vision was declining and her mind was growing fuzzy.$B$$B$She knew full well that one day she would lose control of her emotions and bring yet another disaster to this land.$B$$B$Instead of letting that happen, she thought she might as well make herself disappear, quietly. So she took her favorite books and left her village.$B$$B$No one has seen her ever since, and the only evidence of her existence is the painful memories she has left people with.

1305111.text: After being taken in by the Holy Church, Anemone was still as lonely as ever. Everyone feared her powers.$B$$B$Ostracized, the poor girl was often seen curled up in the corner.

1305112.text: The priest Fellagood soon noticed her and her special abilities and felt like he hit the jackpot.$B$$B$With a hidden agenda in mind, he convinced the Holy Church leadership to let him take Anemone with him to clean out heretics.$B$$B$He never taught her anything about the world, and only used her as a pawn to do his dirty work.

1305113.text: The kind-hearted Anemone was obviously not cut out for that kind of work. Every time she returned from a failed mission, she was met with brutal punishment. Fellagood even used a forbidden drug on her in an attempt to bring out her elemental powers.$B$$B$All this torment and suffering filled her with hatred of this worldof the indifference and despair pervading it.$B$$B$Finally, a mental breakdown, coupled with the onset of her elemental powers, transformed Anemone into a mindless puppet at the beck and call of the Holy Church.

1305114.text: Anemone, now with her soul broken, was regarded by Fellagood as his proudest work. She blindly followed his orders and slaughtered her targets without batting an eye. The church leadership had little control over her.$B$$B$Fellagood, who had long held resentment against the church, finally located the Sacred Relic. His plan, which had been years in the making, was close to being fulfilled. He upped the dosage of the forbidden drug to kill what little humanity remained in Anemone and turn her into his slave.$B$$B$When all was set, he took her into the forbidden Chrono Tower.

1305115.text: A festive mood filled the air as Halloween approached.$B$$B$However, the magistrate had been receiving reports of food going missing at nightfood people carefully prepared for the upcoming holiday. Some eyewitnesses described a fluffy black thing flashing by. Some said it was an agile girl.$B$$B$As similar complaints kept coming in, the magistrate decided to take action: he put some delicious food on a stall and then hid in the dark to watch.$B$$B$Sure enough, when night fell, that mysterious black figure showed up.

1305116.text: "There you are, you damn thief!"$B$$B$The magistrate sneaked up on the target, chest filled with anger, only to find, to his utter surprise, that it was a cute cheerful girl, one with a pair of eye-catching ears.$B$$B$Her feasting was interrupted by the magistrate. She explained that she had no ill intent and that she was only attracted there by the smell of food. After a brief talk with the girl, the magistrate realized she was just an innocent girl clueless about how human society works.$B$$B$So instead of punishing her, he invited her to his home. In no time at all, the cat spirit Betsy became friends with the magistrate's daughter.

1305117.text: Betsy used to live in the woods away from human society like the rest of her kind. When she was little, she heard her parents mention a species called human.$B$$B$"Those short-eared creatures never listen to reason. And they're very rude, too. They want to catch us and make us their pets. How ridiculous is that? We're the noble cat spirits, for Christ's sake. We have nothing in common with those docile kittens they keep in their homes."$B$$B$Her parents' rant only made Betsy curious about humans, planting in her the idea of seeing the human world for herself.

1305118.text: Finally, Betsy's curiosity reached a fever pitch, and in the face of her parents' opposition, she left the woods and ran into the human worldthe place she had been longing for.$B$$B$The busy streets, the bustling peopleeverything looked so refreshing and interesting to the uninitiated eyes of the innocent cat spirit. Excited, she had forgotten her parents' words of caution and was ready to plunge herself into an unknown world.

1305129.text: This melody is dedicated to you.

1305133.text: For you, I offer my songs, which can reach even the Underworld.

1305134.text: Even the most beautiful song shall come to an end...

1305136.text: Huh? Getting to be more popular?

1305137.text: You picked this new song for me? It's a bit hard, but I'll try!

1305139.text: Audience? Sorry, I'm not quite used to singing in front of a crowd...

1305140.text: Are you here to support me? But... Mayahuel doesn't allow me to have too much contact with Humans...

1305141.text: It's actually troublesome to have such long hair. It takes a long time to take care of my hair after I get up every morning...

1305142.text: I really admire those who can compose music and write lyrics. Mayahuel always teaches me new tunes.

1305143.text: Welcome home. Want to take a bath, or eat something, or... Huh? I heard that humans will be happy to hear this... Seems that it's only between those who are very close... Um... sorry, please forget what I said, I'm not ready for this yet...

1305144.text: Is it a gift from a caring fan? Thanks.

1305145.text: Ah, you... you picked this especially for me? Thank you, I will cherish it...

1305146.text: Too many people out there... Please don't...

1305148.text: At this time... You are so cunning...

1305151.text: Fascinated? But my voice isn't that moving...

1305152.text: You are not allowed to have any physical contact with an idol...

1305153.text: I'm preparing for the next song. Don't distract me... please...

1305155.text: Is the performance over? Everyone looks so happy!

1305156.text: I am Flora. Although I do not know why I am standing on this stage, I will try my best!

1305157.text: Together on stage? But so many people here... I'm a little scared.

1305158.text: A new stage? Wait for me!

1305159.text: This is... the melody of recovery.

1305160.text: My father? Sorry, Mayahuel only talked to me about my mother.

1305161.text: Do you also like this song? Well... my mother taught it to me. Every time I hear this melody, I think of my mother, long sleeping in the void...

1305162.text: Don't stare at me... I... I don't like it.

1305163.text: Mayahuel once told me that with the noblest bloodline, I should avoid falling into the void like my mother... When I was a child, I always wondered why I couldn't contact Humans. But now I began to understand because I can feel the pain and loneliness of my sleeping mother...

1305166.text: Flora of the Forest of Elves, I swear by my mother's name that my song will help you.

1305169.text: Born into nobility, Dorin has had a keen interest in magic since her childhood and became a genius in the eyes of others. $B$$B$Her father, an earl advanced in years, cherished this little daughter so he hired a famed sorcerer from Upper Domain to help her practice magic.

1305170.text: As she grew up, Dorin was no longer content to just learn from books. $B$$B$In spite of the opposition from her master, she built her own magic workshop and started conducting magic experiments, something she had long since hoped to do.

1305171.text: Straying from traditional magic research, Dorin took a whimsical approach to her experiments: she developed a potion used to boost magic and directly ran tests on herself. $B$$B$The old earl was very concerned and had tried time and again to stop his daughter's risky project. $B$$B$However, Dorin brushed off her father's opposition. For her, the excitement of exploring the unknown far outweighed the risk.

1305172.text: Recently, Dorin developed an obsession with magic puppets. She took to spending all night in her workshop building new puppets.$B$$B$The earl, in an attempt to change his daughter's lifestyle and get her out of the workshop, decided to let her host the Dazzling Stage contest.

1305182.text: The Protector of Snegurochka and the Saintess revered by the Frost Chivalric Order. She lives in the Glacial Castle up the mountain. No resident near the mountain has ever seen her face.

1305183.text: Adept in ice magic, she appears to be as cold and apathetic as the endless blizzard around her. $B$$B$She keeps her distance from others and leaves all affairs concerning Snegurochka to her loyal chevaliers.

1305184.text: Snegurochka has been ruled by her for thousands of years. It is said that before it became this frozen world, Snegurochka was covered by lush greens and was warm all year round. It was a place where humans and animals lived in peace, but things are completely different now.

1305185.text: Outsiders take her for a ruthless tyrant, but her love for Snegurochka runs deep. She is willing to do anything to save this world. $B$$B$The blizzard around here seems to have something to do with her.

1305186.text: A mysterious girl from the Forest of Elves. This was her first time away from home, so she kept a cautious distance from strangers. But she was curious all the same and carefully observed everything going on around her.

1305187.text: For generations, the Forest of Elves had been the peaceful abode of the High Elves, but then the rise of the Floating Isles of Cassiel shattered the peace. $B$$B$Excessive exposure to sunlight caused the trees to stop growing, and withering crept in from the forest's edge. Worse, monsters began flying up from the ground to invade the forest. $B$$B$The downfall of the Forest of Elves seemed inevitable...

1305188.text: Seeing all this, Flora realized that the Elves alone would never bring salvation. $B$$B$They required the help of that which they most despisedHumans. They needed manpower to provide magic, as well as the money to build sunlight-abating facilities. Only then could tranquility be restored to the Forest of Elves.

1305189.text: For Flora, that was too long a shot. But still, she set aside her misgivings and joined the teamshe would get on the Dazzling Stage and become an idol. $B$$B$She trained hard every day toward that end. But things didn't go as smoothly as she had hoped. Difficulties abounded. A gloomy future awaited Forest of Elves...

1305190.text: The wicked can never escape my judgment!

1305195.text: Weaklings should quit now. Don't throw your lives away challenging me.

1305198.text: Without power, one can change nothing.

1305199.text: I'll do whatever it takes to save Snegurochka...

1305200.text: I will cherish this divine power and use it to build a better future for Snegurochka...

1305201.text: Outsider, turn around now. Humans cannot survive the storm on the mountain top. You will die in vain.

1305202.text: No one can stop me, even you. Once I've chosen a path, moving forward is the only option... no matter what it takes...

1305203.text: Transforming Snegurochka takes time. As time goes on, more lives will be lost. But even so, I cannot stop the blizzard... I must save this world.

1305204.text: As the Protector, I've been watching over this world for thousands of years, but I couldn't stop it from falling apart. I guess there are limits to my power after all... Perhaps you're the real hope for this world. Outsider, can I put my faith in you?

1305205.text: My world is in shambles. To restore it to its former grandeur will take years. We will need not only the Frost Chivalric Order but also the strength of the people in this land. Apart from that, your... Never mind. I was just thinking, it would have been splendid if you could stay and rebuild this world with me. As your reward, please tell me your wish. I will do everything in my power to make it happen...

1305207.text: I will not turn away people's admiration. Your kindness is well received.

1305208.text: Are you treating me like I'm a little girl? That's very impudent of you, audacious one.

1305209.text: Don't insult my intelligence. I abandoned boring feelings long ago...

1305210.text: How rude! Get your dirty hand off me!

1305211.text: How dare you insult the Protector? Your sins can only be atoned for with your life!

1305212.text: Filthy being, get down on your knees.

1305213.text: You'll lose your way if you lose sight of faith. Wasting time here can only lead to more unnecessary deaths.

1305214.text: I never thought I'd see the world outside of Snegurochka again...

1305215.text: The architecture around here is so plain. As a Witch, don't you have expectations?

1305216.text: Are you trying to manipulate me?

1305217.text: This job is way too easy.

1305218.text: The only way to save my Snegurochka is to forget the past and let the snow cover this land...

1305219.text: Do you long for my help?

1305220.text: I must act soon to save the world.

1305221.text: A warm breeze... When was the last time that I felt it?

1305222.text: Having abandoned all feelings, I will not be lost again, nor will I ever repeat my mistakes.

1305223.text: Shortsighted fools cannot bear the heavy burden of building the future.

1305224.text: This world is mine. No outsider's help is needed. Only God can help me.

1305225.text: The chevaliers of the Frost Chivalric Order are my faithful servants who maintain order in this world. Any chaos will be nipped in the bud by the Order. Hervoraltar? That big baby doesn't believe in working hard. All he cares about is having a full belly and enjoying life...

1305226.text: (A faint smile from the icy beauty)

1305228.text: I am Cersivey, Protector of Snegurochka. People respect me as their Saintess. I have been guarding this world for thousands of years.

1305230.text: Killing you with magicthat's not what I want.

1305235.text: Magic can easily take your life. If you're not ready to accept that, leave now.

1305236.text: Don't give up just yet. My magic will light up your path...

1305238.text: All I can do is more skillfully practice the magic bestowed upon me by the demons.

1305239.text: Magic shining on my fingertipsheed my orders!

1305240.text: I have long pledged my body and soul to the demons. This burning magic is the proof.

1305241.text: My magic is dangerous. Leave, strangers. I don't want to hurt the innocent.

1305242.text: Fighting? I don't like fightingit's a waste of time. I'm off to study magic now. My student will do the fighting.

1305243.text: Making a pact with the demons? Sure, I'm willing to do anything to gain magic. But I will not be controlled by demons, no. To me, they're just a means to an end.

1305244.text: What am I looking at? Ah, I'm gazing at the frozen harbor. My hometown is on the other side of the sea. I've never been back since I came to Holmgard. The people here need me. They need my magic like a ship needs a lighthouse in the dark.

1305245.text: When we're apart, I can't help missing you. When we're together, I don't know what to talk about... Am I boring you with this? If you're tired, lie down for a bit. I will keep you company, always. My magic will keep you warm and light up your path. Sounds a little clichd? But I don't know what else to say. Anyway, when I'm with you, my heart always beats a little faster... especially on a night like this...

1305246.text: Is this the gift you carefully prepared for me? I'll take it.

1305247.text: This is... for me? You're so thoughtful. What should I give you in return? Let me see...

1305249.text: Get your hands off or I'll burn you to a crisp.

1305252.text: Go away. I hate physical contact!

1305253.text: This is no time to space out. We've still got a lot to do.

1305254.text: Is this your home? Nice taste.

1305255.text: Shall we throw a tea party?

1305258.text: My world is made up of one thingmagic, the purest kind. If you desire to seek the root of magic, I guess I could teach you a thing or two.

1305261.text: Work should be followed by rest. Want a cup of black tea?

1305262.text: La Crima is so sentimental. Even the sight of fallen leaves makes her cry.

1305263.text: Curious about my age? It's a secret. Only the demons know... You want to know too? Fine, I'll tell you. I'm only 18.

1305264.text: The joy of research? Hmm, I can't quite put it into words. Except that the mere thought of finding those lost magic spells fills me with excitement.

1305265.text: Lilia is my best student. That kid is unlike meshe's pure and innocent. She's an excellent sorcerer. She has what it takes to lead the people in this land. Me? I'm only interested in the study of magic. I leave the fighting to my students.

1305268.text: My name is Nasha, a tutor hired by the Grand Duke of Holmgard. Now I teach magic in the capital. You're interested in my lessons? Don't worry. I only teach simple magic, the kind that anyone with a smattering of talent can master.

1305278.text: An anomaly that has absorbed little ice magic.

1305279.text: An anomaly that has abosorbed lots of ice magic.

1305280.text: A ferocious monster covered with thick fur.

1305281.text: A humanoid evil spirit that manipulates cold air.

1305282.text: A tree-shaped monster that has gone berserk after being affected by ice magic.

1305283.text: A giant monster manipulated by the ice crystal core to repel any intruder.

1305284.text: A fierce beast that always stares shrewdly at his target before launching an attack.

1305292.text: The Beast Nian, a monster that fears nothing but Fortune and firecrackers

1305298.text: A mage from the Principality of Holmgard in the Far North, hailed as the "Scarce Mage".$B$$B$She's able to cast long-lost forbidden magic.

1305299.text: She owes her strong magic power to the pact she made with the demons.$B$$B$The pact binds her to always protect the offspring of the demonsthat is, the royal family of the Principality of Holmgard. Hence she's also titled "Defender of the Far North".

1305300.text: Being a tutor for the royal family, she has finer taste than most people. Her noble status is revealed in the way she dresses.

1305301.text:
Her true passion lies in the study of magic. She spends most of her time in her yard, researching those long-lost magic spells.$B$$B$
Of her two students, Princess Lilia and La Crima, she seems to favor the latter. She has taught La Crima every Gem Magic spell she knows and often takes her to her tea parties.

1305354.text: Coming from the Sanctuary, she seems to have a hard time blending in human society and now lives as an outcast in a Lower Domain village.$B$$B$She is skilled at common healing spells and works as an apothecary in her village.

1305355.text: Tuonel rarely leaves home and only talks to the villagers she knows well. $B$$B$Her outstanding medical skills have endeared her to her fellow villagers, who often give her their crops as gifts. $B$$B$This is the kind of life Tuonel always wantssimple and peaceful.

1305356.text: With the Spring Festival on its way, the kind villagers have spruced up their village. $B$$B$Though not much of a talker, Tuonel longs to be part of the coming festive occasion and is trying to fit in with the humans.

1305357.text: The recent monster invasions of the Lower Domain leave many worried. $B$$B$To protect her village, Tuonel dusted off the Guardian Devil her mother left her. $B$$B$BBut having been kept away in the dark for too long, the Guardian Devil ran amok as soon as it awoke from its slumber, giving Tuonel quite a headache.

1305358.text: Kapla came from Principality of Muntenia where she used to live with her fellow tribesmen.$B$$B$She is full of curiosity about the world. Upon learning that humans were about to celebrate the Spring Festival, their most important occasion, she left the forest to visit the human town in its festive glory.

1305359.text: Everything in town looked so novel and outlandish to Kapla. The dazzling display of Spring Festival goodies, especially those culinary delicacies, made her mouth water. $B$$B$When the naive Kapla was done feasting at a barbecue stall and the vendor asked her to pay, she was totally confused.

1305360.text: More vendors came to demand payment from Kapla and had her surrounded. Kapla was unfazed and let out a beastly roar in anger. Before she could bite anyone, the poor vendors had run away screaming in horror.

1305361.text: Kapla may behave strangely because she is differently wired, but at heart she is a good kid. $B$$B$After staying in town for a while, she grew attached to humans and started playing around with themshe even took to pulling pranks on people. $B$$B$And just like that, this naughty girl miraculously blended in with the festive town.

1305362.text: Hope everyone will return in one piece...

1305364.text: Mother, I will do my best...

1305367.text: Staying safe and sound is a good start.

1305368.text: Sorry for getting off to a bad start...

1305370.text: Thank you. I will work hard alongside everyone!

1305371.text: This year, I will make changes!

1305372.text: I feel so light, like a snowflake.

1305373.text: Don't provoke this kid. He's the Guardian Devil my mother left me. He can be frightening when he gets angry...

1305374.text: It's so noisy outside... Are they celebrating the Spring Festival? I've never done that before. For me, the Spring Festival is just another day of reading alone in my room...

1305375.text: You want me to take a walk outside with you? But... I will scare people...

1305376.text: What do you think of this getup? This is my first time wearing something like this. Not sure if it suits me...

1305377.text: Mother once told me that I could return to human society one day. I always thought that was a pipe dream. But then I met you and I started to feel that I could overcome any obstacle if I had you by my side. So, we will return to the human world together, right?

1305378.text: Is this a gift for me?

1305379.text: Didn't expect I'd get such an amazing Spring Festival gift... Thank you...

1305380.text: You like this hair accessory too?

1305383.text: Don't scare me... I don't like pranks like this...

1305384.text: You like these shoes too? Let's go buy a pair!

1305385.text: Don't stand there like a lemon. Let's go out.

1305386.text: It's a little embarrassing to dress like this...

1305387.text: No strangers around here, yes? I'm a little scared...

1305388.text: You want me to do it? But I don't know if I can handle it...

1305390.text: I'm Tuonel. It's the Spring Festival. Shall we celebrate together?

1305392.text: You want to go out and have fun with me? But I'm not ready...

1305394.text: To celebrate the Spring Festival, I got up early and put on my new clothes.

1305395.text: Mother once told me that the Spring Festival is the most important festival of the year. We used to celebrate it when I was a kid...

1305396.text: "No snow in sight. Spring shall soon arrive." It means that this snow-free winter will soon be followed by a beautiful spring when we can go on outings together!

1305397.text: Oh, you want me to write a poem for the festival? But I'm afraid I don't have that kind of talent...

1305399.text: Are you really going to piss me off at such a happy festival?

1305400.text: I'm Tuonel. It's so glad to celebrate the Spring Festival with you. If it's okay with you, let's go visit the market!

1305402.text: Are you afraid now? I always bite back!

1305407.text: Haha, that's it? I haven't had enough fun yet!

1305408.text: We shall see. Next time I will win!

1305409.text: I'm going to bite you! Ooowhoo!

1305411.text: I'm all fired up and ready to go!

1305413.text: I'm hunting. Now get outta my way or I'll bite you!

1305414.text: Go away. I'm not in the mood. Huh? You can cheer me up? You mean you got me a new toy?

1305415.text: What is this? Some kind of the Spring Festival game? I wanna play too!

1305416.text: I get sleepy after eating... Come on, lie down and be my pillow! Any sudden movement and I'll bite you!

1305417.text: What a weirdo you are. I'm not a fan of humans, but I like you a lot. Let's be pals from now on! Don't worry. With me by your side, no one will dare to bully you anymore!

1305418.text: A gift for me? I accept it with pleasure!

1305420.text: Why did you touch my head?

1305422.text: My skin is really, really, really soft, unlike humans'!

1305423.text: This is the new dress I got from town. Pretty, isn't it?

1305424.text: Hands off or I'll kick your ass...

1305425.text: What's wrong? You look like an animal caught in a trap, completely freaking out...

1305426.text: Is this the new amusement park?

1305428.text: Ugh, looks like a lot of hassle!

1305429.text: See? I am the best at everything!

1305430.text: I am unrivaled. You think you can catch up to me? Wake up, hahaha!

1305431.text: Don't leave me alone. Let me play with you!

1305434.text: Wanna race me? I'm the fastest of the forest. You stand no chance against me!

1305435.text: Lazing around in the sun like this is such a waste of time. I've decided to go hunting today! I'd go nuts if I stop practicing.

1305436.text: You call me a fool? You are the fool! Only fools like to call other people fools!

1305437.text: You like pranks too? Haha, those scared faces are a sight to see!

1305440.text: I am Kapla. This is my forest. No one gets in here without my permission!

1305442.text: Amorai runs her own clinic in a small town in the Principality of Lunia.$B$$B$According to the townsfolk, every drug she prescribes is made by herself. All sorts of bizarre medical conditions could be cured by her.

1305443.text: Whenever someone tries to engage her in a friendly chat, she swerves off to an irrelevant subject and ends the conversation prematurely.$B$$B$Over time, people talk to her less and less. $B$$B$As a result, even though her medical skills are widely praised across town, her personal life remains little known.

1305444.text: Despite her eccentricities, Amorai is lauded as one of the most talented researchers in Lunia.$B$$B$Her academic accomplishments even made a splash among old scholars. $B$$B$But instead of being distracted by the accolades, Amorai buries herself in the study of medicine and arcane occultism.

1305445.text: There is a rumor in town that Amorai once raised a homeless girl as her own daughter and addressed her lovingly as "Honey."$B$$B$Her assistant disclosed that during that time Amorai pissed her off less often than she usually did. $B$$B$Although the girl verbally protested being called "Honey", she did what Amorai told her and went to school in town.

1305446.text: In a small town in the Principality of Lunia, there is a clinic, unusual but well-reputed. Sally is proud to work there as a nurse.$B$$B$She still remembers the day she recommended herself for the role. Doctor Amorai asked a lot of strange questions, but she took them in stride and answered with ease. $B$$B$"Just like that, I muddled through the test and got hired. It felt like a dream." Sally recalled.

1305447.text: In her early days on the job, Sally found herself insanely busy catering to Doctor Amorai's whims.$B$$B$For example, raise a cat and observe how it reacts to onions; collect nightingale tears and toad slime, and turn them into solids; adopt a human cub and treat her as a daughter...$B$$B$"Wait, 'human cub' is how Doctor Amorai calls it! It's a human girl, actually. And she's old enough for school now." Sally quickly corrected herself.

1305448.text: Sally has a love-hate relationship with her work.$B$$B$At first she thought she would work as a nurse in the clinic, but slowly she realized she was more like Doctor Amorai's assistant. The clinic stopped hiring since she joined, so she handles more work than a typical nurse.$B$$B$"To be more exact, it's just me and Doctor Amorai. The two of us can handle the day-to-day running of the clinic, yes, but..." Sally paused in mid-sentence.

1305449.text: Often after a long day at work, Sally goes to a roadside tavern to unwind.$B$$B$Her favorite drink is honey beerlow in alcohol and sweet on the palate.$B$$B$One time, Doctor Amorai forgot Sally's reminder again and let precious medicinal materials go to waste. Sally flew into a rage and didn't calm down until Doctor Amorai promised her a raise. $B$$B$"I hate to admit it, but she's really generous with me... Ahem, and... the honey beer's really good!" Sally said with a smile, and there was no more embarrassment on her face.$B$$B$Since Doctor Amorai is pretty tight-lipped about herself, I had to talk to her assistant.$B$From a resident of the town.

1305454.text: My experiment is not done yet...

1305455.text: Data collection complete. Tap to proceed to the next experiment!

1305456.text: No one can continue an experiment when lacking in strength, not even me.

1305458.text: The only way to test the limitless possibilities is through experiments.

1305459.text: Hehe, this is the fruit of my research...

1305460.text: Your presence inspires me to explore more possibilities.

1305461.text: I'm preparing for a new experiment. Do not disturb me.

1305462.text: I'm all set. What about you? The specially-made strength enhancer is ready for use.

1305463.text: Can't sleep? Hehe, don't worry, I got just the medicine for that but it may be at the cost of having nightmares. So, what do you say?

1305464.text: I secretly observed you last night and saw no change to your body... Looks like the experimental drug I slipped in your drink this morning didn't work. What a shame.

1305465.text: Give me a shoulder massage, make me a cup of black tea, then clean the lab floor. Your job is to serve me, no? Don't worry, I'll give you the new drug later, hehe. It'll work like a charm.

1305466.text: A thank-you gift for me? I'll take it.

1305467.text: A new experimental material? Hehe, you sure know how to please me.

1305469.text: I've been spying on you to see if you're up to no good...

1305470.text: Not fully awake? This relaxed state is perfect for experimentation.

1305471.text: Hehe, an experimenter must always stay curious.

1305472.text: Even though I don't do exercise, my legs are as slim as ever.

1305473.text: The experiment's about to begin. Now's not the time to space out.

1305474.text: Will this place serve as an inspiration for me?

1305475.text: Hehe, found a new experimental subject.

1305476.text: Shall we start a new experiment?

1305477.text: It's over just like that? But I haven't gathered enough data yet.

1305478.text: Wanna be my experimental subject? Hehe, relax, just kidding. Hey, try out my new potion.

1305479.text: Hehe, you wanna be my lab assistant?

1305481.text: Tired? Hehe, I just made a new drug that could restore your strength. Wanna try it?

1305482.text: Can't wait to prove my theory. Ugh, those average folks are too dumb to understand my experiment...

1305483.text: I'm all set. What about you? The specially-made strength enhancer is ready for use.

1305484.text: Is there anyone I have admired? It's rude of you to ask this. Of course, there are some, like the one that invented chocolate.

1305485.text: By the time I finally made progress with my research last night, it was already daybreak...

1305488.text: An experimenter must doubt everything and be ready to be doubted. Only someone as talented as you understand my theory.

1305490.text: Doc is waiting for me. Gotta end this combat soon.

1305495.text: Aw, don't worry. I'll protect you.

1305496.text: I'm sore all over my body... I can't fight anymore...

1305499.text: You made me stronger. Can you teach me some more?

1305500.text: Thank you. Now I can help more patients...

1305501.text: Here to see the doctor? Tell me your name, then take a number and wait in line.

1305502.text: I don't treat patients. The doctor does. The best I can do is cheer for you and try to relieve your pain.

1305503.text: This is the cake I just made. Wanna try it?

1305504.text: The doctor once made a truth potion that makes people tell the truth. I'm tempted to try it on you, but really there's no need... 'cause you won't lie to me, right?

1305505.text: Unlike other nobles, you're nice to everyone. But that's not a good thing, 'cause you'll end up hurting the person who cares about you the most. Why do I say that, you ask? Well, it's because...

1305507.text: Even the doctor doesn't know what I like... How could you know...?

1305508.text: Want me to take your temperature?

1305510.text: Is there something on my face?

1305511.text: I just bought this dress. Its style seems to be very popular among the girls in town.

1305512.text: I haven't done exercise in a while. My legs are getting fat...

1305514.text: Wow, such a beautiful yard. Are you one of those great nobles too?

1305515.text: You finally have some time off. Got any plans?

1305518.text: Welcome to our clinic. I'm Nurse Sally. Mind if I do a checkup on you?

1305520.text: Go on an adventure? But I've got patients to look after in the clinic...

1305521.text: I'm a little tired, but I'll be fine after a rest. Don't worry.

1305522.text: The doctor's eccentricity is a headache for her patients.

1305523.text: Lunia was once ravaged by war. That's why its people cherish the peace they have.

1305524.text: I want to have a beach holiday too. I'm going to ask the doctor for a few days off tomorrow.

1305525.text: Patients hating injections? In that case, the doctor will prescribe them potions instead. But, you know, you can't always cater to their preferences...

1305527.text: Stop your pranks before I get mad...

1305528.text: I wish I could live like Princess Eulalia. That said, I don't think I can save a whole range of people like she does...

1305534.text: Are you going to stand in our way?

1305535.text: Phew  Good riddance. Now it's just you and me!

1305536.text: I spent a good while making myself look perfect for you, and now I got holes in my clothes...

1305538.text: This way I'll be able to help more people in pain...

1305540.text: I want to share my love with more people...

1305541.text: Are you a patient? But you look fine to me. How can I help you?

1305542.text: Staring at me won't get you a reward. Lady Eulalia has asked me to restrain myself...

1305543.text: Look at your greedy face. What, you want to be pampered too?

1305544.text: Let me bandage you up so we can feel each other's joy and pain...

1305545.text: I put on my Sunday best for this special occasion. You like it? Well, I know exactly what you like. Uh, listen... it may sound like a lot to ask, but I want us to be together for the rest of our lives!

1305546.text: Let me guess what you got for me.

1305547.text: You got me such a great gift on such a special day. Oh, I don't know how to thank you!

1305548.text: It's getting hotter? Well, that's because you're here.

1305549.text: Hear that? That's the sound of a racing heart.

1305550.text: You're such a little scamp. You want me to pet you too?

1305551.text: Look at my swaying dress. I feel like I've become Lady Eulalia!

1305552.text: Oh, my feet got tangled in the bandage. Can you help me?

1305553.text: Still spacing out here? You dummy!

1305554.text: This is your home? I've never been here before...

1305555.text: Sleep tight. I'll be here watching over you.

1305557.text: Uh, what else do you need?

1305558.text: You want my love? I will give my love to everyone in equal measure. I will cure you of whatever ails you.

1305559.text: My love is always there for you.

1305560.text: Going out together dressed like this?

1305561.text: Lie down and let me cure you.

1305562.text: Wonder what Lady Eulalia looks like in this getup. Must be stunning...

1305563.text: Be careful or you'll get more scars!

1305564.text: After being saved by Lady Eulalia, I began to suppress my desire for happiness, but it was too hard.

1305565.text: You wanna give me therapy? So are we switching roles here?

1305568.text: I dolled myself up just for you. We will stay together no matter what happens! And I will always be there to heal your heart whenever it's broken...

1305574.text: The energy waves are still there...

1305575.text: The abnormal energy waves have been put to rest, and peace has returned to the starry sky...

1305576.text: The wave frequency is too high... There's nothing I can do about it...

1305578.text: I need to acquire more knowledge in order to observe more of the universe...

1305579.text: Now I'm able to clearly detect chaotic energy waves.

1305580.text: One day I will be able to see the end of everything...

1305581.text: Are you afraid? 'Cause I've detected chaotic energy waves.

1305582.text: I don't like those nobles. They're always talking about things I don't understand and they give off obnoxious energy waves...

1305583.text: Observing how everything works may sound strange but is actually fun. Wanna give it a try?

1305584.text: This getup looks out of place? I know we're not at a banquet, but I still wanted to wear it for you...

1305585.text: I like to look up at the starry sky alone, but it gets lonely after a while... Well... can you swear on the stars that we will stay together forever...?

1305586.text: A gift for me? I'll take it.

1305587.text: Looks like our wavelengths have synced up. That's why you know what I like. Thanks.

1305588.text: Is there something on my hair?

1305589.text: I'm not very comfortable... with this kind of physical contact...

1305591.text: Beautiful dress, isn't it? I just got it.

1305593.text: Cannot detect your energy waves. Disconnecting for now...

1305594.text: Such a big yard... You live here by yourself?

1305595.text: This is a good spot to observe the sky. Can I live here?

1305598.text: I'm Matveiffe. I'm dressed like this for the festival. But don't worry, I can still fight.

1305599.text: Detected a strange wavelength. Further observation is in order.

1305600.text: Do I have to wear this to an adventure?

1305601.text: You're tired too? Take a break.

1305602.text: It's been a while since I celebrated any festival with other people. I like to be alone, but I enjoy being with you like this.

1305603.text: What my ideal life looks like? I never really thought about it. I guess being together with the person I like is all I ask for...

1305604.text: I heard that being a bride is like being a fighterit requires daily practice. I think I can do it...

1305605.text: The dress fits perfectly. It's hard not to feel happy when you're wearing something this beautiful.

1305608.text: The truth of the world is hidden in the kaleidoscope of energy waves crisscrossing in the air.

1305632.text: A person who tries to enchant others for hitting the mark.

1305633.text: A physical manifestation of all the negative emotions.

1305634.text: A cure to save the townsfolk.

1305635.text: A physical manifestation of love and crushes.

1305642.text: Uh... I'm hungry. Let's hurry back...

1305644.text: Hehe, I received so many puppets. I feel more motivated now.

1305645.text: Is it over? I'm exhausted. Gonna go get some rest.

1305646.text: Exhausting but rewarding. Now I've got more magic power. Yay!

1305647.text: There's a festive atmosphere everywhere. There could be bad people hiding among the crowd. But you don't look like a bad person.

1305648.text: You want to go out? But I don't. I just want to lie down here.

1305649.text: I just got this pillow. Isn't it cute? It's so fluffy and cuddly.

1305650.text: Candy is delicious, but chocolate is the best. Ugh, I hate work... Perhaps I can work a bit longer if someone gives me candy.

1305651.text: I want to go out and play too, but I feel a little tired... What? There are holiday-special chocolate cakes for sale? What are you waiting for? Go and buy me some!

1305653.text: This is for me? Yay! But don't expect a return gift.

1305654.text: Garditis said that patting people on the head will keep them from growing taller...

1305655.text: Stop tugging at my sleeve. It's coming loose...

1305656.text: Hands off! Buy me chocolate cakes first.

1305658.text: You want to drag me out of here? But I don't feel like moving...

1305659.text: Are you taking a break? In that case, I'm off to bed now...

1305661.text: These plants have a strange glow. I've never seen this kind of magic in the Sanctuary before.

1305662.text: Ugh, I wish I didn't have to work...

1305663.text: I can finally get some rest. Let's talk tomorrow.

1305664.text: I'm Afallen. You want to spend the holiday with me? Then you must have prepared candy.

1305666.text: I took yesterday off to rest. Now it's time to go out and have some fun!

1305667.text: Finally, I can take a break.

1305668.text: Nothing makes me happier than eating desserts, hehe.

1305669.text: I got a bitter taste in my mouth. I could really use some chocolate cakes right now... Since there are no invaders at the moment, I can sneak off and buy some.

1305670.text: Wow... I smell cakes! Parfait must be making new desserts. Let's go check it out.

1305671.text: Are you hiding from me? Save your strength. I already caught a whiff of your cakes! Uh, did you buy them for me? Wow!!

1305673.text: Leave me alone. I'm trying to sleep here.

1305674.text: White Day is coming, and even the Sanctuary is bustling with activity. You look like you have nothing better to do. Why don't you come play with me? I heard the Upper Domain market is a lot of fun. Take me there!

1305681.text: A girl who claims to be from Fairyland on the edge of the Kingdom of Lochaber. A mythical figure from fairytales. She is leaving home for the first time, and is curious about what lies beyond.

1305682.text: Her small stature and cute-looking wand often cause her to be mistaken for a child, but she doesn't mind. It appears that Hauen is not her real name, but one given to her by her companions in the Fairyland. Everyone around her feels indebted to her because she always brings them luck.

1305683.text: Despite her curiosity about this new world, she has no experience dealing with people and is too shy to speak in front of strangers.

1305684.text: She used to be a cute white rabbit from Fairyland. Even though she has taken a human form now, her long rabbit ears would still protrude from her head whenever she feels frightened, and then she would quickly hide in a corner, burying her head in her arms, trembling. Recently, however, she seems to have made her first friend in the outside world and is often seen playing with Ardisia.

1305686.text: I, Phrygia the Chevalier, am the sworn enemy of injustice!

1305690.text: My destiny as a chevalier... is not fulfilled yet...

1305691.text: I will protect this land till my last breath...

1305692.text: Even if my blade breaks, my faith will not falter...

1305694.text: Improvement only comes from hard work.

1305695.text: For the future of Irminsul, I must grow stronger!

1305696.text: My strength is coming back. I'm ready to rescue those in distress.

1305697.text: Ribbit! Dear passerby, how can I help you?

1305698.text: I would trade my life for the future of Irminsul, without the slightest hesitation.

1305699.text: Lady Asherah used to be the guardian of this land, but now she's caused the Abnormality ravaging the world. I'm not a true chevalier yet, not until I can make up my mind to fight her.

1305700.text: I once swore on my sword to protect this world, but now as it is collapsing, all I can do is watch helplessly and pray for its salvation.

1305701.text: Thanks to you, this land has returned to peace, and I have fulfilled my duty as a chevalier. For that, you have my highest respect.

1305702.text: Thank you for your largess. I'll take it.

1305703.text: Ribbit! What a precious treasure! Thank you!

1305704.text: A chevalier is always mindful of what he wears.

1305705.text: Don't worry. Despite the form I've changed into, you can still rely on me.

1305706.text: Ribbit! Is there something on my face?

1305707.text: A chevalier must stay proud at all times.

1305708.text: I must steady my feet. A chevalier must not fall. Not here.

1305709.text: Now is not the time to zone out.

1305710.text: Is this the outside world? Looks so different from Irminsul.

1305711.text: Sorry I didn't see you there. I tend to get lost in thought...

1305712.text: Ribbit! You have a quest for me?

1305713.text: Ribbit! A perfect response to your expectation.

1305714.text: Phrygia, the Glorious Chevalier of Irminsul, will not let you down!

1305715.text: My sword is at your service.

1305716.text: It's a chevalier's duty to help those in need.

1305717.text: The purpose of rest is to stay in tip-top shape in battle.

1305718.text: I swear on my honor as a chevalier that I will save Irminsul against all odds.

1305719.text: Irminsul used to be a peaceful land where children played without care and merchants traded at will.

1305720.text: It's not always easy for me to stay true to my chivalric oath. Most of my pals have lost their sanity to magic. And when I come face to face with them, my sword falters.

1305721.text: Perhaps there's a way to save Irminsul in another world apart from this one. No matter how slim the hope is, I will not give up.

1305724.text: As you can see, I, Phrygia the Chevalier of Irminsul, am still not used to this body of mine. But that won't stop me from fulfilling my chivalric oath.

1305726.text: Follow me into the depths of the dreamland...

1305728.text: A dream from which one never wakes...

1305730.text: A dream that lasts for eternity...

1305731.text: No matter which way you run, you can't escape the dreamland.

1305732.text: I am no exception. I too get trapped in the endless cycle of the nightmare...

1305734.text: The dark mist of the dreamland is growing thick...

1305736.text: Magic power is concentrating, guiding me deeper into the dreamland.

1305737.text: For humans, nightmares mean agony... The evil spirits of nightmares bring nothing but misfortune.

1305738.text: The way I see it, the dreamland does nothing to people other than reveal their inner worlds.

1305739.text: Everyone shuns me like I'm some kind of jinx, but not you.

1305740.text: The cycle of birth and death governs all that exists. One day I will return to the dreamland where my life began.

1305741.text: If you wish so, I... can give you my dreams... which will shelter you from anxiety about the future, trauma from the past, and sufferings in the present... All you need to do is follow me back into the depths of the dreamland, leave everything behind, and be free. So let me ask you one last time... Dreamland or reality? What do you choose?

1305742.text: I got the gift. I appreciate your kindness.

1305743.text: Thank you. You are even more gentle-hearted than I am. What now? Should I give you my sweet dreams?

1305744.text: My tentacles? They have been there since I was created. They give me the ability to perceive my surroundings.

1305745.text: With this outfit, I can merge with the surroundings and silently observe everyone that sets foot into the dreamland.

1305746.text: My face feels cold... After all, I'm a mere creation, not like others that are flesh and blood.

1305747.text: I dress like this for ease of movement, 'cause there's a lot of flying to do...

1305748.text: Is this what they call a prank? I've never been to the outside world. I don't know what is the purpose of this...

1305750.text: A courtyard overflowing with magic. Is this the dreamland you created?

1305751.text: What an exquisite scene you built. You are a great magician, just like the Creator himself.

1305752.text: I will guide more people into the dreamland...

1305753.text: Every dream will come to an end.

1305754.text: Waste away for eternity in the depths of the dreamland. Live a life of delusions and intoxication...

1305755.text: Want me to take you into the dreamland?

1305756.text: Do you want to leave the dreamland and go outside?

1305757.text: If you feel tired, lie down and rest. Have a sweet dream.

1305758.text: When you enter the dreamland, you can detect the slightest disturbance of the air caused by a butterfly flapping its wings, and you mistake everything you see for reality.

1305759.text: I've never left the dreamland since I was created. Time leaves no mark on me. Essentially I'm living in a dream from which I will never wake.

1305760.text: Although you have led me out of the dreamland, sometimes I still have difficulty telling dreams apart from reality.
