1305761.text: What one can see in the dreamland is a reflection of their inner worlds. That's why people believe all of it.

1305764.text: I, Eddine, was created to guide people into the dreamland.

1305766.text: Outwardly, he is a strange creature sporting chivalric attire. But he used to be an esteemed chevalier serving under Protector Asherah, sworn to guard Irminsul with his sword.

1305767.text: In a horrendous disaster where massive amounts of magic leaked out, his body mutated into the shape of a frog. He now feels great fatigue after a short period of activity for his apparent incongruity with this body.

1305768.text: After his mutation, he was always seen sitting by the road drowning his sorrow in wine.

1305769.text: He accidentally acquired the ability to travel across dimensions after his fight with Asherah. Then he used that ability to enter a world beyond his own and started searching for a way to lift the curse, hoping that one day Irminsul would return to normal.

1305774.text:
A dweller in the dreamland, she has a mysterious aura and a pair of wings that flutter gently.
Every time Eddine shows up, she has a swarm of glowing butterflies dancing around her, and together they fly into the dreamland.

1305775.text:
If there is one word to sum up Eddine, it is "dreamlike". And yet she is also so real.
Those who enter the dreamland feel like they also turn into butterflies. With Eddine whispering in their ears, and swarms of other butterflies guiding them, they fly deeper and deeper into the dreamland.

1305776.text:
Different events happen in every encounter with Eddine. That's probably because one's state of mind always changes, and when entering the dreamland, the scenes change as well.
Seeing the flickering glow of the butterflies in the dreamland, one could easily forget the passage of time and even fall into slumber.
Feeble as it may be, the movement of a butterfly's wings can cause small disturbances in the air, thus spreading the magic power around.
One that has felt this subtle process would regard it as a proof that everything here is real.

1305777.text:
All existence is subject to the cycle of birth and death. Eddine is no exception.
Being a creation, one day Eddine will fulfill her purpose, then she will forever stay in the dreamland with the butterflies, or just perish along with the dreamland itself.
But until that day comes, she will still be here and continue to guide people into the dreamland where they will forever lose themselves in the sensation of delusions and intoxication.

1305779.text: Huh? I didn't make any strange sounds. It was not me. Ugh...

1305780.text: You... You are as guilty as sin!

1305781.text: Don't come too close... People will see us...

1305782.text: Ah... the god does not forgive rudeness!

1305783.text: Your hands are shaking... You're aware of your rudeness too, huh?

1305789.text: Isabel, growing up in a convent, was deemed as a potential assassin by the Chief Inquisitor when she was only four or five years old, and then was taken back to the Inquisition, where she started learning to spread the ideal grace in some strange wayassassination.

1305790.text: With a pious bone in her body, Isabel has been convinced that everything she does is to better spread the ideal grace. She believes that those killed are not really dead, but just exchange their physical demise for spiritual salvation.

1305791.text: When executing the ideal grace, she always puts on an innocent look, which allows her to easily approach her targets. When they let their guard down, she will mercilessly terminate their life while praying devoutly that their spirits could be saved.

1305792.text: Rumor has it that the forbidden magic reappears in the Chrono Tower. After hearing that, the Holy Church seeks help from the Inquisition and has Isabel work for it, outwardly claiming that Isabel would assist the Preacher in search of the Sacred Relic. But the truth is that Isabe is ordered to terminate all those trying to engage in the forbidden magic.

1305795.text: Those who stand in the way shall be met with destruction!

1305800.text: Is that all you got? What a letdown...

1305801.text: The dual swords that protect the Sanctuary... will not break, not now...

1305802.text: Don't even think about running away!

1305803.text: The God-given power is not awakened yet.

1305804.text: Thanks for your assistance. The road to mastering the sword remains long and winding.

1305805.text: Sword training requires one-hundred percent dedication. If you want to be as good as me, you gotta work harder.

1305806.text: You want to challenge me to a duel, stranger? You're not worthy enough for me to draw my sword...

1305807.text: You want to be friends with me? Since we're both perfectionists, show me your magic.

1305808.text: Back off? Don't be ridiculous. Those two words are not in my dictionary. If you're afraid, get behind me. I'll protect you with my sword.

1305809.text: I couldn't bear to watch helplessly as people suffered, so I resigned as the Protector and gave the Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars to a human child. Just like that, I bound her to a duty that would prevent her from ever living a normal life again...

1305810.text: Bound by the duty to protect the world...? I understand Camilyne's pain. Even though I have resigned as the Protector, I have never forgotten the duty God gave me, the duty to protect this world. And I have never relented in carrying it out. But I'm tired, just like you, from the burden of the duty. That's what brought us together...

1305812.text: A precious gift like this would be a waste on me.

1305813.text: Don't think I'm like any other girl. I don't need those useless hair accessories.

1305814.text: So rude. Don't make me draw my sword.

1305816.text: I have never seen anyone as rude as you in all of the Sanctuary.

1305817.text: Let go or I'll kick you.

1305818.text: Pull yourself together. This is no time to space out.

1305819.text: This place is so different from the Sanctuary. I've never seen this kind of building before...

1305822.text: Everything worked out perfectly, just as expected.

1305823.text: Curtana, as you can see, is just a swordswoman blessed by God.

1305824.text: My sword shall prove the justice of the Protector!

1305825.text: The duty to protect this world never ends...

1305826.text: A good swordswoman is one who can make the best of the intervals between battles.

1305827.text: Anyone who antagonizes God shall be cut down by these God-blessed dual swords. That's my sacred duty as a swordswoman.

1305828.text: Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars? Oh, I've missed that name. Guided by God, I gave it to a human girl so she could use it to destroy Demongod Gordia.

1305829.text: These are the Swords of Divine Judgment, also known as Parondit & Fusariel. God gave it to me after creating the world.

1305830.text: Parondit is a blessing from the heavens. Fusariel is a gift from the earth. No one can escape the judgment of these dual swords.

1305833.text: Fighting for the future of the worldit seems we share the same fate.

1305839.text: The future of the Forest of Elves will be mine to protect.

1305842.text: Protecting everyone's smile turns out to be such a beautiful thing to do.

1305843.text: I was so close... My friends from the Forest of Elves are still waiting for me...

1305845.text: Thanks for your help. Now I can protect more people.

1305846.text: The training is harder than I thought, but I think I can make it through.

1305847.text: It's okay. I will protect you.

1305848.text: This is my first time out of the forest. I'm a little worried, yes, but I'm sure I will make new friends.

1305849.text: Huh? You're heading to the lake for a picnic...? Can I come with you?

1305850.text: My wish? To sing to my heart's content in the forest, and to bring the beauty of music to people.

1305851.text: You love singing too. Mmm, mind if I join in? (Hums for a bit)

1305852.text: Never thought I'd leave the forest one day to explore the outside world like those little guys. Don't worry. I'll try my best to fit in with the human world, but it will take a while... Until then, can you keep me company?

1305854.text: This is for me? Such a precious gift. Thank you! What should I give you in return? Let me think...

1305855.text: Hehe, reminds me of my childhood...

1305857.text: Is there something on my face?

1305858.text: I like this dress too. It's very pretty, isn't it?

1305860.text: Did you fall asleep here? You'll catch a cold...

1305861.text: A gorgeous courtyard. I wish I could live here.

1305864.text: It was a lot of work, but it paid off.

1305865.text: Didn't know there was such a big world outside the forest. Can you be my guide?

1305866.text: Want to make some new friends?

1305867.text: It's a beautiful day. Let's take a walk in the forest.

1305869.text: Lady Flora's smile is as warm as the sun.

1305870.text: I once listened to the performance of Lady Mayahuel, and it was like entering a dream world. Music is magical.

1305871.text: Those pigeons are very cute, aren't they? They come here every day and play with me.

1305872.text: Everyone hates humans, but not me. Humans are not that bad. Surely there are many kind humans. I want to go out there and make friends with them.

1305875.text: Nice to meet you. I'm Ninsar. I've been living in the forest. This is my first time away from home. Can you be my guide?

1305880.text:
The Adjudicator of the Sanctuary. A top decision-maker of the organization, though one that skips all kinds of important meetings.
She is of such a high status that other leaders of the Sanctuary address her by honorifics. Some speculate she is the actual ruler of the Sanctuary.

1305881.text: Always carries with her the Swords of Divine Judgment, Parondit & Fusariel. Legend has it that back in Primeval Times, she used the dual swords to slash the sky, thus forming the Heavenly River.

1305882.text:
Back in Primeval Times, Demongod Gordia plunged the world into chaos. In the fight to stop her, Curtana suffered heavy injuries and lost much of her power.
She had to watch helplessly as the world suffered. At the moment of her deepest despair, God spoke to her and instructed her to give the sacred object, Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, to a human child. The move eventually saved the world.

1305883.text:
Having lost much of her power, a crippling sense of inadequacy compelled Curtana to resign as the Protector. But still, she never forgot her oath to defend Cassiel.
Even though she had retired from political affairs for a long time, when demons invaded, she once again drew the Swords of Divine Judgment and joined the fight to protect Cassiel.

1305885.text: An elven girl who grew up in the forest. Never been to the outside world. Goes to the clearing in the woods every day to feed pigeons.

1305886.text: The pigeons, which normally fear humans, are surprisingly affectionate toward Ninsarshe's often seen rubbing their feathers with her cheek.

1305887.text:
Unlike most high elves, Ninsar doesn't loathe humans. She dreams of freely exploring the outside world like the pigeons.
She is one of the fans of Flora, and her biggest wish is to share the stage with Flora one day.

1305888.text: After learning that Flora learned her tunes from Mayahuel, she pesters Mayahuel every day to teach her music and always ends up being scolded. But she doesn't mind. She even gets the idea of sneaking out of the forest to learn music in the human world.

1305891.text: A princess deeply beloved by the people. Despite her innocent lookswhich contrasts with the queen's stern demeanorshe is actually quite into political affairs. Recently, she often walked out of the palace and visited the villages and towns, to show her care for the suffering of the people.

1305892.text: As the queen's heir, she receives an elite education and is busy with official work every day. Yet she never complains and does her job exceptionally well. This has earned her widespread respect.

1305893.text:
Word has it that Amanami's dances originate from the god's blessings, and that as the successor to the Living God, she commits herself to delivering His blessings to her people.
Every day after she wraps up her work, she hauls her exhausted body to the yard to practice dance for the coming Kami Festival.
The setting sun casts a red glow over her slim figure as she twirls and dances and sings. It's a beautiful sight, so beautiful it moves the on-looking maids to tears.

1305894.text: Early in the morning when the dew still clings to the verdant leaves, Amanami sets off with her maids on an outing. As her long hair brushes past the flowers, she raises her hand to dab away her tears and begins to dance to the singing of the maids in the midst of the flower rain. Quite like a goddess sent from above.

1305896.text: In the name of the god...

1305900.text: I can't wither away just yet...

1305901.text: I owe my existence to Heaven, and I bear the god's will. I shall cleanse all that is filthy.

1305904.text: This is a gift from the god.

1305905.text: The road to self-improvement is long and winding, but I shall never stray from it.

1305906.text: Nothing is too hard for me when you are by my side.

1305907.text: You want to see me dance? I'm afraid I can't right now. Something is weighing heavily on my mind.

1305908.text: Self-betterment is an arduous process. But don't worry, I will hold your hand through it.

1305909.text: Unlike the rest of my people, you don't just see me as something to be held in awe. I feel like I can overcome anything with you around.

1305910.text: I'm not one to turn away someone in need. My door is always open to you should you need me.

1305911.text: My life is like those exotic flowers on the tip of the branchbeautiful yet short-lived. All my striving is meaningless in the end. Even so, I cherish the warmth you give me, however fleeting it is...

1305913.text: I'm surprised you actually know what I like. (Smiles) You must be very observant.

1305914.text: Stop this absurdity. My hair is falling apart.

1305915.text: Disrespect me, and you disrespect the god.

1305916.text: I will not abide such rudeness.

1305917.text: Are you worried I might be lonely?

1305918.text: The first rule of dancing: Always keep your balance.

1305919.text: My heart is empty, my feet are aimless.

1305920.text: Seeing flowers bloom and wither makes me feel wistful and brings back memories...

1305921.text: I like this place. It makes me feel peaceful.

1305922.text: If that's what my people want, I will gladly oblige.

1305924.text: It used to be my dream to venture into the outside world... If the god wills it, I shall be at your service.

1305926.text: The god's light illuminates your path.

1305927.text: The god's gift shall be received with gratitude...

1305928.text: Finally got some free time. Want to go see some flowers? Leisure is a luxury for me, you know.

1305929.text: When I was little, I would sit in the yard admiring the flowers in bloom. Now I'm in a completely different mindset. My life is just like those flowersfleeting and death-bound. All that's left is probably endless sadness...

1305930.text: You like my dance? It's just an expression of sadness over the fallen flowers.

1305931.text: The wind rustles the trees, the raindrops fall in the sun. Here I am wallowing in my sadness again.

1305932.text: This is the smile of an unfortunate woman. Reserved, barely visible.

1305934.text: Amanami of the land of sunrise hereby delivers the god's blessings to those of virtue.

1305936.text: You want to play together? Alrighty!

1305941.text: How do you like my sword skills? Hehe.

1305942.text: Uhh... If I die, will I become a star in the sky?

1305944.text: More training? I don't like it, but if you put it that way, I guess I'll do my best.

1305946.text: If I'm going to train, I'm going to train hard!

1305947.text: Wanna play with me? We may have just met, but I feel like we're going to be good friends!

1305948.text: Why swing a sword? I don't know... My father has forced me to learn swordsmanship since I was a child. Then before I knew it, I became like this...

1305949.text: Every day my parents urge me to finish my sword training. But I don't like swords... Hey, I hear the flowers have bloomed in the field. Can you sneak out with me today?

1305950.text: My father once said to me that the sword doesn't lie, that it will reward your hard work. But after so many years, I still don't see the point of all this repetitive swinging and slashing.

1305951.text: It was exhausting, but we had a great time together! Let's do this again tomorrow. Deal?

1305952.text: It's always a pleasure to receive gifts.

1305953.text: This is for me? Thanks! In return, I'll make you a garland!

1305954.text: I may be small now, but I will grow taller before you know it!

1305955.text: Argh... You scared me! I thought it was a monster...

1305957.text: Hehe, check out my new dress. Pretty, isn't it?

1305959.text: Quit spacing out. Let's play hide and seek!

1305960.text: Are those Magical Flowers? They smell so good. Can I pick one?

1305961.text: So sleepy... Can I lie down here for a bit?

1305963.text: It's over already? I was just getting started...

1305964.text: It's so boring practicing the sword by myself all day. Come chat with me!

1305965.text: We're going out to play? Hooray!

1305966.text: Let's go adventuring in the forest!

1305967.text: You're tired? Lie down and rest for a while.

1305968.text: Trouble? Uh, I don't have any trouble. If anything, I hope I can be this happy every day.

1305970.text: Quit spacing out. Come play with me. The more the merrier!

1305971.text: Ugh... I had a bad dream where everyone went on a picnic, leaving me alone to practice the sword...

1305974.text: Being alone sucks. I'm so bored. I need some company...

1305976.text: Born into nobility. Belongs to a clan of mage-swordswomen famed across the Sanctuary. Been practicing the sword under her father's supervision since she was little.

1305977.text: It's natural for a child her age to be drawn more to flowers in the fields and small animals than to tedious sword training.

1305978.text: Her sword skills keep getting better every day thanks to the training. Yet she doesn't understand why she needs to swing a sword at all. Still, she doesn't complain and tries to live every day to the fullest.

1305979.text: The appearance of Demongod Gordia shattered the peace of the world. The girl's entire clan joined the crusade against Gordia. She watched in tears as everyone around her fell, helpless and devastated. Until one day the Protector of the Sanctuary came before her, bringing her the last ray of hope: Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars.

1305984.text: You have desecrated the Protector. Now you must pay with your life!

1305989.text: As the Priestess of Irminsul, it is my duty to eliminate all threats to the Protector.

1305990.text: No, I can't fall yet, not before I fulfill the Protector's orders...

1305992.text: I feel the magic surging within me...

1305993.text: Even a priestess should constantly improve herself.

1305994.text: I gather magic only to protect people.

1305995.text: You're in a restricted area, outsider! Leave!

1305996.text: The changes taking place in this land are going to reform the world, perhaps in a catastrophic manner.

1305997.text: I can't believe Phrygia had the nerve to question the Protector. He's a disgrace to knighthood...

1305998.text: I once took someone else's life in the name of the Protector. It was cruel, yes, but my duties obliged me to do it. If I hesitated, more people would suffer.

1305999.text: I was ordered to protect the people here, and I swore to punish whoever harmed them... Yet one by one, they're turning into magical creatures in front of me... and I hate that there's nothing I can do. Whenever I close my eyes, I can hear their groans of pain. Maybe only you can change this world... But until then, can I stay by your side? I would do anything for this world...

1306000.text: Thanks for the gift. It's an affirmation of my work.

1306001.text: Even if you please me like this, I will not treat you differently.

1306002.text: Stop touching. I hate to experience physical changes.

1306003.text: What are you doing? Knock it off!

1306005.text: In the name of the Protector, I shall put you to death, heretic!

1306006.text: I've still got a lot of work to do. Get out of my way.

1306007.text: Is that all you're good for? Dazing out?

1306008.text: A lot of magic is concentrated here. Is this a sign of an imminent disaster...?

1306009.text: Those fine structures remind me of that glittering city.

1306010.text: How dare you order me around...

1306011.text: That's it? Not too bad an outcome.

1306012.text: I, Flare of Irminsul, shall protect this land with everything I have, no matter how my appearance changes.

1306013.text: I'm under the Protector's orders to guard you.

1306015.text: This must be a blessing from the Protector.

1306016.text: I can't use magic to control my appearance like Norn does, so there's nothing I can do when physical changes happen to me.

1306017.text: I would do anything to return Irminsul to what it was.

1306018.text: I feel so hot... Seems like the magic inside of me is changing too. At this rate, everyone will turn into a monster...

1306019.text: You want to see the Protector? She's concentrating on the magic that can stop Irminsul from collapsing. She's not to be disturbed.

1306022.text: I am Flare, the Priestess of Irminsul, and I serve the great Protector.

1306029.text: Back off, weakling. No one will stop me from saving this world.

1306030.text: My duty... is not fulfilled yet...

1306032.text: I need to gather more magic if I'm to save Irminsul.

1306033.text: Only power can save this failing world.

1306034.text: I shall not stop, not until my domination is complete, for only then will Irminsul have a future.

1306035.text: A weak human asking to see me? How laughable.

1306036.text: You want to stop me from what I'm doing? Without power, nothing will change, and the world will continue down the road to destruction.

1306037.text: Change takes time, and costs innocent lives. But it has to happen. Otherwise, those who gave their lives would have died in vain.

1306038.text: The future of Irminsul hinges on the decisions I make. Such responsibility would scare the faint-hearted mortals. But I have to tackle it head-on, for the very survival of this land depends on it.

1306039.text: As the Protector, I carry burdens unfathomable to the average mind, and I give of myself completely to the world. Even so, the world is still falling apart. Maybe there's only so much I can do alone... Maybe you, witch from afar, can bring new hope to the worldmaybe you can join me in saving Irminsul...

1306041.text: You will gain nothing from trying to please me. Still, I'm surprised you figured out what I like, and I appreciate the thought.

1306044.text: Keep your filthy hands off me, mortal...

1306046.text: Step away, mortal, or you will be trampled.

1306047.text: Irminsul is headed for destruction. There's no time to waste.

1306048.text: I didn't expect to see a magic-powered realm like this. Such wonderful buildings...

1306049.text: Irminsul used to be made of cities filled with buildings like these... And now it's nothing but rubble and debris.

1306051.text: The Protector hasn't shown her real power yet.

1306052.text: I am Asherah, the Protector of Irminsul, the land of glory. Witch from afar, do you seek my power?

1306054.text: I sense magic of an unknown source...

1306056.text: That's just lip service. Irminsul will never be saved by a weakling.

1306057.text: Anxiety, pain, despair... They hang above Irminsul like dark clouds, eroding the very fibers of this land.

1306058.text: When calamity struck, even my chevalier tried to betray me... That's human nature, something I can never comprehend.

1306059.text: My people are sacrificed in exchange for eternal power, from which a new world will spring.

1306062.text: I am Asherah of Irminsul, the Protector ordained to fix all this chaos.

1306066.text: Originally a sorcerer versed in various conjuring, she followed Protector Asherah into the War of Protectors. After victory, she was appointed by Asherah to manage the day-to-day affairs of Irminsul. She is deeply revered and loved by the people.

1306067.text: Before the Magical Abnormality, she took a girl from Fomoire Island as her apprentice and taught her everything she knew. The girl lived up to expectations and later became a powerful Ovate.

1306068.text: In the aftermath of the Magical Abnormality, the people of Irminsul turned into all kinds of magical creatures. Seeing this, she determined to grow her magic so that she would be strong enough to save them. However, her magic backfired and she became a monster herself.

1306069.text: She was devastated by this change along with the physical changes she was experiencing. Her faith collapsed, leaving her a distorted obsession to protect her people.

1306070.text: She won the ancient War of Protectors and restored peace to Irminsul. As the Protector of Irminsul, she has been guarding this land for centuries.

1306071.text: Thanks to her passion for the study of life, the entire Irminsul was overflowing with life and energy, and as a result, its people enjoyed a long life span.

1306072.text: When the Abnormality hit and her beloved Irminsul began to decline, Asherah returned to the magical research she once abandoned, trying to find a way to change the fate of Irminsul.

1306073.text: Her people haven't seen her in a long time. Even her Glorious Chevalier and Priest are not allowed to see her.

1306075.text: Any intrusion will be met with death.

1306080.text: Have a taste of despair, you smug worms!

1306081.text: Can't believe I let those weaklings get me...

1306083.text: This is expected of a High Elf leader.

1306084.text: The magic dormant inside me will be awake soon...

1306085.text: The divine power granted by God shall bring the world back to peace.

1306086.text: Do not waste my time, weaklings.

1306087.text: With great power comes great responsibility. This unthinkable burden will eventually crush me, for I'm no God after all.

1306088.text: Save it, mortals. Your groveling and cajoling do not work on me.

1306089.text: Where will the God-given power take the elves? This question has been puzzling me for a long time. Cutting ourselves off from the rest of the world, eliminating all enemiesI once questioned the wisdom of doing so... But not anymore, my stance forbids me to. The slightest hesitation on my part will spell doom for the elves.

1306090.text: When Demongod Gordia plunged the world into chaos, I, in an effort to save the elven race, put aside racial differences and joined force with a human, the Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars.

1306092.text: I'm surprised you figured out what we elves like...

1306093.text: Show some manners, you filthy worms!

1306094.text: Filthy and frivolous desires are at the root of all disasters.

1306096.text: Such lack of decorum is expected of the lowly likes of you.

1306098.text: I can't waste any more time here. The Forest of Elves is in crisis.

1306099.text: Cassiel used to be just like this placefull of life, with sunlight reaching all the way to the horizon.

1306100.text: It's hard to believe that such fine structures were actually built by humans.

1306101.text: Just a walk in the park for a High Elf.

1306102.text: See, that's the great magic of the High Elves.

1306103.text: I, Dana, the leader of the High Elves, shall give my all to protect the future of the Forest of Elves, till I have nothing to give.

1306104.text: All threats must be eliminated without hesitation.

1306105.text: For the future of the Forest of Elves...

1306107.text: You may either live and crawl like a worm at my feet, or get crushed and die a meaningless death. Either way, your insignificance won't change.

1306108.text: Humans? Just a bunch of weak creatures who live their lives under the yoke of death and sickness.

1306109.text: Humans fear what they don't comprehend. That's why they hold the High Elves in awe.

1306110.text: You want to stop me? Don't be ridiculous, you pathetic weakling.

1306113.text: A calamity is upon us. For the elven race, for this land, I must not back down.

1306116.text: She's the goddess worshiped by all creatures of Elf Lakeside, and the leader of the High Elves. She led her followers in Elf Lakeside to defend against the invasion of the ancient Demongod Gordia and eventually, with the help of Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars, eliminated the Demongod and saved the world.

1306117.text: In the tales passed through generations in Elf Lakeside, Dana is always portrayed as a high-and-mighty, human-hating elf. Before joining force with a human to destroy Demongod, Dana had a distaste for the human race and cared only about preserving the lineage of elves in which she took pride.

1306118.text:
After Demongod was destroyed and peace returned, a young man blundered his way into the Forest of Elves. He seemed to have just escaped from the Sanctuary and was on the run from a group of sorcerers. Mortally wounded, he fell beside Dana, who was taking a walk by the lake. Then the sorcerers came. Annoyed by their intrusion, Dana had them punished.
She studied the young man lying on the ground. The sight of his handsome face brought warmth to her cold heart. She had her maids help him up and take him back to the Forest of Elves.

1306119.text:
Out of respect for Dana, denizens of the Forest of Elves refrained from booting out the young man. The young man recovers gradually under the care of the maid. His presence offered a refreshing change from the other groveling High Elveshe would tell Dana about things going on in the outside world; sometimes he would even entertain her with funny jokes.
Moreover, the young man often wrote poetry and songs. His talent was met with great admiration from Dana, who, like the rest of the High Elves, had a taste for music. Even the maids looking after him took a liking to him. Just like that, the cold heart of the long-lived elven goddess began to melt, all because of a wonderful encounter...

1306129.text: The sun is going down. I should head back...

1306134.text: Thankfully it stopped. If it went on any longer, Ardisia would be worried.

1306135.text: Every flow is followed by an ebb. Now that I have failed, I should quietly retreat into the sea...

1306137.text: I feel obliged to respond to your kindness, or at least make an effort to do so.

1306138.text: I can toil in the sun like humans do.

1306139.text: The summer sun is getting fierce, but my singing voice will be fiercer still.

1306140.text: Stranger, quit running around the beach. It's dangerous.

1306141.text: Can't sleep? Let's go for a walk on the beach. Nothing like the sea breeze blowing in your face.

1306142.text: You like my singing? Aw, that cute face again. Alright, I'll sing another song for you.

1306143.text: When it gets dark on the beach, everything goes quiet except the waves, and it feels as if we have the whole world to ourselves.

1306144.text: Before I met you, whenever I couldn't sleep, I would come to the cliffs to gaze into the horizon. Being alone in the darkest hour before dawn really brought back painful memories. I would lament the loneliness of the night and weep for the solitude of the stars... It was moments like those that made me appreciate the warmth of the rising sunand the warmth of your arms around me. Would it be okay if I stayed in your arms a little longer...?

1306146.text: Oh, this is for me? Thanks, I'll cherish it.

1306147.text: You want me to pat your head? Hmm, good kid...

1306149.text: Have I got something on my face?

1306150.text: Oh? So you're one of those bad humans?

1306151.text: Don't worry, the sand is soft to walk on, and it's not slippery at all.

1306152.text: You seem distracted. Something on your mind?

1306153.text: This is my first time away from the sea. Didn't expect to see a courtyard like this...

1306154.text: Wanna go for a walk on the beach?

1306155.text: Don't worry. I'll help you finish it.

1306156.text: Glad I could be of help. Let me know if you need my help again.

1306157.text: Do you need my help, human child?

1306158.text: Need my help? You sure know how to be cute, kiddo.

1306159.text: You want to go on an adventure with me? I look forward to it!

1306161.text: Ardisia is at the age where having fun is all that matters. That's why she always stays out late.

1306162.text: Lately there have been some human males trying to get close to Ardisia. Every time I see them, I conjure a giant wave to scare them off.

1306163.text: In the darkness of the night, one corner of the east is being painted red by the sun rising over the horizon. Such a magnificent sight can only be seen from the beach.

1306164.text: You want to learn how to swim from me? Hm, alright, I'll teach you.

1306167.text: I am Bellavita who guards the sea, watching over all marine life.

1306173.text: Bellavita, a sea-dwelling elf, has spent eons in the company of fish and the tides and rarely crosses paths with humans.

1306174.text: Most of the time, Bellavita hunkers down at the bottom of the sea, surrounded by fish. Only when the sun sinks below the horizon does she quietly leap out of the sea to enjoy her evening in solitude on the beach.

1306175.text: One night, as usual, Bellavita emerged from the sea and came to the beach. That was when she saw a baby lying quietly on the ground in swaddling clothes. Instead of crying at the sight of her, it beamed. A strange emotion rose in Bellavita's chest.

1306176.text: She named the baby girl "Ardisia", then took her into the sea and taught her how to breathe underwater. She grew up healthy under Bellavita's care. But Bellavita can be a little overprotective: Whenever a boy tries to approach Ardisia, she immediately conjures a tidal wave to warn him off.

1306184.text: Time can't be stopped, and that means your end has come.

1306185.text: The ticking of the clock... Even I can't see through it...?

1306186.text: Your time belongs to me now...

1306187.text: My time manipulation skills are improving by the day...

1306188.text: The hour hand turns faster and faster...

1306189.text: This is the power granted to me by Lady Ereshkigal...

1306190.text: A new face... What's your business here?

1306191.text: A guest? I will serve you a cup of black tea. But if you're an enemy, I will end your time...

1306192.text: I may be able to stop time, but I can't heal my wounds. I'm nothing more than a collection of scars...

1306193.text: Time is a zither. Anyone can play a beautiful tune with it. Would you like to try it? It's not that hard, I'll teach you.

1306194.text: After Lady Ereshkigal was sealed, I lost my faith and became a drifter. Now I'm back in the Chrono Tower and full of hope again because of youthis must be Lady Ereshkigal's will. Please, be my lord and guide me...

1306196.text: Didn't expect anyone to remember me, much less give me such an amazing gift...

1306199.text: Don't get so close. The lenses are fogged up...

1306200.text: Your sins will not fade with time...

1306202.text: Time passes in vain when you space out...

1306204.text: Such a spacious courtyard. Do you live here by yourself?

1306207.text: I control the time of everything. No matter how hard you try, you can't wrench your time free from my grip...

1306208.text: Do you need to change your time?

1306209.text: The clock... is turning once more...

1306211.text: Do you like black tea? I'm pretty confident in my tea-making skills.

1306212.text: So there do exist clocks that go backward...

1306213.text: Push something too far, and it pushes back. The same goes for timeno one controls it forever.

1306214.text: As exceptional as my skills may be, I can't bring Lady Ereshkigal back to life. In the face of true power, my existence is insignificant.

1306217.text: My name is Phileanosis. I'm tracking down Lady Ereshkigal as part of my effort to solve the mystery of time.

1306222.text: A traveling scholar who recently appeared out of nowhere in the Chrono Tower. Seems to possess mysterious magic that allows her to manipulate time.

1306223.text: Phileanosis used to be a loyal follower of the Chronospace Protector until the latter was sealed. That's when she lost her faith and started traveling the world. She witnessed the passage of time and the unfolding of history.

1306224.text: When Phileanosis learned of the reemergence of the Chrono Tower, it rekindled her long-dead hope of seeing the Chronospace Protector again. Harboring that hope, he entered the tower.

1306225.text: Originally a human scholar, her academic curiosity brought her into contact with the Chronospace Protector. Over time, she became the latter's disciple. Deeply trusted by the Chronospace Protector, she learned time magic, which allowed her to stop her own time and always remain as young as she was when she first met the Chronospace Protector.

1306228.text: This world will eventually return to order. But until then, I must eliminate all threats.

1306231.text: You think you can hurt me?

1306233.text: This is the power of the Protector... I will not let you evil monsters sully this land with your filthy feet!

1306234.text: For the future of Cassiel... I can't fall just yet...

1306236.text: Magic is surging. Before fighting the monsters, try to improve yourself every chance you get.

1306238.text: This is the power that shapes the future...

1306239.text: The Sanctuary is off-limits to outsiders. Unless you have important business here, do not waste my time.

1306240.text: Ignorance is a sin. Any attempt to upset the balance of the Cassiel will only lead the world towards destruction.

1306241.text: Curtana entrusted me with the welfare of this world. Now that I have accepted my role as the Protector, I'm ready to give my all to protect the world.

1306242.text: My dearest friend once said to me that sacrifices have to be made in order to save more people. I used to doubt that, but now I find myself doing exactly the same thing she did. I have no choice but to do everything I can to protect my people.

1306243.text: When I left the Forest of Elves and became a Protector, I lost my freedomI no longer concerned myself with my own welfare and became shackled by the duties to protect the world and its people... When the floating isles get back on land, that's when the real challenge begins, one that I can't handle by myself... Will you join me in saving this world?

1306244.text: Since it's a gift for me, I'll accept it.

1306245.text: You figured out what a Protector likes... I'm impressed.

1306247.text: Bringer of chaos, go back to where you came from!

1306248.text: Like other High Elves, I don't like physical contact.

1306249.text: You have three seconds to get your filthy hand off me, or I'll cut it off.

1306250.text: I don't like it when people kneel at my feet. It is my duty to treat my subjects as my equals and take care of them.

1306251.text: My people are still suffering. I can't waste my time here.

1306252.text: Your place is not exactly luxurious, but it has taste.

1306253.text: Can't believe there's no sunlight here...

1306256.text: Any potential threat must be nipped in the bud. As the Protector, I must do everything to keep my people out of danger.

1306257.text: As a Protector, I feel obliged to accept your request.

1306258.text: Those monsters that wreak calamity on the world, I shall destroy them with my own hands...

1306259.text: My feet are getting heavy... I need some rest.

1306260.text: Protecting the people of this land is the noblest duty of a Protector.

1306261.text: Anyone who betrays me shall be punished. Garditis will be no exception.

1306262.text: Always finish what you started. Giving up halfway through will only put yourself in more danger.

1306263.text: Dana... I've missed that name. She was already the leader of the High Elves before I left the forest... Unlike her, I've long abandoned my own feelings.

1306266.text: Camilyne, the Protector of Cassiel, will not back off from protecting the future of the Floating Isles...

1306271.text: Without the magic items, she has been losing her magic power and has reverted to her petite and innocuous-looking child form.

1306272.text: She faithfully fulfills her role as a Protector. To that end, she even travels to the Lower Domain herself to eliminate the evolving monsters. She keeps warning the Witch, in whom she has taken a strong interest, not to get involved in the strife between the two domains.

1306273.text: To escape the monsters, she used all her magic power to lift Cassiel from the ground, turning it into floating isles. She rejected the Alliance of the Rebellions' request to lower the isles back on land. Instead, she keeps raising them up in order to protect them from monsters that have evolved wings.

1306274.text: Before taking her role as a Protector, she had been living in the Forest of Elves. When her predecessor, the former Protector, failed to stop Demongod Gordia from wreaking havoc on the world, Camilyne volunteered to take over the mantle, ready to give of herself to this land. She defeated Demongod with the help of Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars. Later on, when monsters overran Camilyne, she lifted Cassiel into the air. Her two successful attempts to save the world have deeply endeared herself to her people.

1306296.text: A winged horse that likes to attack from the air.

1306297.text: An underling of Camilyne, the Protector of Cassiel. Has been serving to uphold the balance of Cassiel.

1306298.text: A golem powered by an unknown ancient force.

1306299.text: The Protector of Cassiel would rather sacrifice everything in order to protect Cassiel.

1306300.text: A mysterious monster possessing the power of chaos. Be careful with it.

1306301.text: A mysterious monster possessing the power of order. Be careful with it.

1306302.text: The immense power of fire is raging inside the monster.

1306303.text: The immense power of water is surging inside the monster.

1306304.text: The immense power of wind is swirling inside the monster.

1306305.text: A newborn Faerie Dragon that seems to have yet to grasp the power of magic.

1306306.text: After growing for some time, the Faerie Dragon starts to slowly gain magic power.

1306307.text: After years of growth, The Faerie Dragon has fully mastered magic power.

1306308.text: The Divines that has grasped the power of illusion after systematic study.

1306309.text: How dare you stand in my way! Do you have a death wish?

1306310.text: Look alive! (A skill to inspire teammates)

1306314.text: That's it? Haha, I was expecting more from you.

1306315.text: I can't die... not before I find the legendary treasure...

1306317.text: Power up! This will make our journey easier!

1306319.text: We'll silence our enemies for good with our firepower!

1306320.text: We often hide our fleet in the midst of the sea of clouds, away from the Sanctuary's surveillance. So we're not easy to spot.

1306321.text: The power of levitation? That's child's play compared to the Protector's ability to keep Cassiel afloat in the sky.

1306322.text: It's a ship, so yeah, we can sail it on the sea. You can't really call yourself a captain if you haven't had a taste of the salty sea breeze, right?

1306323.text: Garditis told me all about you. Don't underestimate the Sanctuary. You can stay onboard if you want. We'll do everything to keep you safe.

1306324.text: Because of a deal we made, we'll follow Garditis's arrangements for now. What comes next? We go back to hunting for treasure, of course. That said, I respect everyone's decision, including yours. So, are you interested in joining our search for the legendary treasure?

1306325.text: This looks expensive. I'll take it.

1306326.text: This is just what the fleet needs. Good job!

1306327.text: Huh? I don't need this kind of consolation.

1306328.text: Keep your hands to yourself, brat.

1306329.text: Keep your hands off me, or something terrible will happen to you.

1306331.text: You like this kind of outfit? I can give you one.

1306333.text: Didn't expect such a fun place on the continent.

1306334.text: Looks like our cabin needs a facelift.

1306336.text: Stop the ship. We're taking a rest.

1306338.text: The burning wave is coming. No enemies can hide from it!

1306340.text: Get some rest before continuing the treasure hunt!

1306341.text: My firepower will not only strike fear into enemies' hearts, but will also lift the spirits of my allies.

1306342.text: Treasure is often hidden where a headwind blows.

1306343.text: The Sanctuary underestimated the power of my fleet. I will make them pay for their conceit.

1306344.text: Garditis? We're just partners scratching each other's backs. Nothing more.

1306346.text: I will hang you from the mast!

1306347.text: I'm Cassis, the captain of the floating fleet. My crew will clear the path for you.

1306352.text: Formerly a noble sorcerer from the Upper Domain of Cassiel, she couldn't stand the way her fellow people trampled on their Lower Domain counterparts, so she left the Magical Guards and went to the Lower Domain.

1306353.text: Having shed her noble identity, she kept calling upon the Lower Domain commoners to rebel against the abusive ruling class above. Answering her call, the commoners worked together to build a floating ship, powered by the girl's wind magic crystal. With the girl herself at the hem, the ship shuttled back and forth between the two domains, attacking the transport fleet above and distributing the spoils to the downtrodden below.

1306354.text: She is always helping the commoners down below, but she is not in favor of using violence to overthrow the ruling class above. It seems the only reason she joined the Alliance of the Rebellions is that she wanted to return the Floating Isles to the ground so she could start her new adventure.

1306355.text: Deeply trusted by her crew, her words are the law around the fleet. Over time, she has taken on a gruff demeanor that signifies a clean break from her noble past.

1306360.text: Go... Get out of here. I don't want to fight you.

1306365.text: The joy of victory? I don't think I feel it...

1306366.text: Why is this happening...? I promised myself to not get hurt again...

1306370.text: I have changed, even if just a little...

1306371.text: Can you just let me be alone for a while...?

1306372.text: You want to know about my past? Sorry... I don't feel like talking about it...

1306373.text: So, like everybody else, you also want me to get out of my room? But... I don't like sunlight, nor do I like strangers...

1306374.text: My room needs cleaning? But I hate chores. Well, I don't mind if you do the cleaning for me... On one condition, though: you will have to keep my room clean from now on...

1306375.text: You gave me the courage to walk out of my room... Talk to other people? Well... I don't think I'm ready for thatnot yet, anyway. Just having you to talk to is enough...

1306376.text: Can't remember the last time someone gave me a gift. I'll gladly accept it.

1306377.text: Can't believe I just got the gift I wanted the most... Thank you.

1306378.text: I haven't taken care of my hair in a while. You can tell?

1306379.text: You want to bully me like everyone else does?

1306381.text: I'll be angry if you keep acting like those scary people...

1306382.text: Muscle? I don't think I have that...

1306383.text: You like spacing out here too?

1306384.text: There's no one else here, right? 'Cause I don't like strangers...

1306385.text: Do I need to say hi to other people? That's a bit of a challenge for me...

1306386.text: You're asking me to go out there? But I don't wanna...

1306388.text: This is my new sketchbook. It's filled with my favorite stories.

1306389.text: You need my help? But someone like me...

1306390.text: I hate sunlight. Can't I just stay indoors...?

1306391.text: I'm sore all over... Can I rest for a while?

1306392.text: The past is nothing but painful memories. No matter how hard I try, I can't recall them anymore.

1306393.text: I wish I could live in dreamland forever as the legendary elven goddess does. That way I could forget all my troubles...

1306394.text: I like being alone in my room, away from other people...

1306395.text: Unlike Sher, I spend my whole life running away from things... Even now that I'm away from the River of the Underworld, I still can't stand sunlight.

1306398.text: I'm UPollyben. I like building worlds with my paintbrush. Here's my sketchbook. Wanna take a look?

1306403.text: Elsewhere, UPollyben would have been recognized for her great talent in painting. But in the Kingdom of Celtica, that talent has largely gone unnoticed.

1306404.text: War with the neighboring kingdoms has all but obliterated the cities of Celtica. UPollyben has forgotten how she managed to flee from her home to this strange city. To escape the pain of the past, she cuts herself off from the outside world and spends all her waking hours painting so that she has no time to think.

1306405.text: It was a tragedy that no words can describeat least for UPollyben, that's the case. It left her with nothing but a sketchbook and a paintbrush. She withdrew into her own shell and started using her paintbrush to build her own world of fantasy.

1306406.text: Every time she thought of that tragedy, of how her hometown was destroyed by war, she felt a strong pang of pain that drove her to paint frantically on that blank canvas. In the end, however, she couldn't finish the painting. She just sat quietly in the corner with a blank mind, waiting for her salvation.

1306409.text: What? You wanna challenge me? You people need to have your brains checked...

1306412.text: Can't believe I got wounded by a piece of trash like that...

1306413.text: No way am I giving up!

1306414.text: No matter who I fight, I always win! 'Cause victory is my middle name!

1306415.text: Damn it, how did I lose to a piece of trash like that...

1306417.text: I don't feel like training today. Let's get this over with!

1306419.text: Hahaha... No one else could have completed the special training with such flying colors!

1306420.text: Hmph (a snort to express contempt), get out of my way. I don't deal with humans.

1306421.text: We barely ever talked, so stop acting as you know me. See, this is why I hate humans.

1306422.text: I'm nothing like you mortals. I'm a noble elf. That's why I work so hard to learn magic, to keep bettering myself.

1306423.text: I picked this out myself. Quite something else, isn't it? Hahaha, you're the only one who understands my taste. You're a fine human, I see.

1306424.text: Of course, humans are all attracted to females like Bellavita... Tall and in good shape... No one would look twice at an elf like me... Huh, you're different from other humans? Stop lying, I know... you would never take an interest in an elf like me... right?

1306425.text: I didn't ask for a gift, but if you insist...

1306426.text: Now this is the kind of gift that befits my nobility. Looks like you've done your homework.

1306427.text: How dare you call me short!

1306428.text: What on earth is going on in your mind?

1306431.text: Go away or I'll kick you in the face!

1306432.text: Why are you spacing out? Did I bore you?

1306433.text: Didn't know you lived in such a fine place...

1306434.text: This place is not nearly as good as my castle.

1306435.text: How dare you boss me around!

1306436.text: Let this be over soon. I hate work!

1306437.text: The noble elves belong in magnificent castles. You tasteless humans wouldn't understand...

1306438.text: Since you asked so nicely, I guess I could help...

1306439.text: No, no, no. I don't wanna go out!

1306442.text: I hate training. Leave me alone.

1306443.text: Ardisia is not like other humans. I like to hang out with her. It'd be even better if Bellavita could join us...

1306444.text: A sand castle, no matter how well it is built, won't survive a gust of wind.

1306447.text: I am Danelim, the Princess of the Sea. Unlike Bellavita, I live in a castle on the beach.

1306452.text: She may appear like a young girl, but Danelim has lived on earth for thousands of years, and during all this time, her personality hasn't changed a bit.

1306453.text: Unlike the Sea Elf, Danelim would often emerge from the sea and play along the beach. From time to time, she gets humans accosting her. But she has a distaste for humans and so would give them the brush-off.

1306454.text: Recently, Danelim built a castle for herself on the beach and was often seen hanging out with Ardisia in it.

1306455.text: Despite her youthful looks, she is even older than the Sea Elf. Age is always a touchy subject for her. So steer clear of it if you don't want to see her wrath.

1306458.text: Watch, I'm gonna catch that biggest fish!

1306459.text: Fish charge! (A skill to send a school of fish charging at the enemy)

1306460.text: Do not underestimate the power of the sea!

1306461.text: Just a scratch. Don't worry about it.

1306462.text: I can't give up just yet!

1306464.text: It's okay. I'm sure there will be better luck next time.

1306467.text: I feel like I'm bursting with power.

1306468.text: This way, I can go fishing somewhere further away!

1306469.text: I hear you know Ardisia. That's wonderful. We can go on a fishing trip together sometime.

1306470.text: Wanna learn how to catch and cook fish? Angling has got a few tricks to share. Don't miss out.

1306471.text: You wanna get to know me? Hmm, I get it. You wanna secretly copy my roasted fish recipe! Don't worry. I'm a generous person. I can teach you if you want.

1306472.text: Speaking of, Ardisia has a content smile on her face whenever she eats roasted fish. Hehe, are you like that too...?

1306473.text: The beach, the sea, and the exciting... fishing contest! Still don't wanna go out...? But... I've got you the world's greatest fishing gear. It'd be a waste to leave it sitting there... Come on, get out of bed. The beach is beckoning. Let's go already!

1306474.text: You wanna trade this for roasted fish?

1306478.text: Do I have something on my face?

1306479.text: I made these shorts myself. Pretty, aren't they?

1306480.text: These fish hooks are razor-sharp. Be careful with them.

1306483.text: This... and that! What are these for?

1306484.text: Whatever it is, let me handle it!

1306485.text: If there's nothing else, I'm going fishing.

1306486.text: I hear the continent is as vast as the sea. Let's go explore!

1306487.text: When do we get going? I can't wait.

1306488.text: This is gonna be a fruitful trip!

1306489.text: A good rest is needed after a heavy workout.

1306490.text: I made this from an old fishing rod. You want one too?

1306491.text: Come on, Angling. Use your smart brain to figure out where you can catch the biggest fish in the world!

1306492.text: Look, a conch! Let me hear what the sea has to say... Hm, "Today is your lucky day..." Does that mean... I'm going to catch the world's biggest fish today?

1306493.text: Another day, another nice catch. Come on, let's go find Ardisia. You two are about to witness my superb fish roasting skills!

1306496.text: I'm Angling, the world's most skilled fisher and fish-cooker. Wanna go fishing with me?

1306501.text: Born in a small seaside fishing village, Angling grew up in the company of the sea. She feels a much stronger attachment to the vast sea than to land.

1306502.text: Since food was scarce in the village, Angling, mature beyond her age, volunteered to go fishing with the adults when she was still littleand she showed prodigious talent. Today, her fishing skills put many adult villagers to shame.

1306503.text: In addition to her remarkable talent for fishing, Angling's fish-roasting skills have also earned her much admiration. People can't explain how Angling manages to make fish smell so enticing other than interpreting it as a gift bestowed by sea elves.

1306504.text: Yes, Angling does owe her fish-roasting skills to a sea elf, but not the way people think. One day, she met a food-loving sea elf. The latter took Angling's roasted fish back to her tribe, causing quite a stir. Ever since then, every time Angling goes out fishing, sea elves show up to guide her. That's how she became good friends with a lot of sea elves.

1306512.text: Is it over? I hope... I haven't let you down...

1306513.text: This is horrible... I should return to the bottom of the sea...

1306516.text: Will people change their minds about me now?

1306518.text: Please, don't come any closer... I'm not used to talking to people yet...

1306519.text: G-Good morning! Is it noon already...? I overslept...

1306520.text: I was told there are a lot of bad humans out there, but you don't look like one of them...

1306521.text: The sea... is so calm... Reminds me of the gentle smile on your face when you're asleep... S-Sorry, I didn't mean to peep...

1306522.text: I heard from our chief that we used to have close ties with humans, until one day an evil human abducted a lot of us... You wanna take me to the human world? I'm a little scared, to be honest, but... I guess I'll be fine as long as I'm with you...

1306524.text: I've never received such a precious gift before... Wah...

1306525.text: I'll let you touch... just once...

1306527.text: I wanna touch your face too... Will you... let me...?

1306528.text: I'm still not used to walking with my feet... Argh! A-Almost fell...

1306529.text: I don't normally wear shoes... Feels so weird like this...

1306530.text: Such a cute sleeping face. I wonder what dream you're having...

1306531.text: Here, I can hear the whispers of the sea as well...

1306533.text: We're going out again? But I don't feel like dealing with strangers...

1306534.text: Can I get back to the sea once the job is done?

1306535.text: H-Human, how did you find me? You're not... one of those bad people, are you?

1306536.text: Perk up. I believe I can help you...

1306538.text: I can dream even during the day if I sleep here, right?

1306539.text: Please stop staring at me like that... You're embarrassing me...

1306540.text: I got something important to say to you... but... I forgot what it was...

1306541.text: Sometimes when I'm alone, I think of my hometown and my people...

1306542.text: The moon casts its reflection on the seaso beautiful... but so lonely. You... heard all that?

1306544.text: You're a bad person! The worst... of the worst...

1306545.text: I'm Shiroi, a mermaid from the sea... Ah, a human! I've never seen one... so up close...

1306550.text: As one of the few last remaining mermaids, she lives at the bottom of the sea and rarely ventures beyond it.

1306551.text: There was a time when the mermaids lived freely at the bottom of the seathey would occasionally emerge from the surface and even engage in activities on the shore. Then a catastrophe struck, wiping out a majority of their kind. The few that survived cut themselves off from the outside world and stuck to the seabed.

1306552.text: Shiroi is a good-natured girl, and she has a slight fear of humans after hearing all the bad things her fellow mermaids say about them. Still, she itches to go out to the surface and see the outside world. However, every time she wants to do that, she would immediately be talked down by her kin.

1306553.text: Her only friend is Ardisia, someone who can live in the sea like an elf. She envies her freedom to run and frolic on the beach and constantly pesters her to tell her about what happens out there.

1306556.text: Your life will be reduced to a sigh in the Lethe.

1306561.text: Every soul is doomed to fall into the Lethe. There's no escaping the cycle of fate.

1306562.text: Just let me be alone for a while. There's no better place for me to be than a corner of the Underworld.

1306565.text: Magic power is gathering at the tip of the umbrella.

1306566.text: The Lethe is churning with waves...

1306567.text: Leave immediately. The Lethe is a restricted place.

1306568.text: I'm not like Kyphon. That guy is a slacker. Leaves me to do all the work.

1306569.text: People know that after they die, their souls will be doomed to torment in the Underworld. That's why they try their best to enjoy life and make the best of their time. But you're differentyou don't seem to fear the end of your life...

1306570.text: The gloomy Lethe is where all souls end up. Maybe it won't be long before I meet your soul there too...

1306571.text: Maybe one day my soul will be devoured by the endless Lethe as well. All life is insignificant in its vastness, after all... It's funny, right? That a deliverer would dread her own demise... Since I met you, I've acquired the qualities of humans. I fear losing you. I fear the prospect of never seeing you again. I even fantasized about requesting resignation from Acheronte and relinquishing my post as the deliverer... so we could live together freely in the human world...

1306573.text: Even my pals from the Lethe don't know what I like. Can't believe you do... Thank you.

1306576.text: No need to feel, my face is devoid of warmth...

1306578.text: I don't need a ferry to cross the Lethe.

1306579.text: No time to space out. I've got new souls to deliver.

1306580.text: This place is full of life, it's the opposite of the Underworld...

1306581.text: You too have a lot of work to do every day? That's tough.

1306584.text: Wandering souls, do you hear the sigh of the Lethe?

1306585.text: I will fight... to quell unrest among souls...

1306586.text: The souls in the Lethe are growing restless...

1306587.text: Rest when you're tired, or your health will suffer.

1306588.text: What do I like...? Hmm, I'm not sure. After all, all my life I've been dealing with souls in the Underworld.

1306589.text: I haven't seen Lady Acheronte in a long while. Is Kyphon going to fill in as the acting governor of the Underworld? Something tells me that won't work out well...

1306590.text: Repentance does nothing for a soul. As the deliverer, I don't listen to a soul's pleas. My only job, as mandated by Lady Acheronte, is to escort souls to the Underworld.

1306591.text: My days before being the deliverer? They've long faded from my memory... Maybe I was human then...

1306594.text: I'm Sanva, the deliverer of the Lethe.

1306599.text: The deliverer guarding the entrance of the Underworld. Unlike the rest of her kind, Sanva is not responsible for guiding human souls to their afterlife.

1306600.text: Sanva takes direct orders from the ruler of the Underworld and is charged with keeping peace in the Underworld. She shows no leniency to those restless evil spirits.

1306601.text: Her umbrella is said to have lain at the bottom of the Lethe for thousands of years, during which it has absorbed the grudges of countless souls.

1306602.text: Although technically she is a subordinate of Kyphon, in reality she doesn't take orders from herher loyalty lies only with Acheronte. She resents Kyphon's laziness and has once made her resentment known to Acheronte.

1306605.text: The dark night seduces and intoxicates...

1306610.text: It's over already? I was just getting started...

1306611.text: The sun is coming out... Guess I'll see you in dreams...

1306613.text: My power shines as bright as the stars...

1306614.text: I'm getting my all power back!

1306616.text: Huh? A human wants to play with me? But you look like you are easily broken...

1306617.text: Your expression looks delicious. I'm drooling here...

1306618.text: Jealous of me playing with others? Why not join us? My castle is big. Let's play hide-and-seek there!

1306619.text: Didn't know you could make cakes. Let me try... Mmm... Love the feeling of having cream slowly melting in my mouth. I'll give it an eight! Why not ten, you ask? Well, I don't want you to be complacent and stop making cakes for me.

1306620.text: Bewitching spell? Don't worry, I've never used it on you. It is my natural charm that won you over, slowly but surely. Anyway, never imagined I'd end up making an eternal pact with you. Just so you know, I can see right into your heart. Now look me in the eyes and make a vow to me!

1306621.text: I'm the queen of the night sky. I only accept good stuff.

1306622.text: Wow, I didn't expect a human to know what I like. Thank you.

1306623.text: To prove your obedience, let me pat your head.

1306624.text: Hands off or I'll bite them off!

1306626.text: You think you can do something bad and get away with it? No, I will bite your neck!

1306627.text: I'm so hungry I can barely... I must eat something before the sun comes out...

1306628.text: Quit zoning out. Come play with me!

1306629.text: The decor here is so dull. It should be made as attractive as my castle...

1306630.text: If I stay indoors, I won't have to worry about sunburn.

1306632.text: Ugh, I'm not done having fun yet.

1306633.text: Oh, the sweet scent of the night air. Hehe, should I absorb all your emotions?

1306634.text: Be my servants, all of you!

1306636.text: My shoulders are sore from all the flying...

1306637.text: I hate sunlight. The sun is my enemy.

1306638.text: If there is such a thing as fate, I guess it's a red thread binding us together.

1306639.text: Now that I'm healed, my appetite has improved.

1306640.text: Night breeze blowing on my cheeks... This is life. Oh, the moon has reacted to my power, too. The liquid coursing through it must be of the same color as the blood running in my veins.

1306643.text: Surrender all your emotions to me! That may be a joke, but one day I will seriously consider making you do that, hehe.

1306648.text: She has regained her mature appearance as well as her full strength. She is the oldest Bloodsucker in the Holy Church's records.

1306649.text: It used to be that she would recover some of her strength on full moon days, and in so doing, her body would go through unsettling changes. Her sudden regaining of her full strength puzzles her. But still, she is pleased that she got her mature look back.

1306650.text: Personality-wise, she hasn't changed much and remains as innocent as ever, and she never attacks anyone unprovoked. And like before, she likes hanging out with Ella and Metamorphoses.

1306651.text:
The news of the oldest Bloodsucker regaining her strength has spread to the Holy Church. The church doesn't really care what happened to Nocturna. They only see her as a heretic threat that needs to be eliminated, and they are already making plans to do so.
Oblivious to any of this, Nocturna is still enjoying her feast in her castle. Little does she know that her peaceful days are numbered...

1306655.text: Such a feast for the eyes...

1306659.text: Trophies? No, no, these are my merchandise. They're going into my backpack!

1306660.text: Hands off my Backpack. My merchandise is in there...

1306664.text: It's time to update my inventory!

1306665.text: Huh? I don't think we've met before. Come take a look at my stock. I offer discounts for new customers!

1306666.text: It's you again. Looks like you're satisfied with what I sold you last time. I've got some new goods. Wanna have a look?

1306667.text: This is something from Irminsul. I went to a lot of trouble to get my hands on it... That one over thereI dug it out of an iceberg in Snegurochka. How did I do that? Hehe, that's a trade secret. We merchants have our ways!

1306668.text: Well, if it isn't my favorite regular! What can I get you this time? I can make an exception and give you a heavy discount... What? You wanna buy me? How can you say something like that!? I'm way out of your price range!

1306669.text: I want to travel around the world collecting exotic trinkets and baubles, but where will I be when my journey ends...? Sometimes I have the urge to open a store here. That way, we can settle down and be together every day. Sounds nice, doesn't it? Oh, you want me to stay too?

1306670.text: This is for me? Hehe, thanks.

1306671.text: Wow, it's so shiny. Must have cost you a fortune! I gotta take good care of it.

1306674.text: Is there something on my face?

1306675.text: This dress is not for sale.

1306677.text: Keep spacing out and we'll end up losing all our customers!

1306678.text: It must be lucrative to open a store here!

1306679.text: Didn't know you had such good taste. You must have put a lot of effort into the decor.

1306680.text: Let's go in search of new goods!

1306682.text: I've got a wide range of goods for sale. These are the best bang for your buck and come with free after-sales service!

1306683.text: Where should I set up the stall next?

1306686.text: That's as low as I can go. Buy it already, before someone else does.

1306687.text: You wanna buy it on... credit? No, no, that's where I draw the line!

1306688.text: Welcome, anything you want, you can find it here. Feel free to look around!

1306689.text: In addition to selling things, I've also memorized a lot of interesting stories I heard in my travels. Wanna hear some?

1306691.text: I'm putting you on my blacklist!

1306692.text: My name is Maja Kany. I'm a traveling merchant with the dream of traveling around the world. I've got loads of mysterious treasure in my backpack. Come take a look!

1306697.text: A merchant who travels around with all kinds of exotic goods. No one knows where she got them from.

1306698.text: According to herself, she came from a poor family and at a young age joined an eccentric master merchant in his travels. When the merchant went missing, she inherited his fortune and started her own business.

1306699.text: For a money-grubbing merchant, she has a surprisingly good reputation. Even many nobles come to buy curiosities from her.

1306700.text: Years of hustling and struggling out in the world have molded her into a sophisticated merchantone with her own way of doing business. Often plainly dressed, she has easily endeared herself to the townsfolk. The goods in her backpack are always quickly snapped up.

1306704.text: Welcome back. I'll always be here for you.

1306705.text: Do not let up on your daily studies.

1306706.text: I've been waiting for you here for a long time.

1306707.text: Your arrival made me feel a touch of warmth in the endless cold night.

1306708.text: Ribbit, what a day full of energy!

1306709.text: There you go again. You're so stubborn.

1306711.text: Don't be lazy, you have to train with me today!

1306712.text: You're here... I'm so glad, let me sing a song for you~

1306713.text: Let's sink into the dream with me today......

1306715.text: Welcome back, the door will always be open to you.

1306716.text: As long as I can see you, every day is as happy as a celebration.

1306717.text: Let's race, I'll beat you today!

1306718.text: Shh, keep it down. If I'm caught slacking off, it's going to be a disaster!

1306719.text: Do you wanna hang out with me today?

1306720.text: If I could see you every day, I would be satisfied.

1306721.text: There are still many people who need our care. Don't worry, I'll be with you today.

1306722.text: Welcome home. The sky was pleasant today.

1306723.text: The outside world is threatening the Elves all the time. Always stay vigilant.

1306724.text: Welcome home. Are you hungry? I'll go make something to eat~

1306725.text: I have spent countless Today, but every day I still look forward to seeing you.

1306726.text: Welcome back. I will always protect this place.

1306727.text: Stop wandering, the fleet is leaving now!

1306728.text: Ah, it's you. Wanna paint with me today, too?

1306729.text: Hm~ I don't need you to play with me - Hey, don't go!

1306730.text: Nice weather today. Wanna go fishing together?

1306731.text: Ah, how did you come...... I'm not ready yet......

1306732.text: Welcome back. I'll always be waiting for you.

1306733.text: Too boring alone, come and play with me~

1306734.text: Hey, new arrivals in the shop! Come and see!

1306735.text: Such insolence! Stay away from the Princess.

1306740.text: I must fight my way forward and destroy anyone standing in the Princess's way.

1306741.text: For the sake of the Princess, I must not fall here...

1306742.text: In the name of the Princess...

1306743.text: My training is far from enough...

1306744.text: I can't afford to let up, not even for a minute.

1306745.text: God, please grant me the power to protect the Princess...

1306746.text: Get away from the Princess, you shady bastard!

1306747.text: Don't talk to me. As the Princess's guard, I must stay vigilant at all times.

1306748.text: Tips on being a guard? Have your sword at the ready, and be prepared to give your all to protect the Princessthat's it.

1306749.text: God has blessed this land. And you, someone who fights for the Princess, have also received the blessing. Don't worry, as your companion, I will keep you out of harm's way.

1306750.text: Protecting the Princess has been my life's mission. I'm sure you understand that... When we fight side by side, I'm always impressed by your magic power. Join me in defending the Princess. There's firmness in your eyes, as in mine. We will make a great team. For the Princess, let's overcome all odds together...

1306751.text: This is for me? Aw, you shouldn't have...

1306752.text: I like it... so I'll take it.

1306754.text: You fool, what are you doing!?

1306755.text: You want me to pinch your cheek? That's not funny...

1306756.text: A strange thought to have during battle!

1306758.text: You're a guard. Surely you have better things to do than zone out...

1306759.text: This is your home? A far cry from the Princess's palace.

1306761.text: Don't push yourself too hard. Let me help you.

1306763.text: For the Princess, defeat all enemies!

1306767.text: Monsters and evils are going rampant. It is my duty, as ordained by the Princess, to defeat them and keep this land safe.

1306768.text: Staying alert at all times is a hard thing to do. No matter how hard I train, there are still moments when I let down my guard during missions.

1306769.text: Even if I fall, my companions will do their best to keep the Princess safea belief held by everyone.

1306770.text: The joy of victory is short-lived. The road ahead is still long. If I'm to fulfill my duty, I must keep improving myself.

1306773.text: I'm Naiad, the protector of the Princess. Don't get any ideas, or you'll have my sword to answer to.

1306780.text: My love is far from enough...

1306781.text: It should have been over a long time ago. I can't wait to go back. Anemone is waiting for me!

1306782.text: This is it...? No... I'm not done yet, I still have someone important to protect...

1306784.text: You want to continue? But I'm a little tired...

1306785.text: Let me show you the power of love!

1306786.text: Ha, God has answered my prayers.

1306787.text: Don't come close. I don't show mercy to villains!

1306788.text: I'm cute? Of course I am. I'm the cutest girl in the church besides Anemone.

1306789.text: You like me too? Hehe, that's tricky. I already have my heart set on Anemone...

1306790.text: You're gentler than I thought you would be. You're an amazing person... But just so you know, I'm going to be bound by the rules of the Holy Church...

1306791.text: Why would I stay at the Holy Church? Because Anemone needs my protection. She's so cute, and yet everyone picks on her... You want to take us away from the church? You're bold, I'll give you that. It's not easy to escape their pursuit, you know. But... the very thought of this forbidden love fills me with excitement... Hehe, the three of us should stay together forever!

1306793.text: Aw, I will cherish this. Looks like we do have a connection!

1306794.text: You want to touch my head too?

1306795.text: Hehe, bad behavior will be punished.

1306797.text: I just got this dress. Don't soil it.

1306798.text: You want a lick? You're so weird...

1306799.text: Hehe, you look cute even when you space out.

1306800.text: Is this where you live? Thanks for having me over.

1306802.text: A new mission from the Holy Church?

1306803.text: It's over already? I'm gonna get some rest.

1306804.text: Don't approach me unannounced. Only Anemone can do that!

1306805.text: Oh, you need my help too?

1306806.text: Are we going to eliminate the heretics?

1306807.text: Sit here and relax for a while!

1306808.text: The church got another bumper harvest. Let's join Anemone in celebration!

1306809.text: Do not get in my way. Hehe, I can be very controlling.

1306810.text: When you lose someone dear to you, your world turns black and white. I've been there... Then I met Anemone, and my world regained its colors.

1306811.text: Unrequited love is scary? Uh, I don't think soI'm talking about the inclusive kind of love. I wish to experience it.

1306813.text: Life can be lost in the blink of an eye!

1306814.text: I am a Hierophant. My job is to eliminate all heretics who pose a threat to Anemone.

1306822.text: Nicolis is the youngest member of the core staff at the Holy Church. Repulsed by church politics, she skips all sorts of meetings under the pretext of doing farm work.

1306823.text: Her casual way of living changes when she meets Anemone, her first friend, who is the only person that can soften Nicolis' bad temper.

1306824.text: In order to minimize Anemone's exposure to the dark side of the Holy Church, Nicolis starts to accept missions that she previously considered unpalatable and even begins to frequently show up at high-level meetings at the church. Shocked by her change of behavior, the church leadership sends people to spy on her.

1306825.text:
Clearly, the church leadership and Nicolis have different agendas: The former, hoping to use Anemone to tie Nicolis down, sends Fellagood to manipulate Anemone; the latter, however, is secretly planning an escape with Anemone from the church and its surveillance.
"I heard you and Anemone are good friends. That's good. Let's make this place your burial ground, shall we?"

1306831.text: The personal guard of Princess Amanami, conscientious and straightforward. A little foolhardy, but able to handle crises with a cool head.

1306832.text: Been staying at the Princess's side, dedicated to her job. Capable of enchanting her blade with souls and using it to cut down anyone who threatens to harm the Princess.

1306833.text: Grew up with Amanami. Determined to give the Princess everything she has. Never lets up in her martial training.

1306834.text: Like Amanami, she never set foot outside her hometown, but neither does she have any curiosity about what lies beyondshe believes the outside world will bring nothing but danger to the island. She has nothing in common with other girls her age, so she is always misunderstood and seen as a freak.

1306835.text: This is my stage. Behave or leave!

1306839.text: You want me to give up?

1306840.text: Too weak. Not worthy of my time!

1306841.text: I'm so lame. I'd better make myself scarce...

1306843.text: This training is a walk in the park. Give me something more challenging!

1306844.text: Swept off your feet by my charm, aren't you?

1306845.text: I am the cutest. Don't take your eyes off me!

1306846.text: You're my fan too? Guess an autograph wouldn't hurt.

1306847.text: The concert is finally over. My shoulders are sore, could you give me a massage?
