1306848.text: The sweat of hard work? No, an idol can't show her sweat to peopleit would be disgusting... Her only job is to shine on stage.

1306849.text: Come closer, idiot. You can't see my performance clearly from so far away! When I sing or dance, I always do my best to express my emotions. Okay, the crowd is cheering. Here I go!

1306850.text: Being an idol is about doing all you can to show your best on stage. My hard work hasn't gone unnoticed, I know, but people still judge me by my appearance... But don't worry, I won't let that get me down! This might sound silly, but can I always count on your support? When you're in the audience, I will give my best performance and let you see me at my cutest...

1306851.text: A gift for me? Hehe, I'll take it.

1306852.text: How did you know what I like? You really made my day, but what should I give you in return?

1306853.text: It will mess up my hair.

1306854.text: So disgusting... You're the worst human being...

1306855.text: I spent a long time on my makeup. Don't wanna have it ruined.

1306856.text: What, you only realize now that I have the best shape?

1306857.text: Step one to being a good dancer: work on your footwork.

1306858.text: What are you spacing out for, dummy?

1306860.text: A place more beautiful than this? Hmm, the view from the stage is the view I love the most.

1306861.text: What needs to be done today?

1306862.text: Over already? Thanks for the great work!

1306863.text: Thanks for the support. I will give my best performance on stage!

1306864.text: Get ready for a cute and spectacular performance!

1306866.text: Finally a breather! I could really use a bath right now!

1306867.text: I'm an idiot? Seriously? Only a real idiot would call someone else an idiot!

1306868.text: You have weird interests, but I don't dislike weird people.

1306869.text: A once-in-a-decade beauty? That's a massive exaggeration. I'm just trying to look cute on stage.

1306870.text: I'm a trend chaser? Hehe, you're wrong, I'm a trendsetter. People imitate my style!

1306873.text: I'm Claire, the most popular idol in Cassiel. Do you feel my passion? Hehe, everybody, prepare to be smitten by my cuteness!

1306881.text: A girl from the Sanctuary who contrasts the traditional image of a serious and rustic Sanctuary dweller. Often seen going shopping in the market.

1306882.text: Gained worldwide fame for winning the last season of Shiny Girls, thus becoming a top idol that many girls see as a role model.

1306883.text: She prefers to be called a genius sorcerer than an idol, and she aspires to be the most glamorous and strongest sorcerer ever. When she casts spells, her golden hair flutters in the wind as lightning and thunder rage around her. It's a breathtaking sight from a distance.

1306884.text:
She doesn't consider herself a good idol and prefers that the Protector recognize her as a sorcerer. In private, she undergoes rigorous magic training and assists the Protector in destroying monsters coming up from the ground.
Her pretty blonde hair is wet from rain, her clothes are covered in mud, and the blood on her fair skin has yet to drybut none of it stops her from relishing the battle.
"There are no better decorations than rain and mud. I can feel the glow of my magic. It's so hot... My fighting spirit burns like fire. This is my stage, this is where I shine."

1306937.text: I fight for the future of the kingdom!

1306942.text: I will not fail. For justice always prevails.

1306943.text: For the future of the kingdom, I must survive...

1306945.text: I've gotten stronger. Father would be proud if he saw me now.

1306946.text: I've come a long way from my noble origins.

1306947.text: You haven't seen half of what I can do.

1306948.text: Huh? You want to fight alongside me? But I don't know you...

1306949.text: My people are suffering from the monsters plaguing this land. It is up to the royal family to protect them.

1306950.text: It's an honor to fight alongside me, you say? You flatter me. Eliminating the monsters is not a one-man job, but a team effort.

1306951.text: You're interesting. I'd love to invite you to my party in the capital and introduce you to everyone.

1306952.text: It's praying time. Come pray with me. Dear goddess, who guards this land: I pray that you give us light and hope and grant us the strength to save the people from their suffering and build a better future for all of us.

1306953.text: Thanks for the gift. I'll take it.

1306954.text: We share the same taste. Incredible!

1306955.text: My carefully groomed hair is all messed up...

1306956.text: You... You... What are you doing!?

1306957.text: Knock it off! Stop pinching my face.

1306958.text: Disrespecting royalty is a serious crime!

1306959.text: Please keep your distance. You're making me uncomfortable...

1306960.text: The enemy is coming. This is no time to let down your guard.

1306961.text: Such unique decor. I see you've got taste.

1306962.text: This is where the party will be held after the battle, right?

1306963.text: Relax, this is barely a warm-up.

1306965.text: I'm Carol, heir to the Kingdom of Lochaber. It is my duty to protect the people of this land.

1306967.text: Monsters still plague this land. I shall destroy them with my sword.

1306968.text: Resting is not slackingit's getting ready for the next battle.

1306969.text: I hear the plea of the people, and I'm willing to do everything for them.

1306970.text: If my singing could heal people's scarred souls, I wouldn't have to swing my sword and partake in bloodshed every day...

1306971.text: This world can only be saved by the light in people's hearts. All I can do is lead people to that light.

1306972.text: Two things I can't stand: monsters ravaging the world and evil corrupting the human mind.

1306975.text: Whatever we're up against, we must stay hopefulit's the only way to receive grace from the goddess. May she answer my prayers and bless Lochaber.

1306983.text: A noble with a graceful bearing, she stands out from any crowd.

1306984.text: She travels around the Kingdom of Lochaber to learn about the plight of the people in preparation for her ascension to the throne. When the monsters invade, she returns to the capital to lead a fight against them.

1306985.text: Knowing that it would be hard for Lochaber to fight the growing number of monsters alone, she leads a mission to various kingdoms in a bid to form an alliance against the monsters.

1306986.text: Watching people celebrate the new year in a foreign land fills her with nostalgia. Then she reminds herself that emotions and weakness won't do any good for her kingdom, and that her mission is still unfinished.

1306987.text: Huh? I need to fight too?

1306991.text: I haven't had enough fun yet...

1306992.text: This is how villains are defeated in fairy tales.

1306993.text: I'm not used to being human, after all...

1306996.text: I don't like fighting, but no one will bully me again once I've gotten stronger, right?

1306997.text: I'm still new to this world. You have much to teach me.

1306998.text: You don't look like a bad person. I trust you won't bully me...

1306999.text: You like dancing too? The flowers are in bloom. No better time to dance!

1307000.text: I feel dizzy up here. Can you help me down?

1307001.text: Wanna play hide and seek? If I find you, you will be punished!

1307002.text: Wanna come with me to Fairyland? Hmm... no? Don't get me wrong. I really do want to take you to my homeland, I'm just not sure how to introduce you...

1307003.text: Didn't expect to get a gift from you. Thanks!

1307004.text: I know we're friends and all, but this is such an expensive gift... Are you sure it's appropriate?

1307005.text: Are you curious about my ears, too?

1307006.text: You... You... Are you trying to bully me?

1307007.text: Whoa... Don't scare me like that!

1307008.text: What do you think of my new dress?

1307009.text: Stop. I'm not used to walking on two legs yet...

1307010.text: You're spacing out. Thinking about something fun?

1307011.text: Is this your home? I like the quiet here.

1307013.text: Leave it to me. I want to make new friends.

1307015.text: My name's Amane. I may look like a human girl, but really I'm a cute bunny!

1307016.text: Let me join you on your adventure!

1307019.text: Hauen is my friendshe has mastered all kinds of magic spells. I'm not nearly as good as her...

1307020.text: Unlike humans, we can't lie. Do I look like a bunny who tells lies?

1307021.text: Is that a prank? I'm sorry, but please don't tease me. I will take it seriously...

1307022.text: Bunnies can get angry too, although I hate to hurt people...

1307025.text: I'm Amane, a cute, smart bunny from Fairyland. Wanna be friends?

1307033.text: Originally an ordinary white bunny in the woods along the border of Lochaber, she transformed into a human after accidentally consuming a magic potion but has retained some of her rabbit traits.

1307034.text: Like Hauen, she is curious about the outside world but has no experience dealing with humans.

1307035.text: To stay fed, Amane comes to a nearby village and tries to fit in with the locals. It's New Year's Day, and she is fascinated by the festive bustle. But the sound of firecrackers frightens her, and she cowers in a corner.

1307036.text: Upon learning that her friend Hauen has made human friends, she decides to go looking for her and make some human friends of her own.

1307083.text: Snowshine is the child of a human and an elf. Because of the human blood in her body, she was ostracized in the Forest of Elves.

1307084.text: Snowshine likes to use her power to make delicious desserts since she was a child. When she grew up, she opened a dessert store in a human town, which was widely loved by local residents, and even some gourmets went long distances to have a taste.

1307085.text: The elves considered Snowbirds, who were integrated into human society, to be an alien. However, because the elves themselves live far from human society, Snowshine did not suffer from their harassment.

1307086.text: Recently, she has developed new desserts to prepare for the upcoming hot sale in anticipation of the human holiday.

1307133.text: Originally a respected scholar, she pledged fealty to the Chronospace Protector after learning about her ideals and became her most trusted underling.

1307134.text: She followed the Chronospace Protector into the War of Protectors but couldn't turn the defeat around. She watched helplessly as her beloved master was sealed away. Devastated, she decided to seek out the ultimate power to avenge her master.

1307135.text: To that end, she conducted all sorts of magic experiments, each more dangerous than the last. As she did so, hatred began to consume her and distort her mind.

1307136.text: After discovering Snegurochka's underground secret, Sinmara realized that her revenge plan was about to bear fruit. But first, she needs to take advantage of the situation to destroy Snegurochka root and branch...

1307138.text: The celebrations are about to begin.

1307144.text: Born in the famous gastronomic city Esmeralda in the Kingdom of Belgica, she has a unique gift for tasting sweets, which she probably owes to her special bloodline.

1307145.text: It's said that any shop that earns Geisha's approval will thrive, which some people guess is a blessing from elves.

1307146.text: As the festival approaches, the owners of sweets shops in all the cities of the Kingdom of Belgica are asking about the whereabouts of Geisha, hoping to receive her review and approval.

1307147.text: Recently, Geisha was told that someone was planning to cause trouble at the festival ceremony. Apparently she is not going to let anyone get in the way of people enjoying food.

1307149.text: So tired. Time to get some sleep.

1307155.text: A mysterious woman wanders around the cemetery at night, known as the "Agent of Death." The truth is, she just wants to find a place to sleep where no one can disturb her.

1307156.text: She used to serve as an Underworld deliverer under Kyphon. Whenever she sees a wandering ghost in the cemetery, she removes her blindfold and uses her power to escort them to the afterlife.

1307157.text: She is often seen as a weirdo because of the bandages she wears, but her strange appearance belies a gentle heart.

1307158.text: Her desire to live freely in the human world drove her to resign as a deliverer. Still, she often returns to the River of the Underworld to visit her old friends.

1307160.text: This land still reeks of disaster...

1307166.text: A doctor who travels around the world. Shunned by people because of her strange attire.

1307167.text: Gracin is often seen gathering exotic herbs in the forest and brewing them into potions. Because of the unpleasant smell of her potions, her patients often have to pinch their noses while drinking them.

1307168.text: Though her medical techniques are frowned upon by those esteemed doctors in Lunia, Gracin has been doing a great job of healing up underprivileged patients, earning her a reputation among the downtrodden.

1307169.text: Lunia, fresh out of a war, is now in shambles. Its people are displaced and suffering from a spreading plague. Gracin, a traveling doctor, is summoned for an audience with Princess Eulalia. Moved by the princess' kindness, Gracin decides to stay at her side to dole out healing where it's needed.

1307177.text: Aw, so tired. Need a rest...

1307180.text: Oh, been dancing nonstop for a while now. Sweating like crazy!

1307183.text: You want to see me dance that badly? Fine, I'll grant your wish.

1307184.text: You want to practice dance with me? Okay, but we need to warm up first.

1307185.text: Your body is stiff. Looks like you haven't warmed up properly. Ugh, alright, let's warm up together.

1307186.text: You're not like those nobles. They only see my dance moves, but you see right through my heart. We make a good pair!

1307188.text: To thank you, I'd like to give you a dance!

1307189.text: Oh, this outfit suits me? Thanks!

1307192.text: Ahh, that was close. Nearly slipped!

1307193.text: What's the matter? Never seen this kind of clothes before?

1307195.text: More makeup on the cheeks and lips... Ah, how can I help you?

1307196.text: One, two, three, four... Move your body to the beat!

1307199.text: Nice to meet you. I'm Vedare. One of the best dancers in the world. Let me introduce myself with a dance.

1307202.text: Keep dancing nonstop and you'll get tired quickly.

1307203.text: Whatever is troubling you, you can tell me.

1307204.text: My body is getting lighter and lighter. This feels good!

1307205.text: Is it raining? Darn it, it's all wet.

1307206.text: My dance is magic? Will you be enchanted?

1307209.text: Traveling is an incredible experience. Every time I come to a new town, I offer a dance to the locals.

1307211.text: Let me give you a dance.
